src: When I got home I tried to watch every episode.

ref: Jim alimuuliza Bob kusema kifungu maarufu cha mtu huyo.

src: Lita told them that she had chores to do.
mt: Lita alisema kwamba alikuwa na kazi za kawaida.
ref: Lita aliwaambia kwamba alikuwa na kazi za nyumbani za kufanya.

src: She got out a footstool and stepped on to it.
mt: Aliingia kwenye kiti cha kifua na kuingia kwenye kitiko.
ref: Akachukua kiti cha miguu cha kukanyagia.

src: While she was talking, the dog dragged mud all over the kitchen.
mt: Kabla hajawasikia, mbwa ulimwaga maji yake yote kwenye chumba cha kuchoma.
ref: Alipokuwa akiongea, mbwa akaburuta matope kila mahali jikoni.

src: One day Hector decides to brew coffee at home.
mt: Leo mmoja Hector anamchukia kujifungua kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzunguka kwa kuzung
ref: Siku moja Hector akaamua kujitengenezea kahawa nyumbani.

src: When she met her, she invited her to sit with her at lunch.
mt: Alipotembelea, alimwita kushika naye katika chakula cha mchana.
ref: Alipokutana na yeye, alimwalika kukaa na yeye kwa chakula cha mchana.

src: When he heard his name called during awards he was shocked.
mt: Alipokuwa akijadiliwa wakati wa tuzo alikuwa na haba.
ref: Aliposikia jina lake likiitwa wakati wa tuzo alishtuka.

src: Laurie wore a long sparkling dressed.
mt: Laurie alivaa kanzu kubwa yenye rangi ya shabaha.
ref: Laurie alivaa rinda ndefu lililokuwa liking'aa.

src: He realized it was a beautiful old train depot.
mt: Alipokwama kwamba ni depot ya ndege ya zamani.
ref: Akagundua kilikuwa kituo maridadi cha treni za zamani.

src: Bob got to work making fish burgers after donning the uniform.
mt: Bob alifika kazi ya kutengeneza wanyama wa samaki baada ya kufanya kazi ya kutaka.
ref: Bob alifika kazini na kutengeneza hambaga za samaki baada ya kuvaa sare.

src: She did not listen.
mt: Aliyemshauri hakutaka kujua.
ref: Hakusikiliza.

src: He sits in front of a beautiful orchid and begins to draw.
mt: Anasimama chini ya mchanga mwenye rangi nzuri na kuanza kuchipua.
ref: Akaketi mbele ya okidi maridadi na kuanza kuchora.

src: He fries them in olive oil.
mt: Anachoma kwa mafuta ya nafaka.
ref: Anawakaranga kwa mafuta ya mzeituni.

src: She decided that she would travel there.
mt: Aliamua kwamba atakapenda kufika huko.
ref: Akaamua kwamba atasafiri huko.

src: While walking on the sidewalk, he tripped and busted his knee open.
mt: Alipokuwa anapita kwenye barabara ya kawaida, alitumbukiza na kufanya koo yake kufunguka.
ref: Huku akitembea kwenye kijia, akategwa na kupasua goti lake.

src: Everything looked shiny and new.
mt: Kila kitu lilikuwa shabaha na mpya.
ref: Kila kitu kilionekana kinang'aa na kipywa.

src: I was shocked that I was being hit by a car!
mt: Nilikuwa na shida kuona kwamba nilikuwa nimepata kipindi cha gari!
ref: Nikashtuka kwamba nilikuwa nagongwa na gari!

src: When she saw the blood she ran home.
mt: Aliposema damu aliruka nyumbani.
ref: Alipoona damu alikimbia nyumbani.

src: Whenever he read out loud his classmates laughed at him.
mt: Kila wakati alivyokuwa anarudi kwa sauti wale waliokaa pamoja naye waliwaza.
ref: Wakati wowote aliposoma kwa sauti wanafunzi wenza walimchekelea.

src: She spent lots of money on the fruit and lots of time preparing it.
mt: Aliwakaribisha wengi wengi kwa michezo yake.
ref: Alitumia pesa nyingi kwenye matunda na muda mwingi wa kuandaa.

src: Unfortunately she smashed it.
mt: Kwa bahati mbaya alimwaga.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya aliigongesha.

src: We had a good understanding and had a good time together.
mt: Kwetu tulikuwa na ufahamu mzuri na tulikuwa na wakati mzuri pamoja.
ref: Tuliweza kuelewa vizuri na tulikuwa na wakati mzuri pamoja.

src: He rehearsed his lines often.
mt: Alimkamata maneno yake mara nyingi.
ref: Akajifunza mistari yake mara kwa mara.

src: Classmates often put her job in jeopardy.
mt: Wanafunzi wengi wakati mwingine wakawazawadi kazi yake.
ref: Wanafuuzi wenza humweka matatani kila wakati.

src: Another car ran a stop sign and crashed into us.
mt: Gari nyingine lilipiga signi la kubadilishana na kubadilishana na sisi.
ref: Gari lingine likaruka ishara ya kusimama na kutugonga.

src: She goes around the house singing.
mt: Anasimama katika nyumba yake akisimama.
ref: Yeye huzungunga nyumba akiimba.

src: His mind raced as he tried to find an open man.
mt: Ukakamana kama alivyokuwa anavyotafuta mtu mwenye kimbilio.
ref: Akili yake ikafanya kazi kwa haraka akijaribu kupata mtu wazi.

src: He was staring at me for a while.
mt: Aliangalia mimi kwa muda.
ref: Alikuwa akiniangalia kwa muda.

src: At their doctor's appointment, they expressed discouragement.
mt: Wakati wa kuhudhuria wakati wao wa daktari, walieleza hasara.
ref: Katika miadi ya daktari wao, walionyesha kutamaushwa.

src: One day, Catherine decided she would visit a Curling practice session.
mt: Moja anayefika, Catherine alisema atakaeleta kwa kushirikiana na mafunzo ya Curling.
ref: Siku moja, Catherine akaamua atatembelea kipindi cha mazoezi ya mchezo huo wa Curling.

src: Francis studies very hard to get a license.
mt: Francis anafundisha kwa kasi sana ili apate lisensi.
ref: Francis alisoma kwa bidii sana kupata leseni.

src: As the dancers graced the stage it was beautiful.
mt: Kama wadanganyaji wakifurudia mbele ya jukwaa ilikuwa nzuri.
ref: Kwa kuwa wacheza densi walicheza vizuri.

src: I quickly ate breakfast and began to walk to class.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechukua chakula cha asubuhi na kuanza kutembea kwa kuhitaji.
ref: Nikakula kiamsha kinywa kwa haraka na kuanza kutembea kwenda darasani.

src: The next day at school, Gary sees Lisa in the hallway.
mt: Jana jioni katika shule, Gary anapata nafasi ya kuona Lisa katika barabara.
ref: Siku iliyofuata shuleni, Gary akamwona Lisa ukumbini.

src: He enrolls in a night class and studies very hard.
mt: Anajitolea kufanya kazi ya usomaji katika kipindi cha usiku na kufanya kazi kwa ufanisi.
ref: Akajisajili katika darasa la usiku na akasoma kwa bidii sana.

src: One day he bought a simple, but high quality, camera.
mt: Juma moja alipata kamera ya kawaida, lakini ya kubwa.
ref: Siku moja akanunua kamera rahisi, lakini ya hali ya juu.

src: The employee convinced me to buy a warranty for it just in case.
mt: Kafurahishe mimi kupata taarifa ya kifungua kwa ajili ya kushindwa.
ref: Mfanyakazi alinishawishi ninunue waranti yake kama tahadhari.

src: As he was leaving the park, he saw the same balloon stuck in a tree.
mt: Kama alivyokuwa akifika katika parki, aliona balooni huo yule ikipanga katika mti.
ref: Alipokuwa akitoka kwenye bustani, akaona puto hiyo moja imekwama kwenye mti.

src: She transferred all of the content over to the proper template.
mt: Aliitaka kila kitu kwenye temi ya kawaida.
ref: Akahamisha maudhui yote kwenye kiolezo sahihi.

src: Then he went shopping for souvenirs.
mt: Baadaye alifika kwenye duka la souvenir.
ref: Kisha akaenda kununua vitu vya ukumbusho.

src: I looked through my house for the leash.
mt: Nilisoma nyumba yangu kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele kwa kilele
ref: Nikatafuta kamba nyumbani mwangu.

src: He decided to walk to his local coffee shop.
mt: Alisema atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa na nafasi atakapokuwa
ref: Akaamua kutembea hadi kwa duka la karibu la kahawa.

src: He delivered the package and she brought it inside.
mt: Alimwachia pakiti na alimwachia ndani.
ref: Akawasilisha mzigo na akaupeleka ndani.

src: Frank's parents told him to do his homework first.
mt: Wazazi wa Frank walimwambia aweke kwanza kazi yake.
ref: Wazazi wa Frank walimwambia afanye kazi yake ya nyumbani kwanza.

src: Timmy practiced shooting 3 pointers all weekend.
mt: Timmy alifanya mazoezi ya kushika 3 pointers kwa wiki nzima.
ref: Timmy alijfunza kurusha alama 3 wikendi nzima.

src: Drake immediately called the police, but the wallet was not found.
mt: Drake alipiga simu kwa polisi, lakini kiti cha fedha haikutambuliwa.
ref: Mara moja Drake akawapigia simu polisi, lakini pochi halikupatikana.

src: He got out the tire jack and iron.
mt: Alipata jangwani na kisanduku.
ref: Akatoa jeki ya tairi na chuma.

src: He researches different laptops until he has found the perfect one.
mt: Anavyofanya utafiti wa kompyuta za kawaida hadi anapata kompyuta ya kawaida.
ref: Akafanya utafiti wa vipakatalishi tofauti hadi akapata iliyomfaa.

src: He asked his mother to cut his hair.
mt: Alimwambia mama yake aangaze kichwa chake.
ref: Akamwomba mama yake amkate nywele yake.

src: They started to get mad at me about how bad I was.
mt: Wakati huo wakapata shida nami kuhusu jinsi waziwazi nilivyokuwa.
ref: Wakaanza kunikasirikia kwa sababu nilikuwa mbaya sana.

src: She paid for stamps.
mt: Aliwapa kodi.
ref: Akalipia stampu.

src: He opened up the forum to chat with coworkers.
mt: Alifungua mitandao ya kujadili ili kujadiliana na wafanyaji kazi wake.
ref: Akafungua mdahalo wa kuzungumza na wafanyakazi wenza.

src: Bob decided to forego his plastic bags.
mt: Bob aliamua kubadili kipande cha plastiki.
ref: Bob akaamua kuacha mifuko yake ya plastiki.

src: One of the artists had reasonable rates.
mt: Moja kati ya wataalamu wa sanaa alikuwa na tarifa za kawaida.
ref: Mmoja wa wasanii hao alikuwa na bei nafuu.

src: Then she applied to nicotine patch to help her.
mt: Baadaye alipata kipaji cha nikotini kwa ajili yake.
ref: Kisha akatumia kibandiko cha nikotini ili kumsaidia.

src: She took a few books with her but she would go through those quickly.
mt: Aliingia na vitabu chache lakini alitumia kwa haraka.
ref: Alibeba vitabu vichache lakini alivisoma kwa haraka.

src: But there's a cute new nurse at the office.
mt: Lakini kuna daktari mpya mwenye ujuzi wa kutosha katika ofisi.
ref: Lakini kuna muuguzi mgeni mrembo ofisini.

src: He was eating a pie when he felt something very hard in his mouth.
mt: Alivyokuwa anaeziwa kwa kifungua, alijivunia kitu kimekataa kwa kiasi kikubwa.
ref: Alikuwa akila pai wakati alihisi kitu kigumu sana mdomoni mwake.

src: Rob decided he may as well join.
mt: Rob alisema yeye pia anaweza kujia.
ref: Rob akaamua anaweza kujiunga pia.

src: It was now late Saturday and she hadn't heard anything.
mt: Ilipozidi siku ya Jumamosi na hawakupata habari yoyote.
ref: Ilikuwa baadaye Jumamosi na hakuwa amesikia chochote.

src: She walked sadly into the living room.
mt: Alienda kwa mafuriko katika chumba cha kujiamini.
ref: Akatembea kwa huzuni sebuleni.

src: She continued to throw her fist at me.
mt: Aliendelea kubakia kwa mimi.
ref: Akaendelea kunirushia ngumi.

src: Ashley started being stupid when she grew up.
mt: Ashley alianza kujitetea wakati alipokua.
ref: Ashley akaanza kuwa mjinga alipokuwa mtu mzima.

src: Every time Pam got her baby to sleep, the dog started barking.
mt: Kila mara Pam alipokwama mtoto wake, mbwa alianza kuzimba.
ref: Kila wakati Pam alipomfanya mtoto alale, mbwa alianza kubweka.

src: She explored the campus.
mt: Aliangalia kwa makini.
ref: Akachunguza kampasi hiyo.

src: All he could do was numb the area with Novocaine.
mt: Alitupatia tu kwa Novocaine.
ref: Alichoweza kufanya kufisha ganzi eneo hilo kwa kutumia Novocaine.

src: Ford's friends warned him that he was missing out on fun.
mt: Wapenzi wa Ford walimwambia kwamba alikuwa akifuta mazungumzo.
ref: Marafiki wa Ford walimwonya kwamba alikuwa anakosa burudani.

src: I tried to argue but couldn't.
mt: Nilikuwa na nia ya kujadili lakini nilikuwa na uwezo mdogo.
ref: Nilijaribu kubishana lakini sikuweza.

src: She looked through her house for ideas.
mt: Aliangalia nyumba yake kwa ajili ya mawazo.
ref: Akaangalia nyumba yake kwa dhana zozote.

src: She climbed the ladder and was amazed at all the stuff in the house.
mt: Aliingia kwenye mabawa na alikuwa na hofu kwa vitu vyote vya nyumba.
ref: Akapanda ngazi na alishangazwa na vitu vyote ndani ya nyumba hiyo.

src: She was heard a woodpecker and began looking for it in the trees.
mt: Aliyemwona kama kipande cha mti alianza kujifunza katika miti.
ref: Akamsikia kigogota na kuanza kumtafuta kwenye miti.

src: Bob walked into a gas station and asked if he could have a soda.
mt: Bob alingia kwenye stesheni ya mafuta na kusema kwamba anataka soda.
ref: Bob alitembelea kituo cha mafusa na akauliza kama atapata soda.

src: He was very bored.
mt: Alikuwa na ugonjwa wa kujisikia.
ref: Alikuwa ameboeka sana.

src: He got put on the waiting list.
mt: Alipewa orodha ya wakati.
ref: Akajipata kwenye orodha ya wanaosubiri kucheza.

src: Now Tami had a new Lisa Frank Trapper Keeper.
mt: Sasa Tami alikuwa na Trapper Keeper mpya ya Lisa Frank.
ref: Sasa Tami alikuwa na Lisa Frank Trapper Keeper mpya.

src: When she returned, the tree was knocked over.
mt: Alipokwenda tena, mti ulipigwa na kubakia.
ref: Aliporudi, mti huo ulikuwa umeanguka.

src: He decided to buy a new, more comfortable chair.
mt: Alisema atakapewa kiti cha kawaida, atakapochukua kiti cha kawaida.
ref: Akaamua kununua kiti kipya, chenye starehe zaidi.

src: Rex runs out to get a baguette.
mt: Rex anapokwenda kupata baguette.
ref: Rex akaenda nje kununua mkate.

src: She worked hard all day and even took work home.
mt: Ali kazi kwa kila siku na pia akafanya kazi nyumbani.
ref: Alifanya kazi kwa bidii siku nzima na hata akabeba kazi nyumbani.

src: There were only seconds left on the clock and the game was tied.
mt: Kuna sekunde chache zilizobaki na mchezo ulikuwa umetengana.
ref: Kulikuwa kumesalia sekunde chache kwenye saa na mchezo ulikuwa sare kwa sare.

src: The wind blew the tree branches so much my wife could not sleep.
mt: Ruzuku ilimwaga mabonde ya mti kiasi cha kuwaharibu usiku mzito wa mke wangu.
ref: Upepo ukapiga sana matawi ya miti hadi mke wangu hakuweza kulala.

src: Kate finally went online and ordered her keyboard!
mt: Kate akifika online alituma kwa kipindi cha kibao kifaa chake cha kuchapisha!
ref: Mwishowe Kate alienda mtandaoni na kuagiza kibodi yake!

src: Three weeks after he began, he got a call.
mt: Baada ya miezi mitatu, alipofika, alipata simu.
ref: Wiki tatu baada ya kuanza, akapata simu.

src: Her favorite library was staffed by Miss Watson.
mt: Kibao cha kujifunza chake kilikuwa na wafunzi wakubwa.
ref: Maktaba yake aliyoipenda sana ilikuwa inasimamiwa na Bi. Watson.

src: When the arrived she sat on her knees surveying the park.
mt: Alipokuja alikaa kwa miguu yake kuzingatia mazingira ya parki.
ref: Alipowasili akapiga magoti akichunguza bustani hiyo.

src: The highway patrol stopped Steve's car.
mt: Barabara ya polisi ilisimamisha gari ya Steve.
ref: Polisi wa barabarani wakasimamisha gari la Steve.

src: She talked of nothing else for a week.
mt: Aliwakaribisha kwa kujadili kuhusu kitu kimoja kwa wiki moja.
ref: Hakuongea kitu kingine chochote kwa wiki nzima.

src: He decided to write a book about his hard life.
mt: Alisema atakapendelea kuandika kitabu kuhusu maisha yake yaliyokuwa ngumu.
ref: Akaamua kuandika kitabu kuhusu maisha yake magumu.

src: I trained for it for about three months.
mt: Nilimwajibika kwa kuhitaji kwa takribani miezi mitatu.
ref: Nilifanya mazoezi kwa karibu miezi mitatu.

src: It was far too heavy, though, and fell like a brick.
mt: Ilikuwa kama kubwa sana, lakini ilipata kama kifaru.
ref: Ilikuwa nzito sana, na ilihisi ni kama tofali.

src: He saw a twinkling, moving star!
mt: Aliona nyota inayemwaga, inayomwaga!
ref: Akaona nyota inayometa ikisonga!

src: He decided to ask her to marry him tonight, after a movie date.
mt: Alisema atakapokwenda kwa sinema leo, atakapokwenda kwa nini kwa mke wake.
ref: Akaamua kumuuliza kama atamkubali usiku huo, baada ya filamu.

src: He tried climbing the tree, but he fell.
mt: Alivyokuwa anavyotembea kwa mti, alipata kushindwa.
ref: Akajaribu kupanda mti, lakini akaanguka.

src: Although she was better she wasn't well.
mt: Alipoona kuwa bora kuliko hapo awali, hakupona.
ref: Ijapokuwa alikuwa amepata nafuu, hakuwa sawa.

ref: Alikuwa njiani hapo siku moja na akagundua ilikuwa imefungwa.

src: However, today he forgot his book.
mt: Lakini leo alificha kitabu chake.

src: I have to go to zoos.
mt: Naomba nifike katika zoo.
ref: Ni lazima niende kwenye bustani la wanyama.

src: Sure enough, she didn't do it one evening.
mt: Kama vile alivyotaka, alikuwa hajafanya kwa jana.
ref: Kwa hakika, hakufanya kitu chochote jioni moja.

src: At practice his coach let him try out as pitcher.
mt: Katika mashindano aliyokuwa meneja alimwajibisha kujaribu kama mchezaji.
ref: Wakati wa mazoezi kocha wake alimruhusu kujaribu kuwa mrusha mpira.

src: She looked around the room.
mt: Aliangalia kwa makini katika nyumba.
ref: Aliangalia chumba.

src: The dentist tells Mark that he needs to have his wisdom teeth removed.
mt: Rafiki yake mdorobo anasema kwamba anahitaji kuchukua dento zake za kujitambua.
ref: Daktari huyo wa meno akamwambia Mark kwamba anahitaji kungolewa meno za magego.

src: She decided to run a load of dishes that night.
mt: Aliamua kufanya kazi za kuchoma kwa kipindi hicho cha usiku.
ref: Akaamua kuosha vyombo kadhaa usiku huo.

src: Bill poured out some grains for the cows in big bins.
mt: Bill alipiga kwa kiasi kikubwa kwa mbao kwa wanyama waliokaa kwenye magunia.
ref: Bill akamwaga nafaka kiasi kwa ajili ya ngombe ndani ya pipa kubwa.

src: At home, he asked his sister to loan him money for surgery.
mt: Kwa nyumbani, alieleza dada yake kwa kuomba pesa kwa ajili ya upasuaji.
ref: Nyumbani, alimwomba dadake ampe mkopo wa pesa kwa ajili ya upasuaji.

src: One day a couple comes into the dealership and asks to see a car.
mt: Jumanne mmoja kipenzi mmoja wakaelekea katika biashara na kuomba kufika kwa gari.
ref: Siku moja wenzi wakaja dukani na wakaomba waone gari.

src: They spent most of their hissing each other.
mt: Wakakaa kwa kujitetea kwa kujitetea.
ref: Walichukua muda wao mwingi wakifokeana.

src: So he went shopping for new tiles.
mt: Kwa hiyo alipata kazi ya kupata vitu vya kujenga.
ref: Kwa hivyo alienda kununua vigae vipya.

src: He then invited some of his friends.
mt: Alimwachia wenzake wachache.
ref: Kisha akawaalika baadhi ya marafiki wake.

src: 12 men put the casket in the ground.
mt: 12 wanaume wakati wa kubeba kifuniko chini.
ref: Wanaume 12 waliweka jeneza kwenye kaburi.

src: He got hit with a left hook that cut his eye in the fifth.
mt: Alipigwa na mabao ya kulia yaliyosababisha kufa kwa macho katika kipindi cha tano.
ref: Aligongwa kwa ngumi ya kushoto ambayo ilikata jicho lake katika raundi ya tano.

src: On his way out the door, he ate some chips.
mt: Kabla ya kufika nje, ala chakula cha kipande.
ref: Akitoka kwenye mlango, akala chipsi kiasi.

src: Some teams designed fancy cars.
mt: Kama kawaida, timu nyingi zilichapisha gari za kawaida.
ref: Baadhi ya timu ziliunda magari maridadi.

src: The coach said that he needed to be faster on skates.
mt: Kocha alisema kwamba alitaka kuwa mrefu zaidi kwenye skates.
ref: Kocha alisema kwamba anahitaji kuwa na kasi kwenye viatu vya magurudumu.

src: She panicked and started skiing faster down the slope.
mt: Aliwaza na kuanza kusikia zaidi kwa kasi kwenye mlima.
ref: Akashtuka na kuanza kuteleza kwa haraka kwenye mteremko.

src: He was able to buy a ticket for himself.
mt: Alipata tiketi kwa ajili yake.
ref: Aliweza kununua tikiti yeye mwenyewe.

src: He barely slept any the night before due to anxiety.
mt: Alisikia kwa kiasi kikubwa ushahidi.
ref: Alishindwa kulala usiku huo kwa sababu ya wasiwasi.

src: Her daughter was not moving or breathing!
mt: Mwana wake hakuwa na mvuto au akili!
ref: Binti yake hakuwa akisonga wala kupumua!

src: Her sister stole the CD while angry with her.
mt: Jamaa yake alikataa CD wakati alikuwa na hasira naye.
ref: Dadake aliiba CD hiyo akiwa amemkasirikia.

src: She went to inspect it, and she was amazed at all the life in it.
mt: Alienda kuzitafuta, na alikuwa naamuzi kwa kila kitu katika yale.
ref: Akaenda kukikagua, na alishangazwa na vyumbe vyote vilivyomo.

src: However, she forgot these things when she tasted her first S'MORE.
mt: Lakini alifichua hayo vitu wakati alipokuwa akikupata S'MORE yake kwanza.
ref: Hata hivyo, alisahau vitu hivi alipoonja S'MORE yake ya kwanza.

src: She tried not to panic.
mt: Alijifungua kwa haraka.
ref: Akajaribu kutokuwa na wasiwasi.

src: Troy scored 56 points to win the game for his team.
mt: Troy alisajiliwa 56 points kwa kushinda mchezo kwa timu yake.
ref: Troy alipata alama 56 ili kuipa ushindi timu yake.

src: He called his friends who ate with him on these occasions.
mt: Alimwambia wenzake waliokuwa na nafasi ya kula pamoja na yeye katika makusudi hayo.
ref: Akawapigia simu marafiki wake waliokula na yeye katika matukio haya.

src: A bird was flying in the distance.
mt: Kinyonga kilikuwa kinapita katika mafuriko.
ref: Ndege alikuwa akipaa kwa mbali.

src: Christian wanted to play with the guns in the house.
mt: Christian alitaka kucheza na silaha katika nyumba.
ref: Christian alitaka kucheza na bunduki hizo nyumbani.

src: They told him to go to bed.
mt: Waliwataja kwenda kwenye kinga.
ref: Wakamwambia aende kitandani.

src: Ben enrolls in a piano class with a local tutor.
mt: Ben anajitambulisha katika kikao cha piano na mwalimu wa kijiji.
ref: Ben alijiandikisha katika darasa la piano na mkufunzi wa karibu.

src: He finally told his teachers at school about it.
mt: Alisema kwa mara ya mwisho masomo yake kuhusu hicho.
ref: Mwishowe akawaambia walimu wake shuleni kuihusu.

src: I found a box that was buried in the ground.
mt: Nilipata kifaa kilicho chini kwenye ardhi.
ref: Nikapata sanduku ambalo lilikuwa limefunikwa ardhini.

src: On a long weekend, Sam took the train upstate to go visit Karen.
mt: Sam alienda kwa relini kwa muda wa wiki kwa kuzunguka mkoa wa kaskazini kwa ajili ya kufanya mazungumzo na Karen.
ref: Wakati wa wikendi ndefu, Sam aliabiri treni kwenda kumtembelea Karen.

src: He found some sticks and logs in the woods.
mt: Alipata majani na mabega katika mazingira.
ref: Alipata vijiti na kuni kiasi msituni.

src: On Friday she was really sick and nauseous at work.
mt: Jumamosi alikuwa na ugonjwa na uhaba kazi.
ref: Ijumaa alikuwa mgonjwa sana na alihisi kichefuchefu kazini.

src: He hires a tutor and practices speaking Hindi every day.
mt: Anapata mwalimu na anafanya kujifunza lugha ya Hindi kila siku.
ref: Akamwajiri mkufunzi na akajifunza kuongea Kihindi kila siku.

src: He gave her the silent treatment.
mt: Alimwambia kwa mawazo.
ref: Akaamua kumnyamazia.

src: We were all so excited to have fun!
mt: Tulikuwa wote tayari kujifungua kwa kujifurahisha!
ref: Sote tulikuwa tumesisimka sana kujifurahisha!

src: They baked chocolate and oatmeal cookies.
mt: Walakichia cookies za kizungu na mafuta ya mchele.
ref: Wakaoka biskuti za chokoleti na shayiri.

src: Last one I talked to lied to me.
mt: Japo mimi nilijadili na mwisho niliyemwona alimwambia mimi.
ref: Niliyeongea na yeye mwisho alinidanganya.

src: The people of Lansing were stuck in their homes without power.
mt: Wakazi wa Lansing waliwahi kuishi katika nyumba zao bila umeme.
ref: Watu wa Lansing walikuwa wamekwama manyumbani mwao bila umeme.

src: He hit the ball as hard as he could on his first swing.
mt: Alimwagika mpira kama alivyoweza kwanza kwa kipigo chake.
ref: Akagonga mpira kwa nguvu kadri awezavyo mara ya kwanza.

src: She began to feel depressed and thought everyone had forgotten.
mt: Alianza kujitupa na kujifikiri kuwa wote wamevichwa.
ref: Akaanza kuhisi huzuni na akafikiria kila mtu alikuwa amemsahau.

src: I applied to many different places.
mt: Nilipenda kufanya kazi katika nchi nyingi.
ref: Nikatuma maombi sehemu nyingi tofauti.

src: She decided to save up her money.
mt: Aliamua kushika fedha zake.
ref: Akaamua kuweka akiba ya pesa zake.

src: Then she thought of a loophole.
mt: Baadaye alikumbuka kifungo.
ref: Kisha akafikiria kuhusu kisababu.

src: After they showed her how to play she was excited to begin.
mt: Baada ya kuonyesha nini kile anachofanya, alikuwa na hamu ya kuanza.
ref: Baada ya kumwonyesha jinsi ya kucheza alisisimka kuanza.

src: Then she took the subway.
mt: Baadaye alipata ndege.
ref: Kisha akapanda treni ya chini ya ardhi.

src: Madeline immediately saw a pink bag she loved.
mt: Madeline aliona kichwa kikikijivu cha kijani alivyo.
ref: Mara moja Madeline akaona mfuko wa waridi alioupenda.

src: The plant stopped growing.
mt: Kilimo kilipata hatari.
ref: Mmea huo ukakoma kukua.

src: According to reports, he is finally healthy and able to play.
mt: Kulinganisha ripoti, anafanya vizuri na anaweza kucheza.
ref: Kulingana na ripoti, sasa ana afya nzuri na anaweza kucheza.

src: She made a schedule and broke it up into tasks for each day.
mt: Aliwakilisha mjadala na kuangamiza kwa kazi kwa kila siku.
ref: Akatengeneza ratiba na kuifupisha kwa kazi ndogo za kila siku.

src: However, he sees a very nice shirt on sale.
mt: Lakini anavyoona kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile kitcheo kimepata kile
ref: Hata hivyo, aliona shati moja nzuri likiuzwa.

src: She sat down and began to work.
mt: Alikaa na kuanza kufanya kazi.
ref: Akakaa chini na kuanza kufanya kazi.

src: Now we have almost no clean clothes left.
mt: Sasa hatuna vitu vingi vya kawaida vya kufanya kazi.
ref: Sasa hatuna nguo safi zilizosalia.

src: Bob walked along the path and admired the scenery.
mt: Bob alipita kwa njia na kudhani picha.
ref: Bob alitembea njiani na kuvutiwa na mandhari.

src: Meghan and Scott were trying hard to buy tickets.
mt: Meghan na Scott walikuwa wakifanya kazi kwa kujitahidi kupata tiketi.
ref: Meghan na Scott walikuwa wakijaribu kununua tikiti.

src: When he got there, he went to check out his dorm.
mt: Alipokuwa huko, alifika kufanya utafiti wa nyumba yake.
ref: Alipofika hapo, alienda kuangalia bweni lake.

src: One of her running friends recommended an audible book.
mt: Moja ya wenzake wakifurahia runinga alimwambia kuhusu kitabu cha kusikiliza.
ref: Mmoja wa marafiki wake wa kukimbia akapendekeza kitabu cha kusikiliza.

src: She climbed in through the house's window.
mt: Aliingia kwa njia ya pua ya nyumba.
ref: Akapanda na kuingia kwenye nyumba hiyo kupitia dirisha.

src: He was pulled over last night.
mt: Alipigwa kwa kibali jana usiku.
ref: Alisimamishwa jana usiku.

src: After playing, they laid down for bed.
mt: Baada ya kucheza, wakati wa kulala.
ref: baada ya kucheza, walienda kulala.

src: She bought the car and planned the trip on a map.
mt: Aliwachukia gari na kuchambua safari kwenye picha.
ref: Akanunua gari hilo na kupanga safari kwenye ramani.

src: He thought the mountains were so beautiful.
mt: Alimwambia mlima ni kama vile.
ref: Alifikiria milima ilikuwa maridadi sana.

src: Finally a friend introduced Andrew to a nice young lady.
mt: Kwa sasa mpenzi mmoja alimtupa Andrew na dada mwenyeji mwenye umri wa kawaida.
ref: Mwishowe rafiki alimtambulisha Andrew kwa msichana mzuri.

src: She could hear her name over the speaker near her gate.
mt: Alipata jina lake kwa kushika kwa msaada kwenye barabara yake.
ref: Alisikia jina lake kwenye spika karibu na mlango wake.

src: She woke three hours later.
mt: Alijifungua tatu saa baadaye.
ref: Aliamka saa tatu baadaye.

src: Paul was undeterred so he then tried to join the Navy.
mt: Paul alikataa hivyo akafanya kushirikiana na Jeshi la Bahari.
ref: Paul hakuvunjika moyo kwa hivyo akajaribu kujinga na Jeshi la wanamaji.

src: The larger feline stayed close behind.
mt: Kijikokaji kikubwa kulikuwa karibu kwa nyuma.
ref: Paka mkubwa alisalia nyuma yake.

src: He found that Russia was colorful and vibrant.
mt: Aliona kwamba Urusi ni rangari na vitu vikali.
ref: Alipataka kwamba Urusi kulikuwa maridadi na kwenye kusisimua.

src: Mary took one to her friend as a gift.
mt: Mary alitupa mmoja kwa mpenzi wake kama gharama.
ref: Mary alipeleka moja kwa rafiki yake kama zawadi.

src: There was the music video channel or the black entertainment channel.
mt: Kuna namba ya video za muziki au namba ya habari za kibinadamu.
ref: Kulikuwa na kituo cha video ya muziki au kituo cha burudani za watu weusi.

src: I drove there and put on my swim trunks.
mt: Nilikuja hapa na kufanya kama kama.
ref: Niliendesha hadi hapo na kuvua nguo zangu za kuogelea.

src: One day he visited his girlfriend's house.
mt: Juma moja alivisitisha nyumba ya mpenzi wake.
ref: Siku moja alitembelea nyumba ya mpenziwe.

src: Leah applies and the next day get a call for an interview.
mt: Leah anapata nafasi na siku moja baadaye anapewa kikao cha kuangalia.
ref: Leah akatuma ombi na siku iliyofuata akapata simu ya kuhojiwa.

src: I loaded my cart up.
mt: Nilimwagilia kiti changu.
ref: Nikajaza rukwama yangu.

src: After fifteen hours of driving, he was tired.
mt: Baada ya mchakamchakani miaka kumi na tano, alikuwa na uwezo.
ref: Baada ya saa kumi na tano akiendesha gari, alikuwa mchovu.

src: I could not believe I was seeing a Beatle.
mt: Nilikuwa na wasiwasi kuona Beatle.
ref: Singeweza kuamini nilikuwa nikiona Beatle.

src: She decided to hide in her room and call the exterminator.
mt: Aliamua kubaki katika nyumba yake na kufanya kikao na mwenyezi.
ref: Akaamua kujificha chumbani mwake na kumwita mtu wa kuwaangamiza wadudu.

src: He saw dark blinds advertised to block heat.
mt: Aliona mabwepaji ya kijivu ambayo yalivutia kujitetea dhidi ya joto.
ref: Akaona pazia zenye giza zikitangazwa za kuzuia joto.

src: Later, Joey played marbles with friends.
mt: Baadaye, Joey alilala na marabu na wenzake.
ref: Baadaye, Joey alicheza gololi na marafiki.

src: Then the teacher instructed them to hide under their desks.
mt: Baadaye mwalimu alimwambia wote kushika chini ya madarasa.
ref: Kisha mwalimu akawaagiza wajifiche chini ya madawati yao.

src: He needed to replace them.
mt: Alitaka kubadilisha.
ref: Alipaswa kuzibadilisha.

src: I got myself a biking trainer who helped me make progress.
mt: Nilipata mwenyewe mafunzo ya kubwaga ambayo yalihusika katika kufanya mabadiliko.
ref: Nilipata mkufunzi wa baisikeli aliyenisaidia kupiga hatua.

src: First our car broke down and we were stranded in the heat for hours.
mt: Kwanza gari yetu lilipata taka na hatukutembea kwa saa nyingi katika hali ya joto.
ref: Kwanza gari letu liliharibika na tulikwama kwenye jua kwa saa kadhaa.

src: A few days later, my classmate messaged me to ask if I had done it.
mt: Baadaye miaka chache, mwalimu wangu alimkamata kwa kuuliza kama nilifanya.
ref: Siku chache baadaye, mwanafunzi mwenzangu alituma ujumbe akuniuliza ikiwa nimeifanya.

src: Sally is still on edge.
mt: Sally bado anasimama kwa kasi.
ref: Sally bado yuko pembeni.

src: Then, we set to work trying.
mt: Baadaye, tulianza kufanya kazi.
ref: Kisha, tukaanza kujaribu.

src: He pointed to the school janitor, and told Will that was his future.
mt: Alisema kwa mwalimu wa shule, na alisema kwa Will kwamba huyo ndiye mshindi wa siku ile.
ref: Alimwonyesha mlinzi wa shule, na kumwambia Will hiyo ndio itakuwa hatma yake.

src: When the nurse gave her the shot, Emily reached out and hit her.
mt: Japo daktari alimwambia Emily kuchukua dawa, Emily alipata kuchukua na kumwambia.
ref: Muuguzi alipompa chanjo, Emily alinyoosha mkono na kumpiga.

src: We decided to play street hockey since we weren't familiar with it.
mt: Kwa sababu hatukuwa na ujuzi wa mchezo huu, tulikubali kucheza mchezo wa mchezo wa barabara.
ref: Tuliamua kucheza hoki ya mtaani kwani hatukuijua.

src: Every mouse I found was too expensive.
mt: Kila panya niliyopata ilikuwa ghali zaidi.
ref: Kila kipanya nilichokipata kilikuwa ghali sana.

src: She drove back home in order to get it.
mt: Alienda nyumbani ili kupata.
ref: Aliendesha kurudi nyumbani ili kukichukua.

src: We collided and both fell to the ground.
mt: Waliangusha na wote wakapata kwa mabaki.
ref: Tuligongana na wote tukaanguka chini.

src: He found plywood in his garage.
mt: Alifika katika gari lake.
ref: Alipata mbao katika karakana yake.

src: One night, he awoke to a snake in his tent.
mt: Jumamosi, alipokwama, alipata nyoka katika tunda lake.
ref: Usiku mmoja, aliamka nyoka akiwa ndani ya hema lake.

src: He found a desirable posting in one of the ads.
mt: Alipata ajali ya kazi nzuri katika moja ya gazeti.
ref: Alipata chapisho analotaka katika moja ya matangazo.

src: He practiced his cooking and served food for friends.
mt: Alimudu masuala ya kujifungua na kutoa chakula kwa wenzake.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi ya kupika na akaandaa chakula cha marafiki.

src: They had no way to eat their chicken and watermelon.
mt: Wao hawakuna njia ya kula nyama chakage na mafuta ya majani.
ref: Hawakuwa na njia ya kula kuku na tikiti maji.

src: It had snowed so much that school was cancelled.
mt: Kutokana na mvua ya baridi kubwa sana, shule ilikwama.
ref: Kulikuwa na theluji sana hivi kwamba shule ikabatilishwa.

src: Joline could not decide what color nail polish she would like.
mt: Joline hakutambua rangi gani ya nail polish alitaka.
ref: Joline hakuweza kuamua ni rangi gani ya kucha ambayo angependa kuwekwa.

src: He managed to make it all way through without screaming out loud.
mt: Alifika kuelekea mwisho bila kuchimba.
ref: Alifanikiwa kuingia kote bila kupiga kelele kwa sauti kubwa.

src: Then he joined a team in college.
mt: Baadaye alijiunga na timu katika chuo.
ref: Kisha akajiunga na timu chuoni.

src: She asked for the manager but he never bothered to come.
mt: Aliwataka kwa meneja lakini hakuwajibika kufika.
ref: Aliomba kumwona meneja lakini hakujishughulisha kuja.

src: One her 18th birthday she decided to get one.
mt: Yeye alikuwa na umri wa miaka 18, alikuwa akifikiri kufanya nini.
ref: Katika sherehe ya siku yake ya kuzaliwa ya miaka 18, aliamua kuchorwa.

src: She emptied a box of baking soda into a pan.
mt: Aliwaletea kikapu cha soda ya kupika kwenye kikapu.
ref: Akamwaga kisanduku cha soda ya kuoka kwenye sufuria.

src: Rob tried very nice to keep the peace and be nice.
mt: Rob alivyokuwa na uwezo wa kujituma sana kwa kuendesha amani na kuwa mwenye wema.
ref: Rob alijaribu kabisa kudumisha amani na kuwa mzuri.

src: On the way into the house Sharon tripped and fell.
mt: Kwa njia ya nyumbani Sharon alitupwa na kufika.
ref: Wakiwa njiani kwenda kuingia ndani ya nyumba Sharon alijikwaa na kuanguka.

src: He wrote a song about his conversion.
mt: Alimwandikia nyimbo kuhusu kuzingatia.
ref: Aliandika wimbo kuhusu mabadiliko yake.

src: Then she slipped off the sled.
mt: Baadaye alipataa kama kama.
ref: Kisha akateleza.

src: So Steph decided to eat simpler food and smaller portions.
mt: Kwa hivyo Steph aliamua kula chakula kina na majimbo yake.
ref: Kwa hivyo Steph aliamua kula chakula rahisi na sehemu ndogo.

src: One day he was in a very important game.
mt: Yupo siku moja alikuwa katika mchezo mkubwa.
ref: Siku moja alikuwa kwenye mchezo muhimu sana.

src: An usher came and asked Susan to leave the theater.
mt: Usher aliingia na kutoa Susan nje ya kinamata.
ref: Bawabu alikuja na kumwomba Susan aondoke kwenye jumba la sinema.

src: She gave the plant to Desi.
mt: Aliwapa mti Desi.
ref: Alimpa Desi mmea huo.

src: She said her goodbyes and headed home.
mt: Alisema kwa wito na kuelekea nyumbani.
ref: Akamuaga kwaheri na akaelekea nyumbani.

src: He had practiced and his parents came to watch him.
mt: Alimudu na wazazi wake wakati wa kufanya mazoezi.
ref: Alikuwa amefanya mazoezi na wazazi wake walikuja kumtazama.

src: He checked the Almanac to see which plants were safe for the garden.
mt: Alisoma almanakhi ili kupata vyakula vya kudumu vya kwenye shamba.
ref: Alikagua Shajara ya Mwaka ili kuona ni mimea ipi iliyo salama kwa bustani.

src: Bay thought he was going to dump her.
mt: Bay alimwamini kuacha.
ref: Bay alidhania atamuacha.

src: He grumbled but went along.
mt: Alimwambia lakini akapata.
ref: Alinung'unika lakini akawafuata.

src: We couldn't figure out what was wrong at first.
mt: Hatukuweza kuelewa kile kilicho kosa kwanza.
ref: Hatukuweza kujua ni nini kilikuwa kibaya mwanzoni.

src: When she got to Mexico, she was sure to visit many different things.
mt: Alipokwenda Meksiko, alikuwa na shaka ya kufika katika vitu vingi vya kawaida.
ref: Alipofika Mexico, alikuwa na uhakika kwamba atatembea maeneo mengi tofauti.

src: Each Christmas day we found an empty cup and cookie crumbs.
mt: Kila siku ya Krismasi tulipata kikombe cha kawaida na mabaki ya kipapao.
ref: Kila siku ya Krismasi tulipata kikombe tupu na chembe za kuki.

src: She rushed around the house and had no time for breakfast.
mt: Aliwachukia kwa kuzunguka nyumba na hakuna wakati wa kupika chakula.
ref: Alikimbia nje ya nyumba na hakuwa na wakati wa kula kifungua kinywa.

src: They bought the equipment with the grant money.
mt: Waliwapa vifaa na fedha za kipendeleo.
ref: Walinunua vifaa wakitumia pesa ya ruzuku.

src: I was tied with my opponent.
mt: Nilikuwa nimekamilisha na mshambuliaji wangu.
ref: Nilikuwa nimefungwa na mpinzani wangu.

src: He feels bad because he knows the kid will be disappointed.
mt: Anasikitika kwa sababu anajua mtoto atakuwa na hasira.
ref: Anahisi vibaya kwa sababu anajua mtoto atavunjika moyo.

src: He unleashed his police dog.
mt: Alitupa mbwa wake wa polisi.
ref: Alimfungulia mbwa wake wa polisi.

src: Once I found a suitable barber, I dropped by for a cut.
mt: Baada ya kupata barutu bora, nilipata kwa kushika.
ref: Mara tu nilipopata kinyozi kinachofaa, niliendwa kunyolewa.

src: I did a few laps.
mt: Nilifanya mapipa kadhaa.
ref: Nilizunguka mara kadhaa.

src: Ryan and his friend played with birds at the park all day.
mt: Ryan na rafiki yake walicheza na wanyama wadogo katika parki kwa siku nzima.
ref: Ryan na rafiki yake walicheza na ndege kwenye bustani siku nzima.

src: He put his car in the right lane in anticipation.
mt: Alimwagia gari yake katika barabara ya kushoto kwa kujaliwa.
ref: Aliweka gari lake katika njia ya kulia akiwa na matarajio.

src: As she made the toy rattle, Josiah became very interested.
mt: Kama alivyofanya kipaji cha kujenga, Josiah alikuwa na umoja sana.
ref: Alipokuwa akigongesha vifaa vya kuchezea, Josiah alipendezwa sana.

src: I was looking around on facebook and saw a mini pig.
mt: Nilikuwa nikitafuta kwenye facebook na nikitazama kipigiko.
ref: Nilikuwa nikiangalia kwenye facebook na nikaona nguruwe mdogo.

src: The first day of class, everyone was required to sing a song.
mt: Jumanne, kila mtu alipaswa kucheza nyimbo.
ref: Siku ya kwanza darasani, kila mtu alitakiwa kuimba wimbo.

src: However, when prom was approaching, he decided to finally make a move.
mt: Lakini, wakati wa prom alikuwa karibu, alikataa kufanya kile.
ref: Hata hivyo, dansi ya uhitimu ilipokaribia, aliamua hatimaye kuchukua hatua.

src: She studied hard.
mt: Aliyafanya kazi kwa kasi.

src: He called the pizza place and gave them his code.
mt: Alipiga simu ya pizza na kuwapa namba yake.
ref: Alipiga simu mahali pa pizza na kuwapa msimbo wake.

src: He was only of the first people to audition.
mt: Alitakiwa kwanza kati ya watu wote waliotembea.
ref: Alikuwa miongoni mwa watu wa kwanza kufanyiwa majaribio.

src: We ate chocolate.
mt: Tulikula chokole.
ref: Tulikula chokoleti.

src: She thought she'd count the change in her change jar.
mt: Aliamini atakutambua muda wa kuchanganya fedha zake katika kikwao cha fedha.
ref: Alidhani angehesabu chenji kwenye chupa yake ya kubadilisha.

src: I met up with a friend and offered her a ride on my bicycle.
mt: Nilipokutana na mpenzi wangu nilimpa nafasi ya kupanda kwa kiti changu cha pikipiki.
ref: Nilikutana na rafiki wangu na nikampa nafasi kwenye baiskeli yangu.

src: Ahead they could see her house.
mt: Kwa wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao wakati wao

mt: Aliingiza vyote vya kawaida yake kwenye kituo cha kuwasha.
ref: Alibeba nguo zake zote hadi mahali pa kufulia nguo.

mt: Alisema atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi, atakapokuwa anamaliza kufanya kazi
ref: Aliamua kuiba vipokea sauti hivyo vya masikioni.

src: I always keep planning to but something keeps coming up.
mt: Nilikuwa na mpango wa kuwa na kile kile, lakini kitu kile kilikuwa na kitu kile.
ref: Kila wakati napanga mipango lakini kuna kitu kinaendelea kujitokeza.

src: However, one day he decides to tidy up.
mt: Lakini siku moja anamchukua hatua ya kujitayarisha.
ref: Hata hivyo, siku moja akaamua kusafisha.

src: I decided to skip dinner just to have extra time.
mt: Nilikataa chakula cha jioni tu ili kupata muda zaidi.
ref: Niliamua kutokula chakula cha jioni ili nipate muda wa ziada.

src: We asked a stranger to take it for us.
mt: Tulipenda tuwakilie kwa mgeni.
ref: Tuliomba mtu tusiyemjua atupige picha.

src: I picked up a shirt to see if it smelled bad.
mt: Nilipanga kile kile kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi kujua niwezi k
ref: Nilichukua shati ili kuona ikiwa ilikuwa inanukia vibaya.

src: He nearly fell asleep in his bath, and his mother said it was bedtime.
mt: Alimkataza mama yake kufika siku ya kufa, na mama yake alisema ni siku ya kufa.
ref: Karibu alale akioga, na mama yake akasema ilikuwa wakati wa kulala.

src: Their attention was distracted when a huge buck entered the glade.
mt: Ugonjwa ulivunja kwa kujikuta wakati mchanga mkubwa ulingia katika kambi.
ref: Uangalifu wao ulikatizwa wakati dume kubwa aliingia kwenye uwanja.

src: It counts for 50 percent of his grade.
mt: Inaonyesha kwa asilimia 50 ya daraja lake.
ref: Anafaa kupata asilimia 50 katika gredi yake.

src: Finally she met a friend at book club.
mt: Kisha akapata mpenzi wake katika kikundi cha vitabu.
ref: Hatimaye, alikutana na rafiki kwenye kilabu cha vitabu.

src: We got in the car and headed out together.
mt: Wakati huo tulipata gari na tukaribia pamoja.
ref: Tuliingia kwenye gari na tukaenda pamoja.

src: Brittany almost quit gaming but found a girl gaming group on facebook.
mt: Brittany alikuwa karibu kufanya kazi bila kujaliwa, lakini alipata kikundi cha wanawake waliotafuta kujadiliana kuhusu michezo kwenye facebook.
ref: Brittany alikaribia kuacha michezo lakini akapata kikundi cha wasichana cha uchezaji kwenye facebook.

src: There was so much to see and do!
mt: Kuna mengi kujifunza na kufanya!
ref: Kulikuwa na mamabo mengo ya kuona na kufanya!

src: They never said the name of it.
mt: Wao hawakusikiliza jina lake.
ref: Hawakuwahi kusema jina lake.

src: One day, Val was diagnosed with terminal cancer.
mt: Juma moja, Val alitambuliwa na saratani ya kifua kikuu.
ref: Siku moja, Val aligunduliwa kuwa na saratani isiyotibika.

src: I'm surprised I didn't loose my license.
mt: Nilikuwa na wasiwasi kuacha lisensi yangu.
ref: Ninashangaa sikupoteza leseni yangu.

src: Finally David has enough money for his big trip to Oregon.
mt: Kwa sasa David anaweza kuuza pesa yake kwa safari yake kubwa Oregon.
ref: Hatimaye David ana pesa za kutosha za safari yake kubwa ya kwenda Oregon.

src: She was not happy.
mt: Alikuwa hata hivyo.
ref: Hakufutrahi.

src: She helped care for the animals.
mt: Aliwakilisha wanyama.
ref: Alisaidia kuwatunza wanyama.

src: Seth's supervisor announces that the factory has to shut down.
mt: Mkuu wa Seth anatarajia kwamba fari lazima iungane.
ref: Msimamizi wa Seth akangaza kwamba kiwanda kinapaswa kuzima.

src: He came and informed her the fuel pump was out.
mt: Alifika na kuwafundisha yeye kwamba mafuta ya moto yalikuwa yamekata.
ref: Alikuja na akamjulisha kwamba pampu ya mafuta ilikuwa imeharibika.

src: His cigarette was still lit and fell on the floor.
mt: Kitume chake bado lilikuwa linalokwenda na kufukuzwa kwenye kati.
ref: Sigara yake bado ilikuwa imewashwa na ikaanguka sakafuni.

src: While walking into the building he noticed all of the campaign signs.
mt: Alipokuwa anapokwenda ndani ya nyumba aliona vyombo vyote vya kisiasa.
ref: Alipokuwa akitembea kuingia ndani ya jengo hilo aliona ishara zote za kampeni.

src: He inspected it closer and saw he had run over a nail.
mt: Alivuta zaidi na kuona kwamba aliruka kwa kisawasawa.
ref: Alikagua kwa karibu na akaona alikuwa amegonga msumari.

src: Amy found a new apartment for the right price near her job.
mt: Amy alijua nyumba mpya kwa bei ya kutosha karibu na kazi yake.
ref: Amy alipata nyumba mpya kwa bei nafuu karibu na kazi yake.

src: We all wanted it.
mt: Hatukutaka.
ref: Sote tuliitaka.

src: Cathy fell in love with May as soon as she saw her.
mt: Cathy alikuwa na upendo na May wakati akiangalia.
ref: Cathy alimpenda May punde tu alivyomuona.

src: Monica did not have any money to buy her friend a gift.
mt: Monica hakupata pesa yoyezi kupata kilele kwa rafiki yake.
ref: Monica hakuwa na pesa zozote za kumnunulia rafiki yake zawadi.

src: No one was watching him so he made an escape.
mt: Hakuna mtu anayemwamini hivyo alifanya kama hivyo.
ref: Hakuna mtu alikuwa akimtazama kwa hivyo akatoroka.

src: The boy and the girl love each other so much.
mt: Kijana na jike wana upendo mkubwa.
ref: Mvulana na msichana huyo wanapendana sana.

src: I stood in front of the podium while he gave a stirring speech.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepanga chini ya mabara wakati anayemwita.
ref: Nilisimama mbele ya jukwaa alipokuwa akitoa hotuba ya kuchochea.

src: They ate hot dogs and drank soda as well!
mt: Waliwachemsha wienzi na kuichwa soda pia!
ref: Walikula soseji katika mkate na kunywa soda pia!

src: I decided I would go swimming.
mt: Nilichukua neno kwamba nitaenda kwa maji.
ref: Nikaamua nitaenda kuogelea.

src: She went to a coffee shop to rewrite.
mt: Alienda kwenye duka la kahawa ili kufundisha tena.
ref: Alienda kwenye duka la kahawa kuiandika upya.

src: She had been wanting a new desk, so that's what he decided to make.
mt: Aliweza kutaka zaidi zile meza mpya, hivyo alisema ni zile zitakazo kufanyika.
ref: Alikuwa akitaka dawati mpya, kwa hivyo akaamua kuitengeneza.

src: Not even five second later he slammed his hand in the car door.
mt: Kabla ya dakika kumi za kwanza, alimkataza mkono katika kichwa cha gari.
ref: Hata sekunde tano hazikuisha aligonga mkono wake kwenye mlango wa gari.

src: On the weekends, he was tired and grumpy.
mt: Jumamosi, alikuwa na uwezo mdogo na mwenye mawazo mabaya.
ref: Wikendi, alikuwa amechoka na amenuna.

src: More string came but not the end.
mt: Zaidi za nywele ilipata lakini hakuna mwisho.
ref: Kamba zaidi ikatoka lakini sio mwisho.

src: He practiced every day in the basement.
mt: Alifanya kila siku katika chumba cha chini.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi kila siku katika chumba cha chini.

src: Tori's husband was just as excited.
mt: Mke wa Tori alikuwa na hamu kama yake.
ref: Mume wa Tori alisisimka pia.

src: One day she notices the bakery has closed down.
mt: Yupo siku moja anavyoona kifaru cha kuhifadhi kimefungwa.
ref: Siku moja akagundua duka hilo la mikate limefungwa.

src: However, a nice guy named Ralph introduces himself to Rufus one day.
mt: Lakini mwanamume mwenye uwezo mmoja anaitwa Ralph anajitambua Rufus siku moja.
ref: Hata hivyo, mtu mzuri aliyeitwa Ralph akajitambulisha kwa Rufus siku moja.

src: Tom asked for a puppy instead, and his mom suddenly changed her mind.
mt: Tom alipiga kwa kusema anataka mbuzi, mama yake kwa mara moja alibadilisha akili.
ref: Tom akaomba mtoto wa mbwa badala yake, na kwa ghafla mama yake akabadilisha nia yake.

src: One particular bird was acting very territorial.
mt: Kipaji chenye kipimo kikubwa kilikuwa kimefanya kazi kama kipaji cha kijiji.
ref: Ndege mmoja hasa alikuwa akilinda himaya yake sana.

src: Io couldn't find hoops anywhere!
mt: Io hakutambua kwa nini kuna kipande cha kifua kikuu!
ref: Io hakuweza kupata pete mahali popote!

src: We both talked about our love for the Beatles.
mt: Wakati huo wakati wote tulijadili upendo wetu kwa The Beatles.
ref: Tulizungumzia kuhusu tunavyowapenda Beatles.

src: His team played hard.
mt: Kikundi chake kilicheza kwa nguvu.
ref: Timu yake ilicheza kwa bidii.

src: The pain got worse and worse.
mt: Ugonjwa ulikuwa ukimwaga na ukimwaga.
ref: Maumivu yakaendelea kuwa mbaya zaidi.

src: He needed more to read but didn't have money.
mt: Alitaka zaidi kuread kwa kuwa hakuna fedha.
ref: Alihitaji vitabu zaidi vya kusoma lakini hakuwa na pesa.

src: It turns out that they were all broke as well.
mt: Japo wote walikuwa wamekosa.
ref: Kumbe hata hao hawakuwa na pesa pia.

src: I went up and started making small talk.
mt: Nilipokwenda juu na kuanza kujadili habari za kichache.
ref: Nikapanda juu na kuanza kuongea na yeye.

src: Not even an hour after calling in he gets a text.
mt: Kabla ya saa moja ya kwanza kumwambia, anapewa neno.
ref: Hata saa moja haikupita baada ya kupiga simu akapata ujumbe mfupi.

src: Greg fell from the bike as he was pushed to the ground.
mt: Greg alipotea kwa pikipiki kama alivunja kwa kushindwa kwa kushindwa.
ref: Greg akaanguka kutoka kwa baisikeli kwa kuwa alisukumwa.

src: Johnson decides to prove her wrong.
mt: Johnson anataka kubainisha kama hana haki.
ref: Johnson akaamua kumwonyesha amekosea.

src: Meanwhile, Pete found a wallet lying in the bank parking lot.
mt: Kwahiyo, Pete alijua kifungo kilichopatikana katika barabara ya benki.
ref: Wakati huohuo, Pete alipata pochi ikiwa kwenye eneo la maegesho ya gari ya benki.

src: Mary laughed her off and told her that she had many strengths too.
mt: Mary alimkataa na kumwambia kwamba alikuwa na nguvu nyingi pia.
ref: Mary akacheka na kumwambia kwamba ana nguvu nyingi pia.

src: He split his eyebrow open and we worried he had fractured his face.
mt: Alisimama kwa macho yake na tulikuwa na wasiwasi kwamba alikuwa na kifua.
ref: Aligawanya nyusi zake na tulikuwa na wasiwasi alikuwa amevunja uso wake.

src: She has tried cool teething rings, medicines, and gentle soothing tea.
mt: Alivyochukua, alikuwa akifanya kazi za kujaribu, kama vile kipande cha kuchimba, dawa, na chai ya kujaribu.
ref: Alikuwa amejaribu pete za kutuliza meno, dawa, na chai ya kutuliza.

src: I decided to throw them some bread.
mt: Nilikataa kutoa kwa wale mawingu mawili kifua chenye kibichi.
ref: Nikaamua kuwarushia mikate kidogo.

src: He finally took the plunge and bought one.
mt: Alipokata tamaa, akapata moja.
ref: Mwishowe akaamua na kununua moja.

src: Suddenly, a few bats flew down from the darkness above.
mt: Kisha, baadhi ya wadudu wakubwa wakafika chini kutoka juu.
ref: Ghafla, popo wachache wakapaa kutoka kwa giza iliyokuwa juu.

src: Inside, they played with several different guitars.
mt: Kwao, walicheza na vitambaa vingi vya gitaro.
ref: Wakiwa ndani, walicheza gita tofauti.

src: When he went to bed on Thursday he was worried.
mt: Alipokwenda kwa kulala Jumatano alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Alipoenda kitandani Alhamisi alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: She would practice things she learned on the shows.
mt: Alianza kufanya vitu alivyovyonjia katika michezo.
ref: Alijifunza vitu alivyojifunza kwenye maonyesho hayo.

src: I eventually took him in and let him inside, and named him Tokyo.
mt: Kisha kufika nimepata na kuiacha ndani, na kuitoa jina lake Tokyo.
ref: Mwishowe alimchukua na kumruhusu kuingia, na kumpa jina la Tokyo.

src: But none of their vacuums could properly clean it.
mt: Lakini hakuna miongozo yao yalivyoweza kufanya kazi yenyewe.
ref: Lakini hakuna vifyonza vumba vyao vingeweza kuisafisha vizuri.

src: So she decided not to add any sugar.
mt: Kwa hiyo aliamua hawakutumia choo.
ref: Kwa hivyo akaamua kutoongeza sukari yoyote.

src: There, she found an authentic wing restaurant.
mt: Huko, alifika katika restoranti ya wing asili.
ref: Akiwa hapo, alipata mkahawa halisi wa mabawa ya kuku.

src: We would each get to have it one day.
mt: Kila mmoja atakapokuwa na kitu hiki.
ref: Kila mmoja angekuwa nayo kwa siku moja.

src: The plane had a rudder problem and was going down!
mt: Jengo liliwakuta na tatizo la kifua na lilikuwa linalotembea chini!
ref: Ndege hiyo ilikuwa na tatizo la usukani na lilikuwa likienda chini!

src: His parents thought that Joey was an artist because of his odd colors.
mt: Wazazi wa Joey waliona kwamba Joey ni mchongaji kwa sababu ya rangi za kawaida.
ref: Wazazi wake walifikiria kwamba Joey alikuwa msanii kwa sababu ya rangi zake za kipekee.

src: John had always felt comfortable in front of crowds.
mt: John alikuwa na uzoefu wa kuwa na uamuzi wa kujitolea kwa jamii.
ref: John amekuwa akihisi sawa mbele ya umati.

src: Yesterday he bought two tickets,
mt: Jana alipata tiketi mbili,
ref: Jana alinunua tikiti mbili,

src: She looked in the cabinet under the sink hoping to find some.
mt: Aliangalia kichwa cha chombo chini ya chombo la maji kwa sababu alikuwa na wasiwasi kama anaweza kupata kitu.
ref: Akaangalia ndani ya kabati chini ya sinki akitarajia kupata moja.

src: They dropped their yard work, carefully, and washed their hands.
mt: Wakalazimika kufanya kazi zao za kijiji, kwa upatanisho, na kufanya maji yao.
ref: Waliacha kazi yao ya yadi, kwa makini, na kunawa mikono yao.

src: She couldn't split them up!
mt: Alitokana na kuwapo!
ref: Hangeweza kuwatawanya!

src: Jill passed all her tests.
mt: Jill alipata kufaulu kwa kila test yake.
ref: Jill alipita mitihani yake yote.

src: However, he decided to enroll in weekly guitar classes.
mt: Lakini aliamua kufuata masomo ya gitaa kwa wiki.
ref: Hata hivyo, akaamua kujiandikisha kwa masomo ya gita ya kila wiki.

src: Every day, he went looking for new figures for his collection.
mt: Kila siku, alikuwa anapata habari mpya kwa jumuiya yake.
ref: Kila siku, alienda kutafuta wahusika wapya kwa ajili ya mkusanyiko wake.

src: One day she decided to wear a pair of flats to meet her friends.
mt: Moja anayemkuta wenzake alisema atakae na vipande vya kifua.
ref: Siku moja aliamua kuvaa viatu bapa ili akutane na marafiki wake.

src: I would just hide and jump out at people.
mt: Nataka nijitoe na kushambulia watu.
ref: Ningejificha tu na kushtukia watu.

src: Rachel showed the letter to her friends.
mt: Rachel alitoa barua yake kwa wenzake.
ref: Rachel aliwaonyesha marafiki wake barua hiyo.

src: Her husband told her everything would be alright, but Deb wasn't sure.
mt: Mke wake alimwambia yeye yote yatakuwa kama ilivyokuwa, lakini Deb alikuwa si na shaka.
ref: Mumewe alimwambia kila kitu kitakuwa sawa, lakini Deb hakuwa na uhakika.

src: It grew back within a few weeks.
mt: Ilivuka katika miezi kadhaa.
ref: Zilimea tenda baada ya wiki chache.

src: To make matters worse it was rush hour.
mt: Kuwa na habari mbaya, ilikuwa saa ya rush.
ref: Isitoshe, ilikuwa wakati wa msongamano wa magari.

src: Few people walked by and even fewer stopped.
mt: Kwa kawaida watu wengi hawakupita na wengi zaidi hawakubali.
ref: Watu wachache walipita na hata wachache walisimama.

src: The first day he got lost trying to get home from work.
mt: Juma kwanza alikuwa amepoteza njia wakati wa kuenda nyumbani kutoka kazi.
ref: Siku ya kwanza alipotea akijaribu kufika nyumbani kutoka kazini.

src: She was impressed by their size and strength.
mt: Alimwona ukubwa na nguvu zao.
ref: Alivutiwa na ukubwa na nguvu yake.

src: She thought the home was quite small.
mt: Alimwamini kwamba nyumba ilikuwa chini sana.
ref: Alidhani nyumba ilikuwa ndogo sana.

src: Her keys were left on the kitchen table that morning.
mt: Zawili zake zilitolewa kwenye meza ya chakula kama ilivyokuwa asubuhi.
ref: Funguo zake zilikuwa zimeachwa kwenye meza ya jikoni asubuhi hiyo.

src: Underneath all of them was an older letter from my girlfriend.
mt: Kati yao kote ilikuwa barua ya kwanza kutoka kwa mpenzi wangu.
ref: Chini yake kulikuwa na barua ya zamani kutoka kwa mpenzi wangu.

src: Ben realized one day that he was unhappy in his marriage.
mt: Ben alijua siku moja kwamba alikuwa na wasiwasi katika ndoa yake.
ref: Siku moja Ben alitambua kuwa hana furaha katika ndoa yake.

src: Although the duck was unaware of what was happening, it did not blink.
mt: Hata kama nguruvi haikujua nini kina kufanyika, hakikataa.
ref: Ingawa bata hakujua kinachotokea, hakupepesa.

src: Shay eagerly handed over her $40 and suited up.
mt: Shay kwa furaha alitupa fedha yake ya $40 na kufanya kama alivyotaka.
ref: Shay kwa shauku alipeana $40 yake na akavaa.

src: The tour stopped at Stonehenge.
mt: Ziara ilitarajia kufika katika Stonehenge.
ref: Ziara hiyo ilisimama katika Stonehenge.

src: I looked for something to clean the spill.
mt: Nilimwambia kwa nini kuchukua kitu kuchukua kuchukua.
ref: Nikatafuta kitu cha kusafisha yaliyomwagika.

src: All of a sudden the beer ran out.
mt: Kabla ya kuona, bia ilipotea.
ref: Ghafla bia ikaisha.

src: She decides to straighten her hair for the event.
mt: Anamchagua kuchukua mawimbi kwa ajili ya kipindi hicho.
ref: Anaamua kunyoosha nywele zake kwa ajili ya hafla hiyo.

src: The salesman traded Jill's old car for a new car.
mt: Kiongozi wa biashara alibadilisha gari la Jill la kawaida kwa gari la mpya.
ref: Muuzaji huyo aliuza gari la zamani la Jill na kumpa gari jipya.

src: Feeling rushed, he went out and got some flowers and chocolate.
mt: Kwa sababu alikuwa na shida, alipata mafuta na chokole.
ref: Alihisi kana kwamba anakimbizwa, akatoka nje na akanunua maua na chokoleti.

src: He practiced all week long.
mt: Alimudu kwa wiki nzima.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi wiki nzima.

src: When they were there, Quentin and his friend went sailing.
mt: Wakati wao wakakaa huko, Quentin na mpenzi yake waliendesha meli.
ref: Walipokuwa huko, Quentin na rafiki yake walisafiri kwa mashua.

src: The man complained that the pancakes were too thick.
mt: Kiumbe alikataa kwamba kipande cha kuku kilikuwa kikali.
ref: Mtu huyo akalalamika kuwa chapato zake za maji zilikuwa nene sana.

src: We went to our local animal shelter to find our new furry friend.
mt: Kwetu tulipata kwa kushika ndege yetu mpya.
ref: Tulikwenda kwa makazi yetu ya wanyama ya mtaa ili kupata rafiki yetu mpya wa manyoya.

src: My friend came by to help evaluate what is wrong with my plants.
mt: Rafiki yangu alifika kuhakikisha kama nimeona kosa linalosababisha majani yangu kujitupa.
ref: Rafiki wangu alikuja kusaidia kutathmini ni nini kibaya na mimea yangu.

src: Jill took her game controller and threw it at the TV.
mt: Jill alitumia kifurushi chake cha michezo na kutoa kwa televisheni.
ref: Jill alichukua kidhibiti chake cha mchezo na kukitupa katika Televisheni.

src: Unfortunately, it was dark outside.
mt: Kwa hakika, ilikuwa kawaida nje.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, kulikuwa na giza nje.

src: He practiced kicking in the doors of closets to build his strength.
mt: Alimudu kufuta maboti ya makabati ili kujenga nguvu yake.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi ya kupiga mateke kwenye milango ya vyumba ili kuongeza nguvu yake.

src: A website suggested I bake my eggs instead of boil them.
mt: Uwezo wa mtandaoni ulisema nisahau kuchoma mabati na kuchoma.
ref: Tovuti ilipendekeza nioka mayai yangu badala ya kuyachemsha.

src: As he did so, a spitball flew where his head had been.
mt: Kama alivyofanya hivyo, mabatilifu ya kuchimba yalipita wakati wa kufanya hivyo.
ref: Akifanya hivyo, mpira ndogo iliruka mahali ambapo kichwa chake kilikuwa.

src: Finally he finds a good pair of headphones that he can afford.
mt: Kwa sasa anapata kipande cha kichwa cha kutosha ambacho anaweza kujikimu.
ref: Mwishowe anapata vipokea sauti vizuri vya masikioni ambavyo anaweza kugharamia.

src: Finally, he found tickets that were in his price range.
mt: Kwa sasa, alipata tikiti zinazopatikana kwa kiasi chake.
ref: Hatimaye, alipata tikiti ambazo zilikuwa kiasi anachokusudia kulipa.

src: His mom always told him he would grow a tree swallowing seeds.
mt: Mama yake alimwambia kila wakati atakapokua mti atakapokuwa na mizizi.
ref: Mama yake alimwambia kila wakati kuwa atamea mti akimeza mbegu.

src: Angie was very surprised and emailed them.
mt: Angie alikuwa na haba sana na kufanya taarifa kwa barua pepe.
ref: Angie alishangaa sana na akawatumia barua pepe.

src: After school she ran home to ask her Dad for help.
mt: Baada ya shule alirudi nyumbani akawaomba Baba yake kushirikiana.
ref: Baada ya shule alikimbia nyumbani kuomba baba yake msaada.

src: He did not know how to ride a bike.
mt: Alisema hakuwahi kujua kama anaweza kufanya biashara.
ref: Hakujua jinsi ya kuendesha baiskeli.

src: When she tried to pay the man for her milkshake, he smiled at her.
mt: Alipokuwa anataka kulipa dola kwa mwanamume kwa mafuta yake, alimwona.
ref: Alipojaribu kumlipa yule mtu kwa maziwa yake, alimtabasamu.

src: As he was walking away, he saw a little boy crying.
mt: Kama alivyokuwa anapokwenda, aliona mtoto mdogo anamwaga.
ref: Alipokuwa akitembea, alimwona mtoto mdogo akilia.

src: He didn't feel like doing his chores.
mt: Alimwambia kama hakuwa na nia ya kufanya kazi zake.
ref: Hakuhisi ni kama anataka kufanya kazi zake.

src: Rashid offered to drive his brother.
mt: Rashid alikuwa anawasaidia kwa gari.
ref: Rashid alijitolea kuendesha kaka yake.

src: A few days later, Ali found unusual transactions on her card.
mt: Baada muda kidogo, Ali alikuta mabadiliko ya kawaida kwenye kadi yake.
ref: Siku chache baadaye, Ali alipata shughuli zisizo za kawaida kwenye kadi yake.

src: I finally found a beautiful one I loved.
mt: Nilipata mmoja mwenye uwezo wa kuonekana.
ref: Mwishowe nikapata nzuri niliyopenda.

src: All year, I worked very hard.
mt: Kwa mwaka mzima, nilifanya kazi nyingi sana.
ref: Mwaka mzima, nilifanya kazi kwa bidii sana.

src: As soon as she moved in, she went around introducing herself.
mt: Baada ya kufika, alianza kujitambulisha.
ref: Mara tu alipohama, alitembea kotekote akijitambulisha.

src: Dan wished so badly that he could own this train set.
mt: Dan alimwamini sana kama anaweza kuwa mwenye mafunzo haya ya reli.
ref: Dan alitamani sana kwamba angeweza kumiliki seti hii ya gari moshi.

src: She took her mom's purse to the bathroom.
mt: Aliingiza kofia ya mama yake katika vyumba vya kuhifadhi.
ref: Alichukua mkoba wa mama yake akaenda bafuni.

src: He decided he needed to move.
mt: Alisema alitaka kubadilisha mahali.
ref: Aliamua anahitaji kuhama.

src: He studied hard and asked for extra credit.
mt: Alifundisha kwa kasi na akakusudia kwa kipato cha kibinafsi.
ref: Alisoma kwa bidii na akaomba sifa ya ziada.

src: While she was looking, one of the cats meowed at her.
mt: Kabla hajakwama, mmoja kati ya kipanya chakula kikimwimbi.
ref: Alipokuwa akitafuta, mmoja wa mapaka alitoa sauti ya meow.

src: As I did a round off flipping off the beam, I landed wrong.
mt: Kama nilivyofanya kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kipindi cha kifua kifuani, nilipata kip
ref: Nilipokuwa nikizunguka kwenye mhimili, nikaanguka vibaya.

src: Each of my daughters picked out a different pup.
mt: Kila mmoja wa watoto wangu alipanga pupu moja.
ref: Kila binti yangu alichagua mbwa tofauti.

src: Finally the day had arrived, Johnny moved to Idaho.
mt: Kwa sasa siku ilikuwa imefika, Johnny alikuwa amemaliza kuhamia Idaho.
ref: Hatimaye siku ilikuwa imefika, Johnny alihamia Idaho.

src: This year on her way home she was in a car accident.
mt: Kwa mwaka huu alikuwa katika ajali ya gari wakati wa kuenda nyumbani.
ref: Mwaka huu akienda nyumbani alipata ajali ya gari.

src: I've decided to join an online dating community.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechagua kujiunga na jamii ya kudumu ya kujadili.
ref: Nimeamua kujiunga na jamii ya urafiki mtandaoni.

src: My wife went as a chaperone.
mt: Mke wangu alikuwa kama mwenye kuhudhuria.
ref: Mke wangu alienda kama mtunza mwari.

src: As we got in the club it was beautiful.
mt: Kama tulipofika ndege ilikuwa nzuri.
ref: Tulipofika kwenye kilabu kilikuwa kizuri.

src: The glass shattered.
mt: Vitaji vikavunja.
ref: Glasi ilivunjika.

src: One day a tornado was going through the area.
mt: Juma moja tornado alikuwa kwenye eneo hilo.
ref: Siku moja kimbunga kilikuwa kinapita eneo hilo.

src: She went inside and couldn't understand how the books were sorted.
mt: Aliingia ndani na hakuona jinsi vitabu vilivyopanga.
ref: Aliingia ndani na hakuweza kuelewa jinsi vitabu vilikuwa vilipangwa.

src: He practiced catching the football at home all week.
mt: Alimudu kulaani mpira nyumbani kwa wiki nzima.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi ya kukamata mpira wa miguu nyumbani wiki nzima.

src: She fed him but still he did not sleep.
mt: Aliwachia chakula lakini bado hakuwacha.
ref: Alimlisha lakini bado hakulala.

src: He took his kids to a water park.
mt: Alimtupa watoto wake katika mabwawa.
ref: Aliwapeleka watoto wake kwenye bustani ya maji.

src: She felt her art teacher's hand on her shoulder.
mt: Alijua mkeke wa kijamii alikuwa ameketi kando yake.
ref: Alihisi mkono wa mwalimu wake wa sanaa begani mwake.

src: He was nervous if he would win or not.
mt: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kama atakaposhinda au hatakuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi iwapo atashinda au kushindwa.

src: The interviewer seemed to be impressed with Mark's answers.
mt: Utafiti alikuwa na uangalifu kwa majibu ya Mark.
ref: Mhojaji huyo alionekana amefurahishwa na majibu ya Mark.

src: However, Elaine did not know where she wanted to eat.
mt: Lakini Elaine haikujua wapi alitaka kula.
ref: Walakini, Elaine hakujua alipotaka kula.

src: It made him feel good about his academic achievements.
mt: Kutokana na kile, alikuwa na ujuzi juu ya mafanikio yake ya kisomo.
ref: Ilimfanya ahisi vizuri kuhusu mafanikio yake ya kitaaluma.

src: They went to 4 more, drinking 3 shots in each.
mt: Wakati wao wakapita 4, wakalipwa 3 shot kwa kila moja.
ref: Walienda kwa 4 zaidi, wakinywa gilasi 3 kwa kila mmoja.

src: One of Bindu's friends brought samosas and doogh.
mt: Moja kati ya marafiki wa Bindu alibeba samosa na doogh.
ref: Rafiki mmoja wa Bindu alileta samosa na mkate.

src: Tyler is worried he will miss the bus.
mt: Tyler anasikitika atakapokuwa na bus.
ref: Tyler ana wasiwasi atakosa basi.

src: His doctor told him that his cholesterol levels were a little bit high.
mt: Wakati wa kuzungumza na daktari yake, alitupwa kwamba chakula chake kimepata chakula kikubwa.
ref: Daktari wake alimwambia kwamba viwango vyake vya kolesteroli vilikuwa juu kidogo.

src: Slowly she creaked open the door and peered outside.

mt: Nilisikia kwa kawaida na nilikuwa na hasira.

src: They marked their sightings in a notebook.
mt: Waliandika kwa kichwa kwa kichwa katika kitabu.
ref: Waliweka alama zao walizoona katika daftari.

src: On his first day a little boy dropped his ice cream on the floor.
mt: Jana, kijana alikuwa akifanya kazi yake ya kwanza, alipata kulegea chakula chake cha kawaida.
ref: Siku yake ya kwanza mvulana mdogo aliangusha aiskrimu yake sakafuni.

src: She grabbed her things and waited at the door for Tami.
mt: Aliipata vitu vyake na akawa kwa muda kwa Tami.
ref: Alichukua vitu vyake na akasubiri Tami mlangoni.

src: They then packed up everything else.
mt: Baadaye wakapakia vitu vyote vingine.
ref: Kisha wakafunganya kila kitu kingine.

src: She scoured the beach all morning.
mt: Aliangalia bahari kwa mchana wote.
ref: Alizunguka pwani asubuhi yote.

src: Everything went well until the evening.
mt: Kila kitu kulikuwa kama ilivyokuwa hadi jioni.
ref: Kila kitu kiliendelea vizuri hadi jioni.

src: He had stirred up a bee's nest.
mt: Alimwasha mabwawa ya wadudu.
ref: Alikuwa amevuruga kiota cha nyuki.

src: He decided he needed to rake them all up.
mt: Alisema alitaka kuchimba wote.
ref: Aliamua alihitaji kuyaokota yote.

src: His hard work paid off and he earned a spot in a popular contest.
mt: Kazi yake kubwa ilisaidia na akapata nafasi katika mashindano ya kisikii.
ref: Kazi yake ngumu ilileta matokeo mazuri na akapata nafasi katika mashindano maarufu.

src: Unfortunately, someone bumped into him.
mt: Kwa hakika, mtu mmoja alimwamini.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, mtu alimgonga.

src: She played hard and gave it her all.
mt: Aliicheza kwa nguvu na kutoa yote yake.
ref: Alicheza kwa bidii na akajitolea kabisa.

src: They were afraid their mom would get angry at them.
mt: Walikuwa wakiongoza wao kwa sababu wakikuwa na wasiwasi kwamba mama yao atakuwa na hasira naye.
ref: Waliogopa mama yao atawakasirikia.

src: He decided to write a song to her.
mt: Alisema atakapendelea kuandika nyimbo kwa yeye.
ref: Akaamua kumwandikia wimbo

src: Gloria decided to pick some of her own flowers from the garden.
mt: Gloria aliamua kupika sehemu ya mitaala yake kutoka kwa bweni.
ref: Gloria aliamua kuchukua maua yake mwenyewe kutoka kwa bustani.

src: One day, someone challenged him to a contest.
mt: Jana, mtu mmoja alimwambia kujaribu.
ref: Siku moja, mtu fulani alimpa changamoto katika shindano.

src: Lauren begins a challenging exercise regimen.
mt: Lauren anatumia mbinu za kushughulikia kazi za kushindwa.
ref: Lauren anaanza kufanya mazoezi magumu.

src: It took 9 hours to fly there.
mt: Ilipigwa 9 saa kutoka hapa.
ref: Ilichukua muda wa saa 9 kusafiri huko kwa ndege.

src: He decided to find a way to cool off.
mt: Alisema atakapofika kwenye barabara atakapokuwa na njia ya kupuliza.
ref: Akaamua kutafuta njia ya kutulia.

src: He wanted to join a church choir but thought his friends would laugh.
mt: Alitaka kujiunga na kundi la wimbo wa kanisa lakini alitaka wenzake wakijua wakilazimika.
ref: Alitaka kujiunga na kwaya ya kanisa lakini akafikiria marafiki wake wangemchekelea.

src: He really didn't want two to be honest.
mt: Alimwambia kwamba hakutaka wawili kwa kweli.
ref: Kwa kweli hakutaka kuwa na wawili.

src: Their in front me was a 4 foot snake with beady eyes.
mt: Kwa mimi kwa mbele yangu ilikuwa nyoka ya 4 futi na macho mabebu.
ref: Hapo mbele yangu kulikuwa na nyoka wa futi 4 na macho makali.

src: She went to a drive through coffee place.
mt: Alienda kwenye barabara ya kupakana kwa chai.
ref: Alienda mahali pa kuagiza mkahawa ukiwa ndani ya gari.

src: After work one day Bill decided to join some coworkers for drinks.
mt: Baada ya kazi mmoja siku Bill aliamua kujiunga na wafanyabiashara wengine kwa pikipiki.
ref: Siku moja baada ya kazi Bill akaamu kujiunga na baadhi ya wafanyakazi wenza kwa vinywaji.

src: After he graduated with his degree, he changed his mind.
mt: Baada ya kufaulu na daraja lake, alibadilisha akili.
ref: Baada ya kuhitimu na digrii yake, akabadilisha nia.

src: One day, he decided to spend his last dollar on the lotto.
mt: Jana, alisema kuzingatia fedha yake ya mwisho kwenye lotto.
ref: Siku moja, akaamua kutumia dola yake ya mwisho akicheza lotto.

src: The water remained cold.
mt: Maji yalibaki baridi.
ref: Maji yalisalia baridi.

src: She tried to find fellow big band lovers.
mt: Alivyopata kujifungua, alikwenda kujifungua kwa wale wanaoahidiwa na big band.
ref: Akajaribu kuwatafuta watu wengine wanaopenda bendi kubwa.

src: But one place I wanted to go was the White House.
mt: Lakini mengine yangu niliyotaka kufika ni White House.
ref: Lakini eneo moja nililotaka sana kwenda lilikuwa ikulu ya White House.

src: His niece lives in NYC.
mt: Jirani yake anayemiliki nyumba huko NYC.
ref: Mpwa wake anaishi NYC.

src: When she got on stage she was shaking.
mt: Alipokwenda kwenye uwanja alikuwa akimwaga.
ref: Alipofika uwanjani alikuwa akitetemeka.

src: They were watching Aladdin tonight.
mt: Wanawake waliwachukia Aladdin leo.
ref: Walikuwa wakitazama Aladdin usiku wa leo.

src: She told me I could come in at any time.
mt: Aliwambia nikuwe na nimekuwa na nafasi yoyote.
ref: Akaniambia ninaweza kwenda wakati wowote.

src: Then he remembered an alfredo sauce recipe made with cashews.
mt: Baadaye alikumbuka tarifa ya alfredo ya kipande cha kuni.
