ref: Kisha akakumbuka mapishi ya mchuzi ya alfredo yaliyotengenezwa kwa korosho.

src: One day, he saw a raccoon in the mall.
mt: Juma moja, aliona kiboko katika mabati.
ref: Siku moja, aliona rakuni kwenye jengo hilo lenye maduka mengi.

src: When his turn came, Johnny got mad when he saw only one color left.
mt: Kwao, Johnny alijivunia wakati wake ulipotokea, wakati aliona rangi moja tu ilibaki.
ref: Zamu yake ilipofka, Johnny akakasirika alipoona rangi moja ndio ilikuwa imesalia pekee.

src: He talked to all three of them to see who liked him more.
mt: Alieleza na wote wawili wao ili kujua aliyemwona zaidi.
ref: Aliongea na wote watatu kuona ni nani aliyempenda zaidi.

src: They searched the location where the Geocache was supposed to be.
mt: Walifika mahali ambapo Geocache ilikuwa inakaribia.
ref: Walitafuta eneo ambalo Geocache lilipaswa kuwa.

src: Brigid's father could only afford to buy her a used upright piano.
mt: Baba wa Brigid alikosa kujenga piano kwa Brigid, bali alikupa piano kipya.
ref: Baba ya Brigid angeweza tu kumudu kunua piano iliyotumika.

src: He looked at big guns and little guns.
mt: Alisoma kwa makini kwa nguvu kubwa na nguvu ndogo.
ref: Aliangalia bunduki kubwa na bunduki ndogo.

src: She went to the beach at Montauk Point.
mt: Alienda kwenye mchanga wa Montauk Point.
ref: Alienda ufuoni mwa Montauk Point.

src: However, he ended up falling asleep.
mt: Lakini alipofika, alipata kujifungua.
ref: Hata hivyo, aliishia kulala.

src: She was ecstatic.
mt: Alimwambia kwa furaha.
ref: Alifurahi sana.

src: She hadn't moved it in over four Year's.
mt: Aliyekuwa amekataza kuchukua kwa zaidi ya miaka minne.
ref: Hakuwa amekibadilisha kwa zaidi ya miaka minne.

src: The man tracked her down to my house one cold, dark night.
mt: Kiumbe huo alikuta kwa mimi nyumbani kwenye usiku mrefu na mawimbi.
ref: Mtu huyo alimfuata hadi kwa nyumba yangu usiku mmoja wenye baridi.

src: They decided to end things amicably.
mt: Wakakubali kufanya vitendo vyao vyenye uhusiano.
ref: Wakaamua kuachana kwa amani.

src: She really wanted a little sister, but not a brother!
mt: Alitaka sana ndugu mdogo, lakini si mwanamume!
ref: Alitaka sana kuwa na dada mdogo, lakini sio ndugu!

src: The Dares got progressively more elaborate as the day wore on.
mt: Darasa liliendelea kupanuka kama siku ilivyokuwa.
ref: Thubutu zikaendelea kuwa dhahiri zaidi huku siku ikiendelea.

src: He was unable to brush his teeth!
mt: Alitokana kwa kuchimba zile zile!
ref: Hakuweza kusugua meno yake!

src: After she had finished that, she wrote a book report.
mt: Baada ya kufikia hapo, aliandika ripoti ya kitabu.
ref: Baada ya kumaliza hiyo, aliandika ripoti ya kitabu.

src: As he grew older his love for comics grew.
mt: Kama alivyoongoka upendo wake kwa komiksi ulivuka.
ref: Huku akiendelea kuwa mkubwa ndivyo upendo wake wa vitabu vya vibonzo uliendelea kukua.

src: One day he saw a bat in his bathroom.
mt: Juma moja aliona kibati katika bafu yake.
ref: Siku moja aliona papa bafuni mwake.

src: Mary noticed Annabelle's great singing voice.
mt: Mary alikuta Annabelle na kikundi cha nyimbo kikubwa.
ref: Mary aligundua sauti nzuri ya kuimba ya Annabelle.

src: Uki screamed in pain!
mt: Uki alimkataa kwa nguvu!
ref: Uki alipiga kelele kwa uchungu!

src: For one week, no one gave him money.
mt: Kwa mmoja tu, hakuna mtu aliyemshukuru fedha.
ref: Kwa wiki moja, hakuna yeyote aliyempa pesa.

src: The first returned with a worn boot.
mt: Ali kwanza alirudi na kipande cha kipande cha kipande.
ref: Mmoja alirudi na kiatu kilichochakaa.

src: Bill sets the table and puts on some background music.
mt: Bill anajaza meza na kufungua muziki wa kichwa.
ref: Bill akaanda meza na kuweka muziki wa chinichini.

src: She bought him food and gave him messages.
mt: Aliwapa chakula na kutoa barua.
ref: Alimnunulia chakula na kumpa ujumbe.

src: When they were 13 Year's old, Jakels family moved away.
mt: Wakati wao waliwa umri wa miaka 13, familia ya Jakel ilivamia.
ref: Walipokuwa na umri wa miaka 13, familia ya Jakels ilihama.

src: So we decided to divide and conquer.
mt: Kwa hiyo tumekuwa tunajadili kuhusu kufanya kazi kwa kushirikiana.
ref: Kwa hivyo tukaamua kuwatenganisha ili kuwashinda.

src: The instructor was patient when Amy couldn't get the hang of it.
mt: Kabla hajawahi kufika, Amy alikuwa na shida kujifunza.
ref: Mkufunzi alikuwa mtulivu wakati Amy hangeweza kujizuia.

src: He worked hard on it all spring.
mt: Ali kazi kwa kila siku za mchana.
ref: Alifanya kazi kwa bidii majira yote ya kuchipua.

src: No matter how hard he tried, he found himself daydreaming.
mt: Kwani anavyojaribu kila mara, anapata kuwaza.
ref: Haijalishi alivyojaribu sana, alijipata akiota mchana.

src: The stories were funny and interesting.
mt: Hadithi zilikuwa na mawazo na mazungumzo.
ref: Hadithi hizo zilikuwa za kuchekesha na za kuvutia.

src: She asks her boss if she can go home for the day.
mt: Anasema kwa mkuu wake kama anaweza kuenda nyumbani kwa siku moja.
ref: Akamuuliza bosi wake kama anaweza kwenda nyumbani kwa siku hiyo.

src: She went to the closest store but couldn't find a bed she liked.
mt: Alienda kwa kasi kwa duka la karibu lakini hakutambua kitanda kilichoachilia.
ref: Akaenda kwenye duka lililo karibu lakini hakuweza kupata kitanda alichokipenda.

src: He considered going back to school, but decided against it.
mt: Alisikitishia kujifungua tena, lakini alisahau.
ref: Akazingatia kurudi shuleni, lakini akaamua kutofanya hivyo.

src: Today Lizzy wanted to pick her own bananas.
mt: Leo Lizzy alitaka kupika mboga zake mwenyewe.
ref: Leo Lizzy alitaka kuchukua ndizi zake mwenyewe.

src: I rode on the bus as it went all over suburban Boston.
mt: Nilipanda basi kama ilivyo kwa kila sehemu ya Boston.
ref: Nilipanda basi hilo lilipokuwa likisafiri kila mahali katika Viunga vya Boston.

src: He finally went to the doctor and he found out he had poison ivy.
mt: Alifika kwa mwandishi na akafika akawa na kifua kikuu.
ref: Mwishowe alienda kumwona daktari na ikapatikana kwamba ni mmea wenye simu.

src: They would always play one on one.
mt: Wao wakati wote waliigana moja kwa moja.
ref: Kila wakati wangecheza mmoja kwa mmoja.

src: The girls had a ton of fun.
mt: Wanawake walikuwa na nafasi nyingi za mazungumzo.
ref: Wasichana hao walifurahi sana.

src: While at the gym she did arms and abs.
mt: Alivyokuwa katika gym alifanya vipepeo na viwango.
ref: Akifanya mazoezi alifanya za mikono na tumbo.

src: Unfortunately, she lost her job and eventually, her home.
mt: Kwa hakika, alipoteza kazi yake na hatimaye nyumba yake.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, alipoteza kazi yake na mwishowe, nyumba yake.

src: Together, they peeled and cleaned the apples.
mt: Wakati wao wakawili na kuchimba machungu.
ref: Kwa pamoja, waliyabambua na kusafisha matofaa hayo.

src: He brought all his chance and bought the sucker.
mt: Alifanya kila kitendo na kupata mnyonge.
ref: Alileta pesa zake zote zilizosalia na kununua peremende.

src: When he got there, he saw gorgeous old castles.
mt: Alipokuwa huko, aliona nyumba za kihistoria za kike.
ref: Alipofika hapo, aliona kasri nzuri za zamani.

src: He worked very hard and saved up all his money.
mt: Alifanya kazi kwa nguvu na kushinda kila pesa yake.
ref: Alifanya kazi kwa bidii sana na kuweka akiba ya pesa zake zote.

src: Something went wrong and one of the safety harnesses snapped.
mt: Kitu kilikuwa kibaya na moja kati ya kifungo cha usalama lilibanwa.
ref: Shida ilitokea na mojawapo ya kamba za usalama ilitoka.

src: He rarely showed up on time.
mt: Anajitahidi kushika wakati.
ref: Ilikuwa nadra kwake kufika kwa wakati unaofaa.

src: She studied very hard.
mt: Aliyafanya kazi kwa ufanisi.
ref: Alisoma kwa bidii sana.

src: It took me over 8 hours to get all of the stuff into my apartment.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechafua zaidi ya saa 8 kwa kufanya kila kitu kwenye nyumba yangu.
ref: Ilinichukua zaidi ya saa 8 kuhamisha vitu vyote kwenye nyumba yangu ya ghorofa.

src: One day Hailey's mom got in an argument with one of the other moms.
mt: Moja siku mama ya Hailey alikuwa na mjadala na mmoja wa wale wanaume.
ref: Siku moja mama ya Hailey alijipata akibishana na mmoja wa mama wengine.

src: To this day he keeps peppermints in his cupboards.
mt: Kwa sasa anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku hizi anauwezo kwa siku
ref: Hadi wa leo yeye huweka minanaa kwenye makabati yake.

src: One day, they were all going down a challenging slope.
mt: Jana, wote walikuwa wakipita kwenye mlima kama huu.
ref: Siku moja, walikuwa wote wakiteleza chini kwenye mteremko wenye changamoto.

src: When she wasn't in class, she studied very hard.
mt: Alipokuwa hawaruhusu kufanya kazi, alifundisha kwa kasi sana.
ref: Wakati hayumo darasani, alisoma kwa bidii sana.

src: They had lunch at the mall.
mt: Walifika chakula katika mabazarini.
ref: Wakakula chakula cha mchana kwenye jengo hilo lenye maduka mengi.

src: He decided he needed a case to protect his phone.
mt: Alisema alitaka kifungua kwa ajili ya simu yake.
ref: Akaamua anahitaji mfuko wa kulinda simu yake.

src: At the stop there was a gas station and a Burger King.
mt: Katika kifurushi kuna kituo cha mafuta na Burger King.
ref: Katika kituo hicho kulikuwa na kituo cha mafuta na Burger King.

src: The woman who was on the other line was unfamiliar to me.
mt: Msichana ambaye alikuwa kwenye barabara nyingine ilikuwa isiyotambulika kwangu.
ref: Mwanamke aliyekuwa upande ule mwingine hakuwa mtu ninayemjua.

src: Even her last customer was mad and it wasn't even her fault.
mt: Japo mpenzi mwisho alikuwa na furaha na hata hivyo si kwa sababu yake.
ref: Hata mteja wa mwisho alikasirika na haikuwa makosa yake.

src: Alec bought blocks with letters on them.
mt: Alec alibuni mablock na heri za kifupi.
ref: Alec alinunua bloki zenye herufi.

src: I killed him while he slept.
mt: Nilimwua wakati anamwaga.
ref: Nikamuua alipokuwa amelala.

src: He asked his parents if they had any.
mt: Alisema kwa wazazi wake kama wanao.
ref: Akawauliza wazazi wake kama walikuwa na yoyote.

src: She made delicious fruit and vegetable smoothies.
mt: Aliyafanya mafuta na mizizi ya mimea na vyakula vya nyanya.
ref: Alitengeneza sharubati tamu ya matunda na mboga.

src: He said that her skills aren't good enough to make the team.
mt: Alisema kwamba uwezo wake hauwezi kufanya kikundi.
ref: Alisema kwamba ujuzi wake hautoshi kukubaliwa kwenye timu.

src: She realized she had forgotten her wallet at home.
mt: Alijua kuwa alikuwa ameacha kadi yake nyumbani.
ref: Akagundua alikuwa amesahau pochi yake nyumbani.

src: Her boss informed her it would be on her next check.
mt: Mwanaume wake alimwambia kwamba itakuwa kwenye kadi yake ya kustaafu.
ref: Bosi wake akamfahamisha liitakuwa kwenye hundi lake linalofuata.

src: She made progress, but not quickly.
mt: Aliimarisha, lakini bila kasi.
ref: Aliendelea vizuri, lakini sio kwa haraka.

src: His friends threw a party on the beach after the sun went down.
mt: Wamkamantaki wamemkamata kwenye pwani baada ya mwezi kufika.
ref: Marafiki wake wakapanga sherehe ufuoni baada ya jua kutua.

src: He wasn't hurt but his outfit was ruined.
mt: Alisahau lakini nguo yake ilikuwa ikitupwa.
ref: Hakuumia lakini nguo yake iliharibika.

src: One day, a stranger tells him that he should smile more.
mt: Juma moja, mmoja anamwambia kwamba alitakiwa kushikwa zaidi.
ref: Siku moja, mtu mgeni akamwambia anapaswa kutabasamu zaidi.

src: He struck and injured a jogger who crossed the road.
mt: Alisababisha na kudharau mwanamziki ambaye alipita kwenye barabara.
ref: Akamgonga na kumuumizi mkimbiaji aliyekuwa akivuka barabara.

src: To express his individuality he wore a skirt on stage.
mt: Kwa ajili ya kujitambua kama mmoja, alivaa kanzu kwenye uwanja.
ref: Ili kuonyesha utu wake alivaa sketi jukwaani.

src: I went to the store and bought decorations.
mt: Nilipita katika duka na kupata zana za kuzingatia.
ref: Nikaenda dukani na kununua mapambo.

src: I have worked very hard to earn this promotion.
mt: Nilikuwa nimevumilia kwa kazi kubwa ili kupata hii kipindi.
ref: Nimefanya kazi kwa bidii sana kupata cheo hiki.

src: She made glycerin soap in a big pot on her kitchen stove.
mt: Aliyafanya sabuni ya glyserini katika poti kubwa kwenye moto ya chakula cha nyumbani.
ref: Alitengeneza sabuni ya glisirini ndani ya chungu kikubwa kwenye stovu yake ya jikoni.

src: They got a tip to check behind the library.
mt: Wakati wakapata tipi ya kufanya uchunguzi kwa nyuma ya maktaba.
ref: Wakapata kidokezo cha kuangalia nyuma ya maktaba.

src: Pat makes flashcards to read on the bus.
mt: Pat anafanya kadhaa za kupima ili anielewe kwa kufika kwenye bus.
ref: Pata alitengeneza kadi za kusoma kwenye basi.

src: She had envisioned herself cooking a fantastic meal.
mt: Aliamini kuwa anajifanya kujifungua chakula cha kipindukizi.
ref: Alikuwa amejiona akipika chakuli kizuri.

src: At a job interview, the interviewer praised his name.
mt: Katika mkutano wa kazi, mwenyezi alimwambia kuhusiana na jina lake.
ref: Katika mahojiano ya kazi, mhoji alisifu jina lake.

src: Yet today when she went shopping, she ended up losing it.
mt: Lakini leo alipokuwa anashop, alipata kushindwa.
ref: Ilhali leo alipokuwa akinunua vitu, aliipoteza.

src: I decided to buy him tickets to Star Wars.
mt: Nilichagua kupata kwa yeye tiketi za Star Wars.
ref: Nikaamua kumnunulia tikiti za Star Wars.

src: Ben was too lazy to wash a dish and but the food on a dirty one.
mt: Ben alikuwa na ulezi wa kuchimba chakula na kumnywia kwenye chakula cha kawaida.
ref: Ben alikuwa mvivu sana kuosha vyombo na akaweka chakula kwa chombo kichafu.

src: Luckily she was alright.
mt: Naam, alikuwa bora.
ref: Kwa bahati nzuri alikuwa sawa.

src: They both applied to Cornell and planned to room together.
mt: Wawili wote walikuwa wameomba kuingia Chuo Kikuu cha Cornell na kuwa na nyumba moja.
ref: Wote walituma maombi Cornell na wakapanga kushiriki chumba kimoja.

src: We found her on the floor when we woke up in the morning.
mt: Kutokana na kuwepo kwa mchakato wa kufanya kazi, tulipata kwa kushindwa kufanya kazi.
ref: Tulimpata sakafuni tulipoamka asubuhi.

src: She had fed a small goat before feeding the cow.
mt: Aliwachemsha mbuzi mdogo kabla ya kuchemsha ng'ombe.
ref: Alikuwa amelisha mbuzi mdogo kabla ya kulisha ngombe.

src: She ran away to get married and did not keep in contact.
mt: Alihama kwa ajili ya kuoa na hakuendelea kufanya ushirikiano.
ref: Alitoroka ili kuolewa na hakuwasiliana.

src: She wanted her hair cut by a celebrity stylist.
mt: Alitaka kufanywa kwa mchunguzi wa kujitegemea.
ref: Alitaka nywele yake kukatwa na msusi wa watu mashuhuri.

src: He was amazed at the busy capital city.
mt: Alimwona mji mkuu wa kawaida.
ref: Alishangazwa na jinsi mji mkuu ulikuwa na shughuli.

src: The gate looked low enough to jump.
mt: Bara lilikuwa chini kiasi cha kupanda.
ref: Mlango huo ulionekana uko chini kuweza kuruka.

src: When I got into the theater, I was so excited I almost couldn't move.
mt: Japo nilikuwa nimeingia katika kinamama, nilikuwa na shauku sana nilikuwa hata hawakubali nikuweze kufika.
ref: Nilipofika katika ukumbi wa filamu, nilisisimka sana karibu nishindwe kutembea.

src: I went to the store after reading some reviews.
mt: Nilipata kwenye duka baada ya kusoma maelezo.
ref: Nilienda dukani baada ya kusoma maoni kadhaa.

src: He thinks of his stamp collection.
mt: Anasikitika kuhusu kundi lake cha tamani.
ref: Anafikiria kuhusu mkusanyiko wake wa stampu.

src: They were in the same unit and were deployed together.
mt: Walikuwa katika kikundi moja na wakati mmoja waliingizwa kwenye kazi.
ref: Walikuwa katika kitengo kimoja na wakatumwa vitani pamoja.

src: He showed me where to sit.
mt: Alinipa neno kama nilivyotaka.
ref: Akanionyesha mahali pa kukaa.

src: He would play them all the time.
mt: Alitumia kila wakati.
ref: Alizicheza kila wakati.

src: It had all kinds of food from all over the world.
mt: Imeonyesha vyakula vya kila aina kutoka nchi zote duniani.
ref: Ilikuwa na vyakula vya aina yote kutoka kote duniani.

src: He got up too high and fell.
mt: Alisonga juu zaidi na kufa.
ref: Alienda juu sana na kuanguka.

src: Then she ordered Chinese takeout.
mt: Baadaye aliamua kupata chakula cha China.
ref: Kisha akaagiza chakula cha Kichina.

src: The meal was going well until she took a bite of what she had made.
mt: Chakula lilikuwa kama kawaida mpaka alikula neno lililochokaa.
ref: Chakula kilikuwa kikiendelea vizuri hadi alipouma kile alichokuwa amekitengeneza.

src: We baked cookies, decorated the house and went shopping together.
mt: Tulitengeneza kifamani, tukatunza nyumba na tukafanya biashara pamoja.
ref: Tukatengeneza biskuti, tukapamba nyumba na tukaenda kununua vitu pamoja.

src: When the trash was taken to the landfill, the squirrel was gone!
mt: Kwenda kwenye mchakacho, kuniwakilishi alipotea!
ref: Wakati takataka zilipelekewa katika sehemu zilizojazwa takataka, kindi huyo alipotea!

src: Tom was excited to give the gift to Rob.
mt: Tom alikuwa na hamu ya kupa hongo kwa Rob.
ref: Tom alisisimka kumpa Rob zawadi hiyo.

src: She pushed harder than she ever had to catch the other swimmers.
mt: Aliingiza zaidi kuliko alivyotaka kuchukua wale wanaotembea.
ref: Akatia bidii sana ili kuwafikia waogeleaji wengine.

src: Then he noticed something odd.
mt: Baadaye aliona kitu kipya.
ref: Kisha akagundua kitu tofauti.

src: He fretted over it for days.
mt: Alisikitika kuhusu hicho kwa siku nyingi.
ref: Akahangaika kwa siku kadhaa.

src: He eventually got pulled over again.
mt: Alipata kufutwa tena.
ref: Mwishowe alisimamishwa tena.

src: He heard the birds sing, the wind blow and the crickets creak.
mt: Alisikia wanyama wadudu wakisimama, anga kufurika na kung'ang'ana.
ref: Alisikia ndege wakiimba, upepo ukivuma na nyenze zikitoa sauti.

src: Ted started to write reviews and articles about different games.
mt: Ted alianza kutunga maoni na makala juu ya michezo tofauti.
ref: Ted alianza kuandika maoni na makala kuhusu michezo tofauti.

src: Tammy then headed for the gym to her favorite aerobics class.
mt: Tammy kisha kuingia kwenye kituo cha usafirishaji kwa ajili ya kikao chake cha aerobics.
ref: Kisha Tammy akaenda kwenye chumba cha mazoezi kufanya zoezi analolipenda la viungo.

src: She walks for about 30 minutes at a time around the neighborhood.
mt: Anapita kwa takribani dakika 30 kwa wakati katika eneo hilo.
ref: Yeye hutembea karibu dakika 30 kwa wakati mmoja mtaani.

src: He heard a voice telling him what floor to go to.
mt: Alisikia sauti inayotueleza kwa kina kwa kufika kwa kufika.
ref: Alisikia sauti ikimwambia ghorofa anayopaswa kwenda.

src: Someone had hit his car and just driven away.
mt: Aliye na gari lake alitupwa na mtu mmoja na kufika.
ref: Mtu alikuwa amegonga gari lake na kutoroka.

src: They left for work one day, and the gas filled up the house.
mt: Walifika kazi siku moja, na madhara ya gesi yalifika nyumba.
ref: Waliondoka kwenda kazi siku moja, na gesi ikajaza nyumba.

src: Carmen found a recipe that had a cauliflower crust.
mt: Carmen alipata mpangilio uliopangwa kwa kundu.
ref: Carmen akapata mapishi ambayo yalikuwa na ukoko wa koliflawa.

src: Rufus decides to cut his fingernails one night.
mt: Rufus anataka kuchukua barabara za mabawa yake mmoja usiku.
ref: Rufus akaamua kukata kucha zake za vidole usiku mmoja.

src: He found a quarter under the couch and a dollar in his dresser.
mt: Alipata senti moja chini ya sofa na dola moja katika mafuta yake.
ref: Akapata senti ishirini na tano chini ya kochi na dola ndani ya kabati lake.

src: By the time she left securit she checked the time.
mt: Kabla ya kufika securit alivyoangalia muda.
ref: Kabla ya kutoka sehemu ya ukaguzi wa usalama akaangalia saa.

src: The kids job was to go and pick the peaches for the pies.
mt: Kazi ya watoto ilikuwa kufika na kupikia mabaha kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa kuhitaji kwa
ref: Kazi ya watoto ilikuwa ni kwenda kuchukua pichi hizo za kutengeneza pai.

src: Candice decides she wants to better her taco recipe.
mt: Candice anataka kuchangamsha ripoti yake ya taka.
ref: Candice akaamua anataka mapisho bora ya taco yake.

src: He took 4 years worth of art classes in college.
mt: Alifundishwa kwa miaka mitatu kwa masomo ya sanaa katika chuo.
ref: Alisomea sanaa kwa miaka 4 katika chuo cha elimu.

src: There was no stove, so they cooked chicken nuggets in a toaster oven.
mt: Hakuna chombo cha kuchoma, kwa hiyo walichoma nyama ya kuku kama nyama chafu katika chombo cha kuchoma nyama.
ref: Hakukuwa na stovu, kwa hivyo walipika vipande vya kuku katika oveni ya kuoka mkate.

src: He finally stopped being so hard on himself.
mt: Alipokwama kwa kujitetea.
ref: Mwishowe akaacha kujilaumu.

src: The little girl couldn't swim well and started to sink.
mt: Jamaa mdogo hakumwamini vizuri na kuanza kupinduliwa.
ref: Msichana huyo mdogo hakuweza kuogelea vizuri na akaanza kuzama.

src: She sat down and we talked for hours.
mt: Alikaa na sasa tulijadili kwa masaa mengi.
ref: Akaketi chini na tukaongea kwa saa kadhaa.

src: She had to drive to school on a rainy day.
mt: Alienda kwa gari kwa siku ya mvua.
ref: Alilazimika kuendesha gari kwenda shuleni siku ambayo mvua inanyesha.

src: I got a bunch of them printed.
mt: Nilipata kifaa chenye kawaida kwa wengi wao.
ref: Nilizichapisha kadhaa.

src: He looked up the value when he got home.
mt: Alisoma kwa kina wakati akiwa nyumbani.
ref: Akaangalia thamani yake alipofika nyumbani.

src: It bounced across the street.
mt: Linabinga kwenye barabara.
ref: Ukaruka hadi barabarani.

src: However, it was a false alarm since a train was moving close-by.
mt: Lakini hilo lilikuwa kosa kwa sababu treni ilikuwa ikimwaga karibu.
ref: Hata hivyo, ilikuwa onyo bandia kwa kuwa treni ilikuwa iko karibu.

src: She ran to the security booth and gave them the $20.
mt: Alihutuka kwa kasi kwa madaxari na kutoa $20.
ref: Akakimbia kwenye kibanda cha walinzi na kupeana $20 hiyo.

src: It was surprisingly fast.
mt: Ilikuwa na nafasi kubwa.
ref: Kwa kushangaza alikuwa na kasi.

src: She thought about dyeing it to hide the gray.
mt: Aliangalia kuchanganya rangi ili kubadili rangi ya mawingu.
ref: Akafikiria kuhusu kuipaka rangi ili kuficha mvi.

src: She looked around, and everyone was dancing weirdly.
mt: Aliangalia kwa jicho, na wote walikuwa wakimwimbi kwa njia gani.
ref: Akaangalia, na kila mtu alikuwa akicheza kwa ajabu.

src: I did a few changes and had friends help with others.
mt: Nilichanganya kwa kiasi fulani na nilimshirikisha marafiki wangu.
ref: Nikafanya mabadiliko machache na nikawa na marafiki wa kunisadia na mengine.

src: In seventy two hours they would arrive in Las Vegas.
mt: Katika mabao 72 watafikia Las Vegas.
ref: Kwa saa sabini na mbili walifika Las Vegas.

src: A pier was built near his house.
mt: Kifaa cha kujaza kiliwekwa karibu na nyumba yake.
ref: Gati ilitengenezwa karibu na nyumba yake.

src: Randy asked the clerk if he could have a closer look at the ring.
mt: Randy alipiga kwa kambi kama anaweza kuangalia rangi zaidi.
ref: Randy akamwomba karani kama anaweza kuangalia pete hiyo kwa karibu.

src: They were in town performing though so I told her I would go.
mt: Walikuwako mjini wakiendesha shughuli za kazi, kwa hiyo nilimwambia mimi nitakwenda.
ref: Walikuwa na maonyesho mjini kwa hivyo nikamwambia nitaenda.

src: Shay wanted her weekend off, but she agreed to come in.
mt: Shay alitaka wiki yake ya kwanza, lakini alikubali kufika.
ref: Alitake kupumzika wikendi hiyo, lakini akakubali kuja.

src: She was starting to get old and frail.
mt: Alianza kuwa na umri na ugonjwa.
ref: Alikuwa ameanza kuwa mzee na mdhaifu.

src: I got to a point where I wanted to excel to pointe ballet shoes.
mt: Nilipata nafasi ambapo nilimtaka kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufurahia kwa kufur
ref: Nilifika mahali ambapo nilitaka kuvaa viatu vya baleti.

src: Every May Harry would also go to the country to see his friend Mary.
mt: Kila Mei Harry pia alifika nchi kwa kumwona rafiki yake Mary.
ref: Kila Mei Harry angeenda pia mashambani kumwona rafiki yake Mary.

src: Gina hated gym, and all things related.
mt: Gina alikuwa na hasira na gym, na vitu vyote vya kifedha.
ref: Gina alichukua mazoezi, na mambo yote husiani.

src: The mower was out of gas.
mt: Kusafirisha mabaki ya mafuta.
ref: Mashine ya kufyeka nyasi haikuwa na mafuta.

src: This made her feel uneasy so she quickly left.
mt: Kwa hiyo alikuwa na wasiwasi, kwa hiyo alifika kwa haraka.
ref: Hi ilimfanya asihisi vizuri kwa hivyo akaondoka kwa haraka.

src: A fox darted across the road.
mt: Simba mwenye nguvu mno alipita kwenye barabara.
ref: Mbweha akaruka barabarani.

src: They can not go to the river this year.
mt: Wao hawawezi kufika mto hii mwaka huu.
ref: Hawawezi kwenda mtoni mwaka huu.

src: He drove so fast he didn't see a pothole in the road.
mt: Alisafiri kwa haraka sana hivyo akasahau kifaru chenye kipimo kikubwa kwenye barabara.
ref: Aliendesha kwa kasi mno hakuona shimo barabarani.

src: She told him to grow up.
mt: Alimwambia kufanya kazi.
ref: Akamwambia akue kiakili.

src: She gathered the ingredients for her first vanilla ice cream.
mt: Aliangalia vitu vya kwanza kwa kuni chenye vanila yake.
ref: Alikusanya viungo vya aiskrimu yake ya kwanza ya vanila.

src: Miriam never stopped being pedantic.
mt: Miriam hakutokanaa kujitahidi.
ref: Miriam hakuacha kuwa mbishi.

src: A teacher spotted the girls sitting in the hall.
mt: Mwalimu aliona vijana wakiwa wazi katika barabara.
ref: Mwalimu akawaona wasichana wameketi ukumbini.

src: We all waited for another bus to show up to pick us up for an hour.
mt: Kwamba tulipendelea kwa saa moja kwa bus nyingine ili kufika kwa kipindi hicho.
ref: Sote tulisubiri kwa basi lingine lije kutuchukua kwa saa moja.

src: Everyone kept changing their mind.
mt: Wote wakakabiliwa na kujitenga.
ref: Kila mtu aliendelea kubadilisha nia yake.

src: On Monday she awoke to realized it was 8:45.
mt: Jumatatu alipokwama alikumbuka kwamba ilikuwa saa 8:45.
ref: Jumatatu aliamka akagundua ilikuwa saa 8:45.

src: Gina refused and continued to eat his ice cream.
mt: Gina alikataa na kudumu kula chakula chake.
ref: Gina alikataa na kuendelea kula aiskrimu yake.

src: He hitting skills were not very good.
mt: Kabila cha kucheza hakikupendelewi.
ref: Ustadi wake wa kugonga haukuwa mzuri sana.

src: Her grandpa had a heart attack and died.
mt: Jina lake lilikuwa Mzee. Alipata mafuriko ya moyo na kufa.
ref: Babu yake alikuwa amepata mshtuko wa moyo na kufa.

src: The presents looked beautiful, all wrapped up, underneath the tree.
mt: Zawadi zilikuwa zimejaa vizuri, zimepakwa, chini ya mti.
ref: Zawadi zilionekana maridadi, zote zikiwa zimefungwa, chini ya mti.

src: During the entire off season, Jim worked on his game.
mt: Kwenda mwaka mzima, Jim alifanya kazi yake kwenye mchezo wake.
ref: Wakati wa mapumziko ya msimu, Jim akaboresha mchezo wake.

src: She cut off her unnecessary expenses such as going out.
mt: Aliwafuta wajibu wake kama vile kufika nje.
ref: Akapunguza gharama zake zisizofaa kama vile kwenda kula nje.

src: His dog, Betty, was sitting nearby with a paper scrap in her mouth.
mt: Kukabili, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe, wewe,
ref: Mbwa wake, Betty, alikuwa amekaa karibu na kipande cha karatasi mdomoni mwake.

src: They sold sixteen glasses in one day to people.
mt: Walivunja vitu sitini na moja kwa siku kwa watu.
ref: Waliwauzia watu glasi kumi na sita kwa siku moja.

src: She began to eat the candy as fast as she got it.
mt: Alianza kula chakula cha kulezi kama alipata.
ref: Alianza kwa kula pipi punde tu alipoipata.

src: She figured everything is big in Texas and she would just get lost.
mt: Alifikiri kuwa yote ni kubwa nchini Texas na alikuwa atakapokwama.
ref: Akafikiria kila kitu ni kikubwa Texas na atapotea tu.

src: He called into work and told his boss he was ill.
mt: Alipiga simu kwa kazi na kuwafundisha mkuu kwamba alikuwa na ugonjwa.
ref: Akapiga simu kazini na kumwambia bosi wake alikuwa mgonjwa.

src: Sally didn't like cheese.
mt: Sally haingeli jibini.
ref: Sally hapendi jibini.

src: There was also a fire and everyone had to evacuate the school.
mt: Kuna pia moto na wote wakafurika shule.
ref: Kulikuwa pia na moto na kila mtu alilazimika kuondoka shuleni.

src: In Oregon, Felipe hiked great mountains and ate delicious food.
mt: Katika Oregon, Felipe alihifadhi milima kubwa na kula chakula cha ajabu.
ref: Kule Oregon, Felipe alipanda milima na kula vyakula vitamu.

src: The score was almost tied.
mt: Kasi kati ya kasi ilikuwa kama ilivyopangwa.
ref: Alama zilikuwa karibu kuwa nunge kwa nunge.

src: Lary was mining one day and saw a sparkle in the distance!
mt: Lary alikuwa anavyoendesha mabati siku moja na akakuta mabati yake yalikuwa yamekauka!
ref: Lary alikuwa akichimba siku moja na kuona mng'ao kwa mbali!

src: He did a lot of research on the most economical cars to buy.
mt: Alifanya mengi kuhusu gari zinazozingatia kipaumbele.
ref: Alifanya utafiti mwingi kuhusu magari ya kununua yanayotumia mafuta vizuri.

src: He was not well-socialized, so he started barking at them.
mt: Alikuwa hajawahi kuwa na uhusiano na wengine, kwa hiyo alianza kuzunguka na kuzunguka.
ref: Hakuwa anajua kutangamana vizuri, kwa hivyo alianza kubweka.

src: Earl has secretly been saving money for his new granddaughter.
mt: Earl amecheza kwa siri fedha kwa grandchild yake mpya.
ref: Earl alikuwa akiweka pesa kwenye akiba kisiri kwa ajili ya mjukuu wake.

src: Three died and two lived.
mt: Watu watatu wakafariki na wawili wakapona.
ref: Watatu waliaga dunia na wawili wako hai.

src: She has different cute ones.
mt: Anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana kama mwanamke anayeonekana k
ref: Ana tofauti za kuvutia.

src: He realized he could make a PB&J sandwich.
mt: Alifahamika anaweza kufanya sandwich ya PB&J.
ref: Akagundua anaweza kutengeneza sandwichi ya PB&J.

src: She sliced up potatoes and dropped them in bubbling oil.
mt: Alijifungua nyanya na kuchimba chakula cha nyanya katika maji ya kuchimba.
ref: Akakatakata viazi na kuviangusha ndani ya mafuta yanayochemka.

src: Matt missed the race and required an extensive rehab.
mt: Matt alikosea mashindano na alitakiwa kufanya kazi za kujitetea kwa wingi.
ref: Matt alikosa mbio hizi na akahitaji matibabu mengi.

src: Grandma lived very far away.
mt: Shangazi alikuwa katika mahali pa kawaida.
ref: Nyanya aliishi mbali sana.

src: Unfortunately, the baby had complications.
mt: Kwa hakika, mtoto alikuwa na changamoto.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, mtoto alikuwa na matatizo.

src: He went to sit down and fell.
mt: Alisimama na kufika.
ref: Alienda kukaa chini na akaanguka.

src: She worked with her husband to move everything out.
mt: Alifanya kazi pamoja na mke wake kwa kutoa vyote.
ref: Alishirikiana na mume wake kuhamisha vitu nje.

src: The house was scary in itself.
mt: Kwa wenyewe nyumba ilikuwa kama kifaru.
ref: Nyumba hiyo ilikuwa ikitisha kivyake.

src: Finally she has perfected her biscuit recipe.
mt: Kwa sasa anaeza kufanya kwa kipimo chake kipya.
ref: Mwishowe alikuwa ameboresha mapishi yake ya biskuti.

src: Lucy hated seeing her mom unhappy.
mt: Lucy alihisi kushindwa kwa mama yake.
ref: Lucy alichukia kumwona mama yake bila furaha.

src: He waited for his family to arrive.
mt: Alimwamini familia yake kufika.
ref: Alisubiri kwa familia yake kuwasili.

src: They did not get much attention.
mt: Walikuwa hawakupata mafanikio kubwa.
ref: Hazikuwavutia watu sana.

src: As the truck accelerated, the cage open and the horse came out.
mt: Kama gari lilivuka, kambi ilipataa na kuuza kijani.
ref: Lori hilo likiongezea kasi, kizimba kilifunguka na farasa akatoka nje.

src: It was a buffet so they got what they wanted.
mt: Walikuwa wamechaguliwa kwa chakula cha kawaida, hivyo wakapata yale yalivyotaka.
ref: Ilikuwa ni bafe kwa hivyo walipata walichokitaka.

src: Today was the day to make the candles.
mt: Leo ndiyo ilikuwa siku ya kutengeneza mabakuli.
ref: Leo ilikuwa ni siku ya kutengeneza mishumaa.

src: I noticed it was broken as soon as I got it out of the box.
mt: Nilijua ni bado wakati nilipata kwa kutoka kwa kifaa.
ref: Nikagundua ilikuwa imeharika nilipoitoa tu kwenye sanduku.

src: Later he did much better as the competition winded down.
mt: Baadaye alifanya zaidi kama mashindano yalivuka.
ref: Baadaye alifanya vizuri zaidi huku shindano likiendelea kuisha.

src: Ben started a compost pile in the fall with his failed plants.
mt: Ben alianza kipande cha kuchimba kwa wakati wa kipindi cha joto na miti yake iliyokataliwa.
ref: Ben akaanzisha rundo la mbolea msimu wa kupukutika kwa majani kwa kutumia mimea yake iliyoanguka.

src: He couldn't find his phone to order carry-out.
mt: Alitokana na kupata simu yake ili aamke kwa kuchukua.
ref: Hakuweza kupata simu yake ili kuagiza chakula.

src: Jason realized he had forgotten to bring something.
mt: Jason alijua ameacha kuchukua kitu.
ref: Jason akagundua alikuwa amesahau kuleta kitu.

src: She invited all her friends.
mt: Aliwataka wote wenzake.
ref: Akawaalika marafiki wake wote.

src: He shot into the flock.
mt: Alishika kwa kila kifaru.
ref: Akapiga risasi kwa makundi ya bukini.

src: She decides she needs to dress a little more formally.
mt: Anamchukua hatua ya kufanya zaidi ya kufanya zaidi.
ref: Akaamua kwamba anapaswa kuvaa kirasmi zaidi.

src: This morning she was shocked to see a stork flying across the lake.
mt: Jana alipata habari kuhusu mchiru aliyepita juu ya ziwa.
ref: Asubuhi hii alishtuka kumwona korongo akipaa kwenye ziwa.

src: Jody's boss noticed her efforts and decided to give her a promotion.
mt: Mkuu wa Jody alikataza kazi zake na kuanza kuwa na kipaumbele cha kuwapa nafasi ya kipaumbele.
ref: Bosi wa Jody aliona juhudi zake na kuamua kumpandisha cheo.

src: His crowning triumph was when he stole a large pizza.
mt: Kile kilicho kufanikiwa zaidi ni wakati alivyopata pizza kubwa.
ref: Ushindi wake mkuu ulikuwa wakati aliiba piza kubwa.

src: Sue said she did not make the schedule the day in question.
mt: Sue alisema hakuwa na mjadala wa kipindi cha siku hiyo.
ref: Sue alisema hakutengeneza ratiba ya siku husika.

src: The cabin was beautiful, set in the woods, beside a stream.
mt: Kabina ilikuwa nzuri, ilikuwa katika mashamba, karibu na mto.
ref: Kibanda hicho kilikuwa maridadi, ndani ya msitu, kando ya kijito.

src: Her friend told her to take pen and paper so she could communicate.
mt: Rafiki yake alimwambia aipige peni na kitabu ili aweze kueleza.
ref: Rafiki yake akamwambia achukue kalamu na karatasi ili aweze kuwasiliana.

src: Schnauzers usually don't live that long.
mt: Schauzers kwa kawaida hawakubali kuishi kwa muda huo.
ref: Mbwa hao wadogo kwa kawaida hawaishi muda huo wote.

src: The next day, he cut his hand while cutting food.
mt: Jana, alifanya kuchinjwa kwa mkia wakati wa kuchinjika chakula.
ref: Siku iliyofuata, alikata mkono wake akikata chakula.

src: Then, he rode his bike off to a field.
mt: Baadaye, alisafiri kwa biki yake kwenye kituo.
ref: Kisha, akaendesha baisikeli yake kwenda uwanjani.

src: About two Year's later they had their second child, a boy.
mt: Kama ilivyokuwa kwa miaka miwili baadaye walikuwa na mtoto wao wa pili, mwanawe.
ref: Karibu miaka miwili baadaye walikuwa na mtoto wao wa pili, mvulana.

src: The store owner caught Chris stealing the gum, and he got in trouble.
mt: Kabla hajakamilisha kuuza, mwenyebiashara alikuta Chris akikosa gumu, na akafika kwenye shida.
ref: Mwenye duka akamkamata Chris akiiba chingamu hiyo, na akawa matatani.

src: His friend Jack noticed this and offered to let him borrow money.
mt: Kaka yake Jack alikuta hivyo na kuwapatia pesa.
ref: Rafiki yake Jack akagundua hii na kujitolea kumkopesha pesa.

src: There were so many delicious local foods!
mt: Kuna vyakula vya kawaida vya kisasa vya kutosha!
ref: Kulikuwa na vyakula vingi vitamu vya kienyeji!

src: She washed and then spent 2 hours straightening her hair.
mt: Aliyafanya maji na baadaye alifanya kwa muda wa saa mbili tu kubadilisha majivu yake.
ref: Aliosha na kisha kuchukua saa 2 kulainisha nywele zake.

src: I love their pasta selection and the prices are amazing!
mt: Ninapenda chakula chao cha pasta na bei zao ni kama neno!
ref: Ninapenda chaguo zao za pasta na bei ni nzuri sana!

src: He didn't know if he would go back to work.
mt: Alidhani hakuwa na uwezo wa kujifungua tena kazi.
ref: Hakujua kama atarudi tena kazini.

src: Doug and Tracy made a commitment to each other.
mt: Doug na Tracy wakafanya kipaji kwa kila moja.
ref: Doug na Tracy walifanyiana ahadi wenyewe kwa wenyewe.

src: With so many choices, he felt overwhelmed.
mt: Na kwa kuwa kuna nyingi sana, alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Kwa kuwa kulikuwa na chaguo nyingi, alihisi kuzidiwa.

src: But his favorite place was Trinity College.
mt: Lakini mahali wake wa kipekee ulikuwa Chuo Kikuu cha Trinity.
ref: Lakini mahali alipopenda zaidi ni Chuo cha Trinity.

src: Ray liked to read a book and listen to music on his MP3 player.
mt: Ray alikuwa anavyopenda kusoma kitabu na kusikiliza muziki kwenye mp3 player.
ref: Ray alipenda kusoma kitabu na kusikiliza muziki kwenye kichezaji chake cha MP3.

src: I had to go out in the middle of the night to help.
mt: Nilikwenda nje katika usiku wa kati ili nisaidie.
ref: Ilinibidi nitoke katikati ya usiku ili kusaidia.

src: But then she found something awful.
mt: Lakini hatimaye alipata kitu kibaya.
ref: Lakini akapata kitu kibaya.

src: However emily, on the opposing team also scored.
mt: Lakini emily, kwenye timu ya kinyume pia alishinda.
ref: Hata hivyo emily, kwenye timu pinzani alipata alama pia.

src: Sally got them in the mail a few days later.
mt: Sally alipata kwa barua kwa majuma baadaye.
ref: Sally alizipata kwenye barua siku chache baadaye.

src: From that day forward, Fred records everything he does in his diary.
mt: Kutoka siku hiyo, Fred anaripoti kila kitu anachofanya katika tukio lake.
ref: Kuanzia siku hiyo na kuendelea, Fred hurekodi kila kitu anachokifanya katika shajara yake.

src: All the students loved the architecture.
mt: Wote waliopata elimu walipenda ujenzi.
ref: Wanafunzi wote walipenda mijengo.

src: But when the girl arrived, they liked each other!
mt: Lakini wakati wa kufika, waliokupenda pia!
ref: Lakini wakati msichana alipowasili, walipendana!

src: As the pizza cooked, the couples got board games.
mt: Kama pizza ilikuwa inaganda, zake zote ziliingia kwenye michezo ya kujadiliana.
ref: Huku piza ikiiva, walianza kucheza michezo ya bodi.

src: My dad loves to watch it and I sometimes sit with him and watch.
mt: Baba yangu anapenda kufurahia na mara nyingi ninaambiwa na kufurahia pamoja naye.
ref: Baba yangu anapenda kuitazama na wakati mwingine mimi hukaa na yeye na kutazama.

src: They're almost always home.
mt: Wao wakati wote ni nyumbani.
ref: Hao huwa nyumbani karibu kila wakati.

src: Finally when he got there he got the last one.
mt: Kisha akifika alipata yule mwisho.
ref: Mwishowe alipofika hapo alipata ya mwisho.

src: Neil saw dozens of pubs and had dozens of pints.
mt: Neil aliona zaidi ya duka za bia na alipika zaidi ya duka za bia.
ref: Neil aliona baa nyingi na akanywa pombe nyingi.

src: Francisco works with an instructor to learn how to ski.
mt: Francisco anafanya kazi na mwalimu ili anuelewe kama anavyotumia skii.
ref: Francisco akashirikiana na mkufunzi kujifunza jinsi ya kuteleza barafuni.

src: To try and help Sai feel better, his mom bought him a new sweater.
mt: Kwa kujitahidi kuwapa Sai hali nzuri, mama yake alimwamua kwa kuchukua kofia mpya.
ref: Ili kujaribu na kumsaidia Sai kuhisi vizuri, mama yake alimnunulia sweta mpya.

src: It got late, and Alycia's car seemed to not be where she left it.
mt: Aliyakwenda, na gari la Alycia lilikuwa si kama ilivyokuwa.
ref: Ikawa usiku, na gari la Alycia lilionekana halikuwa mahali aliloliacha.

src: One day, she realized the goat was missing.
mt: Juma moja, alijua kuharibika kijani.
ref: Siku moja, akagundua mbuzi wake anakosekana.

src: They soon discovered that their styles were incompatible.
mt: Wakati mwingine waliweza kujifunza kwamba vyombo vyao vikavumilia.
ref: Punde si punde wakagundua kwamba mitindo yao haitangamani.

src: Eric served the tennis ball to Bill.
mt: Eric alitupa mpira wa tenisi kwa Bill.
ref: Eric alimrushia Bill mpira wa tenisi.

src: She took them to the Marshall's near their home.
mt: Aliwafikia mara moja kwa Marshall's karibu na nyumba yao.
ref: Aliwapeleka kwenye duka la Marshall lililo karibu na nyumba yao.

src: One day, she noticed there were now lots of squirrels in her tree.
mt: Mmoja wa siku, alionyesha kwamba kuna wanyama wengi wakubwa wakifika katika mti wake.
ref: Siku moja, akagundua kulikuwa na kindi wengi katika mti wake.

src: I decided to help my niece learn to ride.
mt: Nilikuwa nimeamua kushirikiana na dada yangu kuwajua kwa kujitolea.
ref: Nikaamua kumsaidia mpwa wangu kujifunza kuendesha.

src: She talked with friends outside the room while pretending to be cool.
mt: Aliwaona wenzake nje ya kambi wakati wa kujifanya kuwa na hali nzuri.
ref: Aliongea na marafiki wake nje ya chumba huku akijifanya kuwa sawa.

src: She was very sad.
mt: Aliwa na huzuni.
ref: Alihuzunika sana.

src: He would update it with the times he went there.
mt: Anatupia na wakati anapokwenda huko.
ref: Angeisasisha na mara ambazo alienda hapo.

src: To my dismay I smelled something burnt.
mt: Kwa hofu yangu niliona neno la moto.
ref: Kwa mshangao wangu nilihisi harufu ya kitu kikiungua.

src: After breakfast, Laura left her house and got on the bus.
mt: Baada ya chakula cha asubuhi, Laura alirudi nyumbani na kuingia kwenye basi.
ref: Baada ya kula kiamsha kinywa, Laura aliondoka nyumbani kwake na akapanda basi.

src: Then Ray heard a loud, sickening crack, and a loud crash.
mt: Baadaye Ray alikuta kipindi kikubwa, kipindukazi, na kipindukazi.
ref: Ndipo Ray akasikia kipigo kikali, cha kushtua, na mshindo mkubwa.

src: They had a few drinks.
mt: Walikuwa na micheko kadhaa.
ref: Walikuwa na vinywaji vichache.

src: I figured i would just go in and fake it.
mt: Nilikuwa nimeamua niangalie na kufikiria.
ref: Nilidhani nitaingia tu na nijifanye.

src: Nate's parents went home and had a long talk.
mt: Wazazi wa Nate wakarudi nyumbani na kujadili kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Wazazi wa Nate walienda nyumbani na wakawa na majadiliano marefu.

src: She loves the pastas that they serve there.
mt: Anapenda pasta zinazotolewa huko.
ref: Anapenda pasta ambazo wanatayarisha huko.

src: I purchased my favorite brand of noodles.
mt: Nilipata ngozi yangu ya chakula cha nishati.
ref: Nikanunua chapa ninayopenda ya nudo.

src: Pete could not find the contract given to him by his realtor.
mt: Pete hakutambua mkataba uliotolewa kwake na mabepari wake.
ref: Pete hakuweza kupata kandarasi aliyopewa na wakala wake wa shamba.

src: One day at the amusement park he decided to face his fears.
mt: Juma moja katika mabahari ya micheko aliamua kufanya kazi yake.
ref: Siku moja akiwa kwenye bustani ya tafrija aliamua kukabiliana na hofu yake.

src: To her horror, her skin had turned pink.
mt: Kwa ajabu, mabavu yake yalipigwa na rangi ya pink.
ref: Kwa mshtuko, wake, ngozi yake ilikuwa imegeuka kuwa ya rangi ya waridi.

src: However, one day Jackson's boss invited him to a bar for a beer.
mt: Lakini siku moja Jackson's boss alimwita kwa kuchukua pombe.
ref: Hata hivyo, siku moja bosi wa Jackson alimwalika kwenye baa kunywa bia.

src: The frog swam up to the fly quietly.
mt: Kabila la nyoka lilibakiwa na nyoka mwingine.
ref: Chura aliogelea hadi kwa nzi kimya kimya.

src: Finally he decided to start making his bed.
mt: Kisha akawaona hivyo, aliamua kuanza kufanya kituo chake.
ref: Mwishowe akaamua kuanza kutandika kitanda chake.

src: I froze immediately.
mt: Nilimwaga kwanza.
ref: Nilisimama mara moja.

src: His losses were piling up a lot faster than his wins.
mt: Kila mara mali yake ilipungua zaidi kuliko mali yake iliyopata.
ref: Kushindwa kwake kulikuwa kukiongezeka haraka sana kuliko kushinda.

src: The pictures showed the moments where I was in the hospital.
mt: Zifuatiliaji zilizotolewa zinaonyesha wakati wakati nilikuwa katika hospitali.
ref: Picha hizo zilionyesha wakati ambapo nilikuwa hospitalini.

src: Matthew stomped.
mt: Matthew alitupatia.
ref: Matthew alipiga miguu chini kwa kishindo.

src: For a month before tryouts, she ran on her own.
mt: Kwa mwezi mmoja kabla ya mashindano, aliruka kwa kujitolea.
ref: Kwa mwezi mmoja kabla ya majaribio, alikimbia peke yake.

src: I was quiet for a long time.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepumzika kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Nilikuwa kimya kwa muda mrefu.

src: Jack accidentally sat on a cactus.
mt: Jack kwa sababu ya kujitupa alisimama juu ya kikuyu.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya Jack alikalia dungusi kakati.

src: He was a bag boy at the store.
mt: Alitumia kazi ya kuchukua baraza katika duka.
ref: Alikuwa kijana wa begi dukani.

src: One day, her friend suggested they do makeovers.
mt: Jana, rafiki yake alisema waweze kufanya makeovers.
ref: Siku moja, rafiki yake alipendekeza wanunue mavazi mapya.

src: A couple months in, she had a miscarriage.
mt: Baada muda mrefu, alijifungua.
ref: Miezi michache baadaye, mimba yake iliharibika.

src: So she entered her town's annual modeling contest.
mt: Kwa hivyo aliingia mashindano ya kujitegemea ya mji wake kila mwaka.
ref: Kwa hivyo akangia kwenye mashindano ya kila mwaka ya jiji ya kuonyesha mitindo.

src: His parents told him he would get days off for dusting.
mt: Wazazi wake walimwambia kwamba atapata siku za kipindi cha kuchimba.
ref: Wazazi wake walimwambia atapata siku za kupumzika ili asafishe.

src: A car suddenly flew into it and struck her.
mt: Gari lilipanda na kushambulia.
ref: Punde gari liliruka na kumgonga.

src: When he went outside he discovered it was much to dark.
mt: Alipokuwa nje alikuta ni kawaida sana.
ref: Alipotoka nje aligundua kulikuwa giza sana.

src: In a few Years he had saved all his overtime pay and had lots of cash.
mt: Kwa muda mrefu alikuwa ameipata pesa yote ya kazi za kipindi cha nusu na alikuwa na pesa nyingi.
ref: Katika Miaka michache alikuwa amehifadhi malipo yake ya ziada na alikuwa na pesa nyingi.

src: I shared my creations with several people.
mt: Nilishirikiana kwa kipindi na watu wengi.
ref: Nilishiriki ubunifu wangu na watu kadhaa.

src: Our cat is very picky.
mt: Kiti chetu ni mwingi wa kupenda.
ref: Paka wetu ni mchaguzi sana.

src: The website slowly built and gained attention.
mt: Uwezo wa mtandaoni ulivuka kwa kasi na kupata utambuzi.
ref: Tovuti ikatengenezwa polepole na kutambuliwa.

src: Jeff ignored him and ran towards the hoop.
mt: Jeff aliacha kujibu na kufika kwenye kifua.
ref: Jeff alimpuuza na akakimbia akielekea kwenye pete.

src: He helped us learn how to make our own tents.
mt: Alimwajibika kwa kutusaidia kupata ujuzi wa kutengeneza tenda zetu.
ref: Akatusaidia kujifunza jinsi ya kutengeneza mahema yetu mwenyewe.

src: Some were vegetables and juice containers for a 50% discount.
mt: Kuna wengine waliotumika kama vyakula na majiko ya maji kwa kipa ya 50%.
ref: Baadhi yalikuwa mboga na vyombo vya juisi kwa punguzo la asilimia 50.

src: Joey began looking for another job right away.
mt: Joey alianza kutafuta kazi nyingine wakati wowote.
ref: Joey alianza kutafuta kazi nyingine mara moja.

src: One day he decided to meet people on craigslist.
mt: Jana alisema kufika kwa watu kwenye craigslist.
ref: Siku moja aliamua kukutana na watu kwenye craigslist.

src: Amy was skeptical, but she agreed to give it a shot.
mt: Amy alikuwa na wasiwasi, lakini alikubali kujituma.
ref: Amy alikuwa na shala, lakini alikubali kujaribu.

src: She decided to order some fried chicken and mashed potatoes.
mt: Aliamua kuuza nyama choma na nyama choma.
ref: Aliamua kuagiza kuku ya kukausha na viazi vilivyopondwa-pondwa.

src: She slept all day long.
mt: Aliwako kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Alilala siku nzima.

src: After two hours, they got tired and took a break.
mt: Baada ya masaa mawili, wakakosea na kufanya kikao.
ref: Baada ya muda wa saa mbili, walichoka na wakapumzika.

src: The palm tree fronds were blowing so hard they scraped the windows.
mt: Kifungua cha miti ya nafaka kiliangamia kwa kasi kiasi cha kuchimba vitu vya kuleta barabara.
ref: Makuti ya mchikichi yalikuwa yakipigwa na upepo sana yakagwaruza madirisha.

src: The book has a shopping list of necessary drawing supplies.
mt: Kitabu hiki kina orodha ya vitu vya kawaida vya kuchipua.
ref: Kitabu kina orodha ya ununuzi wa vifaa muhimu vya kuchora.

src: Finally, one day she had the courage to drop out of school.
mt: Kwa sasa, siku moja alikuwa na uwezo wa kutoka shule.
ref: Hatimaye, siku moja alikuwa na ujasiri wa kuacha shule.

src: She waited until everyone fell asleep and sneaked out.
mt: Aliwaita mpaka wote wakafika kwenye nchi za kukaa na kufika nje.
ref: Alisubiri hadi kila mtu alipolala na akatoka kisiri nyumbani.

src: Ivy agreed.
mt: Ivy alikubali.
ref: Ivy akakubali.

src: He took the plans to a developer to build.
mt: Alifika mwenyekiti wa mabunifu ili kujenga.
ref: Akapeleka mipango hiyo kwa mwendelezaji ajenge.

src: Lauren and her sisters pose in front of a cute cafe.
mt: Lauren na ndugu zake wanapiga picha chini ya kafe chenye uwezo wa kuonekana.
ref: Lauren na dada zake wakajiweka tayari mbele ya mkahawa mzuri.

src: She found him a few times but then he disappeared.
mt: Alijua kwa mara kadhaa lakini alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika alipofika
ref: Alimpata mara kadhaa lakini baadaye akapotea.

src: A traffic cop pulled him over.
mt: Polisi wa kifahari alimwamuru.
ref: Askari trafiki alimsimamisha.

src: She practiced on her flute everyday for a week.
mt: Aliwafundisha kwa mafungo yake kila siku kwa wiki moja.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi kwenye filimbi yake kila siku kwa wiki.

src: His wife hated grapes, his daughter hated apples.
mt: Mke wake alikuwa na uhasia kwa maganda, binti yake alikuwa na uhasia kwa matembezi.
ref: Mkewe alichukia zabibu, binti yake alichukia tofaa.

src: Her child was very afraid of the lions.
mt: Jaluo alikuwa na mtoto mwingi wa kupata kwa simba.
ref: Mtoto wake alikuwa akiogopa simba sana.

src: She practiced in the gym after school with her team.
mt: Aliwafundisha katika kituo cha usafiri baada ya shule na timu yake.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi kwenye ukumbi wa mazoezi baada ya shule na timu yake.

src: Her coach gave them a very inspiring speech.
mt: Kabla ya kucheza, meneja alimwambia wachezaji kwa maneno mengi.
ref: Kocha wake aliwapa hotuba ya kutia moyo sana.

src: The longer she went without interacting, the more difficult it became.
mt: Kila mara alipokuwa bila kujadili, alikuwa na shida.
ref: Kadri alivyoendelea kukaa kwa mura mrefu bila kuingiliana, ndivyo ilikuwa ngumu zaidi.

src: He thought he had fallen into a patch of poison ivy.
mt: Alimwamini kuwa alikuwa amekatika katika kitovu cha kipenzi.
ref: Alidhani alikuwa ameanguka kwenye kiraka chenye sumu ya mwefeu.

src: My son works at Kroger, they recently had a meeting about Blue Belle.
mt: Jamaa yangu anafanya kazi katika Kroger, wakati mmoja waliyafanya kikao juu ya Blue Belle.
ref: Kijana wangu hufanya kazi huko Kroger, hivi karibuni walikuwa na mkutano kuhusu Blue Belle.

src: He thought he would just give it his best try.
mt: Alimwamini atakaelewa kwa kujitahidi kikamilifu.
ref: Alidhani atajitolea kabisa kuwa bora.

src: They are there for a long time.
mt: Wao wako kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Wapo hao kwa muda mrefu.

src: Kayla accidentally spilled some of her vanilla latte on the book.
mt: Kayla kwa hukumu akasababisha sehemu ya latte yake ya vanila kuchemka kwenye kitabu.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya Kayla alimwagilia kitabu chake maziwa ya vanilla.

src: Lenny rented three horror movies.
mt: Lenny alikuwa ameajiri matatu ya filamu za kihofu.
ref: Lenny akakodisha sinema tatu za kutisha.

src: Laura assured the crowd that was long ago.
mt: Laura alisikitisha wakati wa kujadili na wakati wa kujadili.
ref: Laura aliwahakikishia umati kuwa ilikuwa zamani sana.

src: Charlie liked interacting with the community.
mt: Charlie alikuwa na uhusiano mzuri na jamii.
ref: Charlie alipenda kuingiliana na jamii.

src: The younger dog was very lonely.
mt: Kukoo kile kile alikuwa na ugonjwa wa kujitetea.
ref: Mbwa mdogo akawa mpweke sana.

src: Sean protests at first, but finally he cleans his laundry.
mt: Sean anasikitika kwanza, lakini hatimaye anatunza majivu yake.
ref: Sean anapinga mwanzoni, lakini mwishowe anafua nguo zake.

src: She studied very hard and took it again.
mt: Aliangalia sana na kushindwa tena.
ref: Alisoma kwa bidii sana na akaifanya tena.

src: As she put her feet in however, the wave captured her.
mt: Kama alivyopanga kichwa chake, maji yaliyopata kama yalivyo, yaliangalia.
ref: Hata hivyo alipoweka miguu yake, wimbi lilimkamata.

src: He accidentally pricked his finger with one of the hooks, too.
mt: Alisikitika na kufurudia mdomo na moja kati ya mabanda.
ref: Alichoma kidole chake kwa bahati mbaya na moja ya ndoano, pia.

src: She got to the restaurant early and waited for her date.
mt: Aliingia kwa wingi katika restoranti na akawaambia kwa muda kwa mpenzi wake.
ref: Akafika kwenye mgahawa mapema na kusubiri mwenzi wake.

src: The mom told the boy that Santa was responsible for bringing presents.
mt: Mama alisema kwa mwana kwamba Santa ndiye aliyebatilia vitu.
ref: Mama alimwambia mvulana kwamba Santa alikuwa na jukumu la kuleta zawadi.

src: Shivering, he pulled a bunch of blankets around himself.
mt: Alimwacha, alipiga kifua chake kwa kifua chenye kiasi.
ref: Akitetemeka, akavuta blanketi nyingi karibu naye.

src: Anthony studied hard, and eventually he learned the language.
mt: Anthony alifanya kazi kwa kujifunza lugha.
ref: Anthony alisoma kwa bidii, na mwishowe akajifunza lugha hiyo.

src: The store was out of half the items.
mt: Kitabu kilikuwa bila nusu ya vitu.
ref: Duka lilikuwa limeishiwa na nusu ya bidhaa hizo.

src: Then, Joanie heard a familiar sound coming from outside.
mt: Baadaye, Joanie alikuta saa ya kawaida kutoka nje.
ref: Kisha, Joanie akasikia sauti aliyoijua ikitoka nje.

src: Cornelia moves her bed to sit next to the window.
mt: Cornelia anapomwaga kitanda chake anapomwaga kwa pamoja na kichwa cha jua.
ref: Cornelia anasogeza kitanda chake karibu na dirisha.

src: Up until last week when he wrecked.
mt: Kabla ya wiki ya kwanza alipotoa.
ref: Hadi wiki iliyopita alipoanguka.

src: She really enjoyed talking to a little old lady in particular.
mt: Aliwahi kuwa na nafasi ya kuongea na mwanamke mmoja mwenye umri mdogo.
ref: Hasa alifurahiya sana kuzungumza na bibi kizee.

src: They went into the general admission area.
mt: Wakati huo wakapata sehemu ya kawaida.
ref: Walienda katika eneo la kiingilio cha jumla.

src: However, one day his car had a flat tire and he wished he had a phone.
mt: Lakini siku moja gari lake lilipata kipigo cha kifua na alikuwa akimwamini kama alikuwa na simu.
ref: Walakini, siku moja gari lake lilikuwa gurudumu lililopasuka na alitamani angekuwa na simu.

src: Then he saw a coupon in the paper.
mt: Baadaye aliona coupon katika gazeti.
ref: Kisha akaona kuponi kwenye karatasi.

src: After contemplating using water I decided to go to the store.
mt: Baada ya kujifunza kutumia maji nilisikia kuingia kwenye duka.
ref: Baada ya kufikiria kutumia maji niliamua kwenda dukani.

src: Then she decided she wanted some fish, too.
mt: Baadaye aliamua kuwa na samaki pia.
ref: Kisha akaamua kuwa anataka samaki, pia.

src: Lee was very sad missing Holly everyday.
mt: Lee alikuwa na hasira kubwa kwa kufikiri Holly kila siku.
ref: Lee alikuwa na huzuni kubwa kukosa Holly kila siku.

src: The store was having a big sale.
mt: Gari la zimamoto la uwanja wa ndege lilibingirika wakati wa kuitikia.
ref: Duka lilikuwa na uuzaji wa bidhaa iliyopunguzwa bei.

src: He was at the Salt Lake Airport with his family and saw his hero.
mt: Alikuwa katika Uwanja wa Ndege wa Salt Lake na familia yake na akawaona mshenzi wake.
ref: Alikuwa katika Uwanja wa Ndege wa Salt Lake pamoja na familia yake na akamuona shujaa wake.

src: She wrapped it carefully and made it a safe home.
mt: Aliwakosoa na kufanya nchi yake salama.
ref: Aliifubika vizuri na akaipeleka nyumbani salama.

src: I quietly went to the office and turned it in.
mt: Nilipata nafasi nilienda kwa siri katika ofisi na kuchukua.
ref: Nilikwenda kimya kimya ofisini na nikaiwasilisha.

src: Ten people asked me about it.
mt: Wanadamu kumi walimwambia mimi kuhusu hicho.
ref: Watu kumi waliniuliza kuihusu.

src: Later, the bank called him saying he over-drafted.
mt: Baadaye, benki ilimwambia kwamba alikuwa amepata kiasi.
ref: Baadaye, benki ilimpigia simu ikisema alipitisha kiasi.

src: Installing an app on his phone, he began practicing his french.
mt: Kutumia programu yake kwenye simu yake, alianza kufundisha kiswahili.
ref: Akisakinisha programu kwenye simu yake, alianza kufanya mazoezi ya Kifaransa.

src: He showed me how to type and search anything I wanted.
mt: Alimwonyesha nini ni kuchapisha na kupata yote nilivyotaka.
ref: Alinionyesha jinsi ya kuandika na kutafuta chochote ninachotaka.

src: He prepped for many days until he felt prepared for the interview.
mt: Alifanya kazi kwa siku nyingi hadi alipokuwa tayari kwa kuangalia.
ref: Alijiandaa kwa siku nyingi hadi akahisi amejiandaa kwa ajili ya mahojiano.

src: They raised him well and he led a very happy life.
mt: Walimwajibika na alikuwa na maisha mengi mengi ya furaha.
ref: Walimlea vizuri na aliishi maisha ya furaha sana.

src: She joined a club of people who climbed mountains together.
mt: Alijiunga na kikundi cha watu wanaocheza pamoja mlima.
ref: Alijiunga na kikundi cha watu ambao walipanda milima pamoja.

src: Fred became very angry about this.
mt: Fred alikuwa na hasira kubwa juu ya hicho.
ref: Fred alikasirika sana kuhusu hii.

src: She recently returned two of three cable boxes.
mt: Aliwakiliana wakati wake wa mwisho wawili kati ya mitatu ya mitoleo ya kawaida.
ref: Hivi majuzi alirudisha visanduku viwili kati ya tatu vya kebo.

src: One day he buys a jar of pistachios to eat at home.
mt: Yule mmoja alipata kikombe cha pistachio kwa kula nyumbani.
ref: Siku moja alinunua mitungi ya pistachios kula nyumbani.

src: Sharon put them in planters, believing they would be small plants.
mt: Sharon alimwagilia kwa kipande, akielewa kuwa ni mimea ya kipindu.
ref: Sharon aliwaweka kwenye mashine ya kupandia, akiamini itakuwa mimea ndogo.

src: She decided to go to the park.
mt: Aliamua kufika katika mazingira ya kijani.
ref: Aliamua kwenda kwa bustani.

src: His first week was ok, but soon he ran out of water.
mt: Juma yake ya kwanza ilikuwa nzuri, lakini kisha akapotea maji.
ref: Wiki yake ya kwanza ilikuwa sawa, lakini punde tu aliishiwa na maji.

src: However he was to young to be an astronaut.
mt: Aliwa kubwa kwa ajili ya kuwa mwanasayansi.
ref: Lakini alikuwa mdogo kuwa mtaalamu wa anga.

src: She gave us a calendar issued by the center.
mt: Aliwapa sisi kalenda iliyotolewa na baraza.
ref: Alitupatia kalenda iliyotolewa na kituo hicho.

src: Luckily they had great earnings yesterday.
mt: Naam, wamekuwa na mapato makubwa jana.
ref: Kwa bahati nzuri yalikuwa na mapato makubwa jana.

src: When the Bee started, Jen survived as others got knocked out.
mt: Jen alibaki wakati Bee ilianza, wengine wakakwama.
ref: Mashindano yalipoanza, Jen aliendelea wakati wengine wakaondolewa.

src: I could tell she was reluctant to let me in.
mt: Nilijua kwamba alikuwa na wasiwasi kuwapa nafasi.
ref: Ningeweza kujua alikuwa anasita kuniruhusu niingie.

src: Suddenly the wind began to pick up severely.
mt: Kisha muda gari la ndege lilianguka kwenye barabara kuu karibu masaa ya 9:30 asubuhi (0230 UTC) na kulipuka, kwa hivyo ikafunga uwanja wa ndege kwa ndege za kibiashara.
ref: Ghafla upepo ulianza kuwa kali sana.

src: Andrew's friends came over and wanted to drink.
mt: Wapenzi wa Andrew wakapanda na wakakarao kwa kujikuta.
ref: Marafiki wa Andrew walikuja na wakataka kunywa.

src: One day an ice storm caused the power to go out in her city home.
mt: Moja siku mvua ya barafu ilisababisha umeme kutokea katika nyumba yake ya mji.
ref: Siku moja dhoruba ya barafu ilisababisha umeme kuzima katika mji wake wa nyumbani.

src: He took it straight to the skatepark.
mt: Alifika kwa muda kwa mabonde ya sketi.
ref: Alipeleka moja kwa moja hadi kwenye uwanja wa kuteleza.

src: He felt his legs become itchy too.
mt: Alipata shida ya kujitahidi kujitetea.
ref: Alihisi miguu yake inawasha pia.

src: Halfway through, her car broke down.
mt: Kati ya safari, gari lake lilibadilika.
ref: Katikati, gari lake liliharibika.

src: She wanted Dan to ask her to the school dance.
mt: Alitaka Dan kufanya naye kwa ndege ya shule.
ref: Alitaka Dan amuulize aende naye kwenye densi ya shule.

src: As I walked in, they had amazing salads and juices to try.
mt: Kama nilivyopanda, wao wana saladi na maji ya kuleta kujifungua.
ref: Nilipoingia, walikuwa na saladi na juisi nzuri za kujaribu.

src: So she decided to have her walls painted blue.
mt: Kwa hiyo aliamua kuwa na kilele cha nyumba chake chenye rangi ya samawati.
ref: Kwa hivyo akaamua kupaka kuta zake bluu.

src: I've never played before in my life.
mt: Nilikuwa sijatumbuiza kabisa katika maisha yangu.
ref: Sijawahi kucheza awali katika maisha yangu.

src: It took her an hour to clear the snow.
mt: Aliweza kuchimba barabara kwa muda wa saa moja.
ref: Ilimchukua saa moja kuondoa theluji.

src: The journalist informed him it was a live show.
mt: Rasmi wa habari alimwambia kwamba ni tamasha la kujadiliana.
ref: Mwanahabari huyo akamfahamisha ilikuwa ni onyesho la moja kwa moja.

src: He spoke some unflattering things to his manager and co-workers.
mt: Alisema vitu vyenye kujivunia kwa meneja wake na wafanyikazi wake.
ref: Alisema mambo ambayo hayakuwa mazuri kwa meneja wake na wafanyakazi wenza.

src: One day though the cranes stopped coming around.
mt: Jana wakati mwingine wakati wazungu wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wakakwenda wak
ref: Siku moja korongo hao wakaacha kuja.

src: We got on the field and practiced before the game.
mt: Kwa kawaida, tukapata kwenye barabara na kufundisha kabla ya mchezo.
ref: Tukafika uwanjani na kufanya mazoezi kabla ya mchezo.

src: She worked very hard and it paid off with good grades.
mt: Ali kazi kwa kasi na kwa hivyo alipata daraja bora.
ref: Alifanya kazi kwa bidii na akapata matoke mazuri ya gredi nzuri.

src: Her nana gave Sophie her prized gold locket.
mt: Nana yake alikuwa na locket yake ya dhahabu.
ref: Bibi ya Sophie alimpa kibweta cha dhahabu cha thamani.

src: When she got there and met with the woman, she answered questions.
mt: Alipokuwa huko na kuangalia na mwanamke, alijibu maswali.
ref: Alipofika hapo na kukutana na mwanamake, alijibu maswali.

src: He tried for half an hour but it kept evading him.
mt: Alivyochafua kwa nusu saa, lakini alikuwa anapigana naye.
ref: Alijaribu kwa nusu saa lakini waliendelea kumkwepa.

src: Zack and his friends went inside every room.
mt: Zack na wenzake wakati wao wakapata kila chumba.
ref: Zack na marafiki wake wakaingia ndani ya kila chumba.

src: After losing a considerable amount of money, she played slots.
mt: Baada ya kupoteza fedha nyingi, alitumia sloti.
ref: Baada ya kupoteza kiasi kikubwa cha pesa, alicheza kamari.

src: She decides to buy a pair of hiking boots.
mt: Anamchagua kupata kofia ya kufurika.
ref: Akaamua kununua buti za kutembea.

src: He looked everywhere in his house.
mt: Alisoma kila mahali katika nyumba yake.
ref: Alitafuta kila mahali nyumbani mwake.

src: The next day he took the money to work and turned it in.
mt: Jana alifika kazi na kutoa pesa.
ref: Siku iliyofuata akapeleka pesa hizo kazini na kuzirejesha.

src: Unfortunately they're wasteful.
mt: Kwa hakika wana uhalali.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya yanapatoza muda.

src: Barry went to the stadium, and purchased a ticket.
mt: Barry alipita katika uwanja, na kupata tiketi.
ref: Barry akaenda uwanjani, na kununua tikiti.

src: We tried red wine in bowls.
mt: Tulitumia vino vijivu kwa chakula.
ref: Tulijaribu mwinyo mwekundu ndani ya bakuli.

src: And she didn't think bother to clean the spill properly.
mt: Na hawezi kujitahidi kuchimba kwa kipinduzi kwa kipinduzi.
ref: Na hakufikiria kusafisha umwagikaji huo vizuri.

src: Although not quite ready for kids, they still felt lonely.
mt: Wakati hawakuwa tayari kwa watoto, waliendelea kuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Ijapokuwa hawakuwa tayari kwa watoto, bado walihisi wapweke.

src: People started pushing others out of the way.
mt: Watu wakapanga wengine wakati wa kufika.
ref: Watu walianza kuwasukuma wengine watoke njiani.

src: I got to be in the front row.
mt: Nilikuwa katika baraza la mbele.
ref: Niliweza kuwa kwenye mstari wa mbele.

src: He went to the gym in January and ate healthier.
mt: Alifika gymu mwezi Januari na kula bora.
ref: Alianza kufanya mazoezi mnamo Januari na kula vyakula vyenye afya.

src: They said if she did well her last semester, she picks the vacation.
mt: Wanawake wanasema kama anavyo faida mwaka wa mwisho, anaweza kuchagua kile chakula.
ref: Walisema kama atafanya vizuri muhula uliopita, achague likizo.

src: We decided to set up outside our house.
mt: Kwa hiyo tumekuwa tunajitahidi kujenga nje ya nyumba yetu.
ref: Tukaamua kuweka kimoja nje ya nyumba yetu.

src: I put them on my bag to use in case of emergencies.
mt: Nilinunua kwa kutumia katika kesi za kawaida.
ref: Niliziweka kwenye mfuko wangu ili kutumia wakati wa dharura.

src: He told his mother he wanted to change his name.
mt: Alisema kwa mama yake kwamba alitaka kubadilisha jina lake.
ref: Alimwambia mama yake alitaka kubadilisha jina lake.

src: Finally they found a beautiful home they loved.
mt: Kwa sasa wamejifunza nyumba nzuri ambayo wanaupenda.
ref: Mwishowe walipata nyumba maridadi walioipenda.

src: When he got into the front of the house, he rang the doorbell.
mt: Alipokwenda chini ya nyumba, aliruka kwa kuzingatia.
ref: Alipofika mbele ya nyumba hiyo, alifinya kengele ya mlango.

src: Eventually she took it to the auto store.
mt: Kwa hatua yake alitupa kwa duka la gari.
ref: Mwishowe aliipeleka kwenye duka la magari.

src: While doing a trick, Joe fell and broke his arm.
mt: Kutokana na kufanya kitendo, Joe alipotea na kufa kichwa chake.
ref: Akifanya ujanja wake, Joe alianguka na kuvunja mkono wake.

src: She looked up her course requirements and shopping lists.
mt: Aliangalia mada zake za kuhitaji na orodha za kuzalisha.
ref: Akaangalia mahitaji yake ya kozi na orodha ya vitu vya kununua.

src: Intrigued, he took a train there.
mt: Alimwambia, alikuwa na hamu, akakaa treni kwenda huko.
ref: Akivutiwa, alipanda treni hapo.

src: I tried to remain awake and work on a few assignments.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepanga kuendelea na kazi chache.
ref: Nilijaribu kusalia macho na kushughulikia kazi chache.

src: Amanda watched the squirrel as he carried the acorns to his nest.
mt: Amanda alimwona kipenzi kama anavyoleta mabega kwa kifungo chake.
ref: Amanda alitazama kindi huyo akibebe mbegu hadi kwa kiota chake.

src: This summer Terry decides he wants to learn how to dive in the water.
mt: Kama ilivyokuwa kwa kila mwaka, Terry anataka kujifunza kama anaweza kufurika katika maji.
ref: Majira haya ya joto Terry aliamua anataka kujifunza jinsi ya kupiga mbinzi majini.

src: The place had many cool exhibits and interactive displays.
mt: Mahali pana nyingi za picha za kawaida na picha za kujadili.
ref: Sehemu hiyo ilikuwa na maonyesho mengi mazuri na ingiliani.

src: Kaylee and James started to like each other and soon started dating.
mt: Kaylee na James wakapendana na kufika kwa kujifungua.
ref: Kaylee na James walianza kupendana na punde si punde wakaanza kuchumbiana.

src: She really wanted to get the position at the ice cream shop.
mt: Aliwakaribisha sana kuchagiza nafasi ya kazi katika duka la kivuli.
ref: Alitaka sana kupata kazi hiyo katika duka la aiskrimu.

src: She had her whole body massaged.
mt: Aliwachukua wote mwili wake kwa kuchukua.
ref: Alitaka kusingwa mwili mzima.

src: Bob was happy because it was the biggest bonus he had gotten.
mt: Bob alikuwa na furaha kwa sababu ilikuwa bonusi kubwa zaidi aliyopata.
ref: Bob alifurahi kwa sababu ilikuwa ndio bonasi kubwa zaidi amewahi kupata.

src: She told us to fend for ourselves.
mt: Alimwambia tukifika tukifika.
ref: Alituambia tujilishe wenyewe.

src: Mary was sad that the whole family would not be together.
mt: Mary alikuwa na hasira kwamba familia yote haitakuwa pamoja.
ref: Mary alihuzunika kwamba familia yake nzima haitakuwa pamoja.

src: She handed them a couple of dollars.
mt: Aliwapa pesa kadhaa.
ref: Akawapa dola kadhaa.

src: We proceeded to look online for an airplane ticket.
mt: Kwa hiyo tukafika kwenye mtandao kwa ajili ya kupata tiketi ya ndege.
ref: Tulienda kuangalia mtandaoni kwa tikiti za ndege.

src: She found that her rabbit had bunnies.
mt: Alipata kwamba kuni lake lilikuwa na wanyama wadogo.
ref: Akapata kwamba sungura wake alikuwa na sungura wachanga.

src: Before I knew it it was really late.
mt: Kabla hajui ni sasa ni mara nyingi.
ref: Kabla nijue kinachoendelea nilikuwa nimechelewa sana.

src: All day, while at work, he complimented his coworkers.
mt: Kwa siku nzima, wakati wa kazi, alisema kwa wafanyabiashara wengine.
ref: Siku nzima, akiwa kazini, aliwapongeza wafanyakazi wenza.

src: While he was walking, a large brick fell and hit him on the head.
mt: Alipoenda, kijani kikubwa kikafika na kufichika kwenye mdomo.
ref: Alipokuwa akitembea, tofali kubwa likaanguka na kumgonga kichwani.

src: Every summer his parents made him go on a camping trip.
mt: Kila mwaka wazazi wake wakawajibika kwa kumtupa kwenye safari ya kambi.
ref: Kila majira ya joto wazazi wake walimfanya aende kwenye safari ya kupiga kambi.

src: A few days later, George awoke to a surprise.
mt: Baada ya miaka miwili, George alipona kwa habari ya kushangaza.
ref: Siku chache baadaye, George alipata mshangao.

src: Some of his friends agreed.
mt: Kama mmoja wa wenzake alivyotambua.
ref: Baadhi ya marafiki wake walikubali.

src: Cameron saw the post, and felt sympathy for Robbie and her car.
mt: Kameron aliona posti, na alikuwa na raha kwa Robbie na gari lake.
ref: Cameron aliona chapisho hilo, na kumhurumia Robbie na gari lake.

src: But he couldn't lace them up because the strings were missing!
mt: Lakini alikuwa hawezi kuziweka kwa sababu zile za kifungua zilikuwa hazipatikani!
ref: Lakini hakuweza kuvifunga kwa sababu kamba hazikuwepo!

src: One day her water broke and she was taken to the hospital.
mt: Juma moja maji yake yalipata na alitolewa kwa hospitali.
ref: Siku maji yake yalivuja na alipelekwa hospitalini.

src: A few months ago he found a Rolex.
mt: Kutokana na mabadiliko ya kifedha, kwa muda mfupi alikuwa amepata Rolex.
ref: Miezi michache iliyopita alipata Rolex.

src: I was afraid to bike across the city with my nephew in tow.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepata wasiwasi kwa kubembea katika mji kwa jamaa yangu mwenyewe katika kipindi chini.
ref: Nilikuwa na hofu ya kuendesha baisikeli mjini nikiwa na mpwa wangu.

src: Her friends were waiting at a table but had already ordered.
mt: Wanawake wake walikuwa wakifika katika meza lakini waliwahi kutoa.
ref: Marafiki wake walikuwa wakimsubiri kwenye meza lakini walikuwa wameagiza tayari.

src: My daughters picked out a friendly puppy.
mt: Wanawake wangu waliangalia mbuzi mwenye uwezo wa kuwa na uhusiano.
ref: Binti zangu walimchagua mbwa mchanga mzuri.

src: He shaved and showered happily.
mt: Alimwasha na kumwaga maji na furaha.
ref: Alinyoa na kuoga kwa furaha.

src: He went to the Cozumel beach and bought some land.
mt: Alifika pwani ya Cozumel na kupata nchi.
ref: Alienda ufuo wa Cozumel na kununua ardhi.

src: He advised her to complete an application.
mt: Alimwambia kufanya maombi yake.
ref: Akamshauri akamilishe maombi.

src: Neither of them was in this lunch room.
mt: Hayupo wote wawili katika chumba hiki cha chakula.
ref: Hakuna yeyote kati yao alikuwa katika chumba cha chakula.

src: When we got on the plane Mom told me it will be fun.
mt: Japo tulipokwenda ndege mama alimwambia nikiwa na nafasi.
ref: Tulipopanda ndege hiyo Mama akaniambia nitafurahia.

src: He selected the perfect hat and ordered it.
mt: Alibadilisha kofia nzuri na aliamua kuchukua.
ref: Alichagua kofia inayofaa na kuiagiza.

src: Ted asked his parents to help pay and they agreed.
