mt: Ted alimwomba wazazi wake kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na wao kushirikiana na w
ref: Ted akawaomba wazazi wake kumsaidia kulipia na wakakubali.

src: Instead of making breakfast, spent all day looking for them.
mt: Kumbe kulikuwa na wakati wa kujikimu, kumbe kulikuwa na wakati wa kujikimu.
ref: Badala ya kutengeneza kiamsha kinywa, alitumia siku nzima akizitafuta.

src: He spend his first day seeing art work.
mt: Alipendelea siku yake ya kwanza kufurahia kazi za sanaa.
ref: Alitumia siku yake ya kwanza kuangalia kazi za sanaa.

src: Her father knew that Jessica wanted a vacation.
mt: Baba yake alijua Jessica alitaka safari.
ref: Baba yake alijua kwamba Jessica alitaka likizo.

src: Everything made his legs look too long, and silly.
mt: Kila kitu kilimfanya yake kujivua kwa miguu, na kujivua kwa miguu.
ref: Kila kitu kilifanya miguu yake kuonekana mirefu, na mjinga.

src: She also needed to get rid of her old bed.
mt: Alizidi pia kuchukua kifua chake cha zamani.
ref: Alitaka pia kuondoa kitanda chake cha zamani.

src: So, I learned to teach myself on my own.
mt: Kwa hiyo, nilijua kufundisha nikiwa mwenyewe.
ref: Kwa hivyo, nilijifunza kusoma mwenyewe.

src: She stopped at a corner as he was following her.
mt: Aliwakamata kwenye kaskazini wakati akifuatilia.
ref: Akasimama kwenye kona huku akimfuata.

src: He stared up at them in awe.
mt: Alimkosea wakati wa kufurudia.
ref: Akazikazia macho kwa mshangao.

src: When she rinsed it out her hair was white with a blue tinge.
mt: Alipochimba kwa maji yake yalikuwa nyeupe na rangi ya samawati.
ref: Alipoisuuza nywele zake zilikuwa nyeupe na sehemu ndogo za bluu.

src: He prayed to God for snow and went to sleep.
mt: Alimwamini Mungu kwa mvua ya barafu na akashtuka.
ref: Alimwomba Mungu kuwe na theluji na akaenda kulala.

src: She tried to tell them that she got to work with living history.
mt: Alivyokuwa anataka kuwafundisha wao kwamba alifanya kazi na historia ya kawaida.
ref: Akajaribu kuwaambia kwamba anafanya kazi na historia hai.

src: He jumped out of bed, panicked.
mt: Alipokwenda kwenye kingo, alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Akaruka na kutoka kitandani, akiwa na wasiwasi.

src: She swore it was the weirdest thing she'd ever seen.
mt: Aliwamini kwamba hilo lilikuwa kitu kipenzi chake cha kwanza.
ref: Aliapa kwamba lilikuwa jambo la ajabu zaidi amewahi kuona.

src: Her husband came from work to comfort her.
mt: Mke wake alikwenda kazi yake ili kumwokoa.
ref: Mume wake alikuja kutoka kazini kumfariji.

src: We saw lots of dogs and kittens.
mt: Tuliona mengi kwa wanyama na panya.
ref: Tuliwaona mbwa na paka wachanga wengi.

src: Joe didn't ever get As.
mt: Joe hakupata As kwa kila mara.
ref: Joe hakuwahi kupata A.

src: They found a few apartments they liked quite a bit.
mt: Walikuta nyumba chache zinazopendwa sana.
ref: Walipata ghorofa chache ambazo walipenda kiasi.

src: Greta handed out invitations for the party at school.
mt: Greta alipangaarisha kipigano cha kufanya sherehe katika shule.
ref: Greta akapeana mialiko kwa sherehe shuleni.

src: But rain was forecast!
mt: Lakini baridi ilikuwa imechaguliwa!
ref: Lakini kulitabiriwa kutakuwa na mvua!

src: She gave the list of her favorite toys to Santa at the mall.
mt: Aliwapa orodha ya vitabu vyake vikuu kwa Santa katika mabazarani.
ref: Alipeana orodha ya vitu vyake avipendavyo vya kuchezea kwa Santa kwenye jengo lenye maduka mengi.

src: All her fruits and veggies were ready!
mt: Zote zake mizizi na vyakula yalikuwa tayari!
ref: Matunda na mboga zake zote zilikuwa tayari!

src: She grabbed a pair of scissors out of the drawer.
mt: Aliipata kifua cha kawaida kutoka kwa kifaa cha kawaida.
ref: Akachukua makasi kutoka kwa droo.

src: She tried to practice as hard as she could.
mt: Alijaribu kufanya kazi kama zaidi kama alivyoweza.
ref: Alijaribu kufanya mazoezi kwa bidii kadri awezavyo.

src: A few months into dating, Keira started planning her wedding dress.
mt: Baada muda kidogo tukutane, Keira alianza kutoa mikakati ya kufanya kizazi.
ref: Miezi michache wakichumbiana, Keira akaanza kupanga vazi lake la harusi.

src: The dog herded the sheep towards the gate.
mt: Kutoka kwa mbwa kuharibu ndege kuelekea kwa kimbilio.
ref: Mbwa aliwaelekeza kondoo kuelekea mlangoni.

src: He felt guilty though about what his late wife might think.
mt: Alitaka kujitahidi lakini alikuwa na wasiwasi kuhusu nini alivyotaka mke wake aliyefariki.
ref: Alihisi vibaya kuhusu kile marehemu mkewe angekifikiria.

src: All of a sudden a tumbleweed hit Marina's legs really hard.
mt: Kabla hajawasikia, tumbo la mchanga lilibakia kwa kasi kwa miguu ya Marina.
ref: Kwa ghafla jani liotalo jangwani likagonga mguu wa Marina kwa nguvu sana.

src: I purchased my tickets from a reputable online lottery agent.
mt: Nilipata tiketi zangu kutoka kwa agenti wa michezo ya kifedha ya kujulikana.
ref: Nilinunua tikiti zangu kutoka kwa wakala anayesifika wa bahati nasibu mtandaoni.

src: The information is complex and in depth.
mt: Ujumbe ni kubwa na kwa wingi.
ref: Maelezo hayo ni changamani na ya ndani.

src: The day of, I was nauseous and jittery.
mt: Jana, nilikuwa na ugonjwa na kujitukana.
ref: Siku hiyo, nilikuwa na kichefuchefu na tumbo joto.

src: First, they played with Mike's quadcopters for a long time.
mt: Kwanza, waliwinda na Mike kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Mwanzo, walicheza na ndege ya Mike kwa muda mrefu.

src: The guests noticed the bill after a while and took a hint.
mt: Wageni wakakuta mkopo baada muda na wakapata neno.
ref: Wageni hao wakagundua bili hiyo baada ya muda na wakaelewa.

src: Her mother helped her unpack her car.
mt: Mama yake alimshirikisha kufichua gari lake.
ref: Mama yake alimsaidia kutoa vitu ndani ya gari lake.

src: Unfortunately they got into a fight.
mt: Kwa hakika wakapigana.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya walipigana.

src: However, he did not give up hope.
mt: Aliyekuwa na uongozi huyo hakutaka kubakia.
ref: Hata hivyo, hakukata tamaa.

src: By accident, I slipped into the deep part of the pool.
mt: Kwa ajili ya ajabu, nimepotea katika sehemu ya juu ya baini.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, niliteleza na kuingia katika sehemu ya dimbwi yenye kina kirefu.

src: Everyone was sad when they sat down in front of the Christmas tree.
mt: Wote walikuwa na hasira wakati wakapiga kura chini ya mti wa Krismasi.
ref: Kila mtu alihuzunika walipokaa chini mbele ya mti wa Krisimasi.

src: When she was supposed to go home, she decided to stay in Spain.
mt: Alipokuwa anatakiwa kuenda nyumbani, aliamua kuendelea kwa Hispania.
ref: Alipotakiwa kwenda nyumbani, aliamua kuishi Uhispania.

src: She forgot about it after a few days.
mt: Aliwaza baada ya muda.
ref: Akasahau kuihusu baada ya siku chache.

src: Ted didn't know how to swim.
mt: Ted hakuwajua namna ya kupona.
ref: Ted hakujua jinsi ya kuogelea.

src: I was so excited for our date together.
mt: Nilikuwa na hamu sana kwa tukio letu pamoja.
ref: Nilisisimka sana kwa kuonana kwetu.

src: We visited almost all of the exhibits, but did not see any sloths.
mt: Tulipofika kwa kila kifaa, lakini hatukuona chochote cha kipenzi.
ref: Tulitembelea karibu maonyesho yote, lakini sikuona slothi wowote.

src: Other scientists gather to help him with his work.
mt: Wanasayansi wengine wakati wa kushirikiana na kufanya kazi yake.
ref: Wanasayansi wengine wakakusanyika kumsaidia na kazi yake.

src: They also colored and played with finger paints.
mt: Wao pia walivipigia rangi na kucheza na rangi za miguu.
ref: Walipaka rangi pia na kucheza na rangi za vidole.

src: She began jogging everyday.
mt: Alianza kufanya mashindano kila siku.
ref: Akaanza kukimbia kila siku.

src: India prepared the coffee in the machine for the beverage.
mt: India alitayarisha kahawa katika mashine kwa ajili ya bidhaa.
ref: India akatengeneza kahawa katika mashine ya vinywaji.

src: One day she went into her room and found a hamster in a cage.
mt: Mmoja alipofika katika nyumba yake alikuta hamsteri katika kifaru.
ref: Siku moja alienda chumbani mwake na akapata panya buku ndani ya kizimba.

src: Her friends tell her that Biology is too tough for her.
mt: Wanafunzi wake wanamwambia kwamba Biolojia ni kubwa kwa yeye.
ref: Marafiki wake walimwambia Biolojia ni ngumu sana kwake.

src: She took a woodworking course to learn how to build it.
mt: Alijiandaa kwa masomo ya kuchipua ili kujifunza jinsi ya kujenga.
ref: Akafanya kozi ya useremala ili kujifunza jinsi ya kuitengeneza.

src: Some of the chains had been broken.
mt: Kama ilivyoelezwa, sehemu ya vitambaa vilivyopigwa vimepata hatari.
ref: Baadhi ya minyororo ilikuwa imevunjika.

src: Bo hopped in his Mustang and Jim hopped in his Corvette.
mt: Bo alipanda Mustang yake na Jim alipanda Corvette yake.
ref: Bo akaingia kwenye Mustang yake na Jim akaingie kwenye Corvette yake.

src: She saw a beautiful robin in her nest.
mt: Aliiona robin kama mchungu katika koo yake.
ref: Aliona ndege maridadi ndani ya kiota chake.

src: She had three holes in one during their game.
mt: Aliweka mabao mawili mawili wakati wa mchezo wao.
ref: Alikuwa na alama tatu kwa wakati mmoja wakati wa mchezo wao.

src: We videoed as he sliced an onion behind his back.
mt: Kwa kipindi hiki, tumetumia video kama alivyotengeneza kipande cha kungu kichwani.
ref: Tulimchukua video akikata kitunguu bila yeye kujua.

src: Then she started acting out.
mt: Baadaye alianza kufanya kazi.
ref: Kisha akaanza kujifanya.

src: I got lost because I did not have any equipment on me.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepotea kwa sababu nilikuwa bila vitu vyakavu.
ref: Nilipotea kwa sababu sikuwa na chombo chochote.

src: Hailey was still determined.
mt: Hailey alikuwa bado tayari.
ref: Hailey alikuwa bado ameazimia.

src: He took the piece of metal to an appraiser.
mt: Alifika kwa kipande cha metali kwa mtaalamu.
ref: Akapeleke kipande hicho cha kito kwa mtaalamu.

src: When the contest started, they dug in.
mt: Wakati wa kuanza mashindano, waliingia kwenye kifua.
ref: Wakati shindano lilianza, wakanza kula.

src: His friends quickly rushed to his aid.
mt: Wapenzi wake wakati mmoja wakarudi kwa upendo.
ref: Marafiki wake wakakuja kumsaidia kwa haraka.

src: They were bad in the store and screamed a lot.
mt: Walikuwa wabaya katika duka na wakasema sana.
ref: Walikuwa wabaya dukani na walipiga kelele sana.

src: He took a speech class over the summer to help.
mt: Alifanya kazi kwa kufundisha kwa kipindi cha kesho cha majuma kwa ajili ya kutupa.
ref: Akajiandikisha kwa darasa la hotuba wakati wa majira ya joto ili kupata msaada.

src: I soon got really thirsty.
mt: Nilikuwa nimepata kujikima sana.
ref: Punde si punde nikapatwa na kiu sana.

src: She painted a self portrait of herself one day.
mt: Aliyemaanisha picha yake kwa ajili ya kujitambua siku moja.
ref: Alichora picha yake mwenyewe siku moja.

src: He practiced jabs and jumped rope for hours each day.
mt: Alifanya kama kujibu na kufanya kipande kipande kwa saa kwa saa.
ref: alijifunza kurusha ngumi na kuruka kamba saa kadhaa kila siku.

src: The kids enjoyed swimming at the water park.
mt: Watu wachanga walikuwa wakipenda kupiga maji katika mabara ya maji.
ref: Watoto walifurahia kuogelea katika bustani ya maji.

src: He started yelling all of a sudden.
mt: Alizunguka kwa kusema kwa kawaida.
ref: Akaanza kupiga kelele kwa ghafla.

src: If she lost 10 more he would do skin removal.
mt: Kama alipoteza 10 zaidi yeye atakufa na kufa kwa kushusha.
ref: Iwapo atapoteza 10 zaidi atamfanyia upasuaji wa kuondoa ngozi.

src: While Jenny was replying to a text she took her eyes off the road.
mt: Jenny alipokuwa akirepona maelezo yake alitaka macho yake kutoka barabara.
ref: Jenny akijibu ujumbe mfupi aliondoa macho yake barabarani.

src: The dealer helped set up a payment plan for her.
mt: Debati alifanya kazi za kufanya mkataba wa kipa mbele yake.
ref: Muuzaji alimsaidia kupanga mpango wake wa malipo.

src: He was afraid the repair would prove costly.
mt: Alimwamini kwamba utafiti huu utakuwa ghali.
ref: Alihofia ukarabati unaweza kugharimu sana.

src: Ned moved closer and saw that it was a bunch of tiny baby possums.
mt: Ned alikuwa karibu na kuona kwamba ni kundi la wadogo wadogo wa possum.
ref: Ned akasogea karibu na kuona kwamba walikuwa ni vifaurongo wengi wadogo.

src: Don decided that this friend would no longer be his friend.
mt: Don aliamua kwamba rafiki huyo hakuwa tena rafiki yake.
ref: Don akaamua kwamba rafiki yake hatakuwa rafiki yake tena.

src: I had no idea where she was.
mt: Nilikuwa hajui wapi alikuwa.
ref: Sikujua alikuwa wapi.

src: I don't know why I said yes to a date, but I did.
mt: Sijui nimekubali nini kwa kufanya tukio, lakini nimekubali.
ref: Sijui ni kwa nini nilisema ndiyo kwa miadi, lakini nilikubali.

src: But the waitress forgot to tell her that the bowl was hot.
mt: Lakini kwa sababu kama kwamba mchuzi alikosa kusema kwamba chupa ilikuwa ina moto.
ref: Lakini mhudumu alisahau kumwambia kuwa bakuli lilikuwa moto.

src: One day she decides to take backstroke lessons from an expert swimmer.
mt: Yule mwanamke mmoja alikuwa anamchukua maswali kuhusu mawazo yake.
ref: Siku moja anaamua kujifunza somo la kuogelea kinyumenyume kutoka kwa mtaalam wa kuogelea.

src: Once I arrived in town I decided to stop for coffee.
mt: Baada ya kuwepo mjini nilisikia kula kopi.
ref: Mara tu nilipofika mjini niliamua kusimama kunywa kahawa.

src: Just as she was about to take a bite the family dog walked by.
mt: Kama alivyokuwa anatarajia kula, mbwa wa familia alipita.
ref: Alipokuwa tu karibu kuuma, mbwa wa familia akaingia.

src: We both had to dress formally in order to get a table.
mt: Kila mmoja alitaka kufanya kazi kwa kawaida ili kupata nafasi.
ref: Sote tulilazimika kuvaa rasmi ili kupata nafasi ya meza.

src: He found a clearing in the woods and set up camp.
mt: Alipata kifua cha mawimbi katika mazingira na kufanya kampeni.
ref: Alipata nafasi katika misitu na akaweka kambi.

src: He called his neighbor for a jump start.
mt: Alimwambia jirani yake kwa kupanga kwa kipindi cha kwanza.
ref: Aliita jirani yake awashe gari lake na waya.

src: Then the agent told her something wonderful.
mt: Baadaye mshambuliaji alimwambia kitu kingema.
ref: Kisha wakala akamwambia kitu kizuri.

src: Although she has a good pension, she was still nervous.
mt: Alipokuwa na bima ya kazi nzuri, alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Ingawa ana pensheni nzuri, alikuwa bado na wasiwasi.

src: They wagered their points on one last game.
mt: Waliwakilisha vipengele vyao katika mchezo mmoja wa mwisho.
ref: Wakaweka dau ya alama zao kwenye mchezo mmoja wa mwisho.

src: She was afraid something would go wrong.
mt: Alimwamini kwamba kitu kitakapokwama.
ref: Alikwua na wasiwasi mambo yataenda vibaya.

src: Then he heard the sad story behind it.
mt: Baadaye alikuta habari ya kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuhusu kuh
ref: Kisha akasikia historia yake.

src: Mark and Frank had fun tossing the ball back and forth.
mt: Mark na Frank walifurahia kushika na kushika mpira.
ref: Mark na Frank walifurahi kurusha mpira mbele na nyuma.

src: That night, he met Brenda at the campfire.
mt: Jana, alijadili na Brenda katika moto.
ref: Usiku huo, akakutana na Brenda kwenye moto wa kambi.

src: Vince drove his car to Yogurtland.
mt: Vince alikuwa anavyotembea gari yake Yogurtland.
ref: Vince akaendesha gari lake kwenda Yogurtland.

src: Soon he felt confident enough to shoot a few hoops himself.
mt: Kisha muda mrefu alikuwa na uwezo wa kuona kama alivyo na uwezo wa kucheza kwa kujaribu kucheza kwa kujaribu.
ref: Hivi karibuni alihisi ana uhakika kabisa wa kupiga mabao chache mwenyewe.

src: Then a woman approached him and told him about a shelter nearby.
mt: Baadaye, mwanamke alikuja na kusema kwamba kuna chumba cha kujitafutia kwa karibu.
ref: Kisha mwanamke mmoja akamwendea na akamwambia kuhusu makazi karibu.

src: One day, Josh got stung by a bee.
mt: Jumamosi, Josh alipigwa na mbuni.
ref: Siku moja, Josh akaumwa na nyuki.

src: We were desperate for money.
mt: Tulikuwa na hamu ya fedha.
ref: Tulikuwa tukitamani sana pesa.

src: He developed a crush on her.
mt: Alipata uongozi kwa yeye.
ref: Akaanza kumtamani.

src: When she came upon the cookie aisle she knew exactly what she wanted.
mt: Alipokutana na barabara ya cookie alijua kama alivyo.
ref: Alipofika kwenye barabara biskuti alijua anachotaka.

src: Jenny and Bob drove to the movies.
mt: Jenny na Bob walikuwa wakimwaga ndege.
ref: Jenny na Bob waliendesha gari kwenda kwenye filamu.

src: I drove through lots of mud puddles.
mt: Nilipita kwa kiasi kikubwa kwa maji ya chini.
ref: Nikaendesha kupitia madimbwi mengi ya matope.

src: When Peter saw Bernie he cheered as loudly as possible.
mt: Peter alipose Peter alimwona Bernie alimwambia kama zaidi kama yeye anaweza.
ref: Peter alipomwona Bernie alifurahia kwa sauti kubwa awezavyo.

src: The researcher decided to give Josh a bonus.
mt: Watafiti wakapanga kutoa Josh bonus.
ref: Mtafiti akaamuaa kumpa Josh bonasi.

src: One day he gained the courage to upload one.
mt: Yupo siku moja alikubali kupakia moja.
ref: Siku moja akapata ujasiri wa kupakia moja.

src: I told the man I didn't have any money.
mt: Nilisema kwa mwanamume nilikuwa bila pesa.
ref: Nikamwambia yule mtu sina pesa.

src: But the librarian was not in in the library.
mt: Lakini mwalimu alikuwa hawakati katika chumba cha vitabu.
ref: Lakini mkutubi hakuwa kwenye maktaba.

src: She prepared to swim back, but then she stopped.
mt: Aliamua kufika, lakini hatimaye akakata.
ref: Akajiandaa kuogelea kurudi, lakini kisha akasimama.

src: His bike had lasted until he outgrew it.
mt: Kabla hajatoka katika kipindi cha kuzidi, biki yake ilikuwa imepata mwisho.
ref: Baiskeli yake ilidumu hadi hakutoshea tena.

src: When jack was exiting he was walking hand in hand with another girl.
mt: Juma alipokuwa akiacha kwa kujitolea alikuwa akimwaga miguu na mwanamke mwingine.
ref: Jack alipokuwa anatoka alikuwa akiambatana na msichana mwingine.

src: He decided to go in and even stay the night there.
mt: Alisema atakapofika atakaa huko.
ref: Akaamua kuingia ndani na hata kulala usiku hapo.

src: She took her baby to the studio and had her ears pierced.
mt: Aliingiza mtoto wake katika studio na kufanya kipenzi cha kichwa cha mtoto wake.
ref: Alimpeleka mtoto wake studio na akatobolewa masikio.

src: Her mom loved them putting them in vase on the table.
mt: Mama yake alivifurahia kufunika kwa kipande cha kuchoma katika kiti.
ref: Mama yake aliyapenda akayaweka kwenye chombo juu ya meza.

src: Before I could leave the store the security had already grabbed me.
mt: Kabla hajamini nimeacha duka, usalama wamechukua.
ref: Kabla kuweza kuondoka kwenye duka tayari mlinzi ulikuwa umenishika.

src: Today was not only his last game, it was also the championship.
mt: Leo si tu ilikuwa kile mwisho, bali pia ilikuwa ni mashindano.
ref: Leo haukuwa mchezo wake wa mwisho tu, pia ilikuwa mashindano ya ubingwa.

src: When the party was done, her parents told her to go outside.
mt: Baada ya kufanyika kwa kipindi, wazazi wakawajibika kwa kusema kwa kuenda nje.
ref: Sherehe ilipomalizika, wazazi wake walimwambia aende nje.

src: A customer and cashier struck up a conversation with Darlene.
mt: Mwanaaji na mtumaji wakati wa kujadili na Darlene.
ref: Mteja na keshia wakaanza mazungumzo na Darlene.

src: Since the dining hall food was subpar we decided to cook.
mt: Kwa sababu chakula cha jiko la chakula kina chafu tulikata tukata.
ref: Kwa kuwa chakula cha ukumbi wa kulia kilikuwa cha kawaida tuliamua kupika.

src: I fell in love with a dog named Toby.
mt: Nilipenda kufurahia mbwa jina lake ni Toby.
ref: Nikapenda sana mbwa aliyeitwa Toby.

src: Tony gathered the ingredients that he needed.
mt: Tony alikusanya vitu vyake vya kipekee.
ref: Tony alikusanya viungo ambavyo alihitaji.

src: He kept following her places in public and sending her creepy messages.
mt: Alimuita kwa mara nyingi mahali yake katika vyombo vya kijamii na kuwasiliana naye kwa mara nyingi kwa njia za kujitetea.
ref: Aliendelea kumfuata katika maeneo ya umma na kumtumia ujumbe wa kusisimua.

src: He would make four of them every morning when he woke up.
mt: Angejenga zaidi ya nne kila mchana wakati anapokwama.
ref: Angetengeneza nne kila asubuhi alipoamka.

src: The boy started crying very loudly.
mt: Kijana alianza kujisikia sana.
ref: Mvulana huyo akaanza kulia kwa sauti kubwa sana.

src: The noise of it was so irritating.
mt: Nguvu ya kusema yalikuwa kama ilivyokuwa na nguvu.
ref: Kelele yake ilikuwa inakera sana.

src: Things quickly deteriorated as we kept drinking.
mt: Kila mara mabadiliko yalipata kasi kama tulivyokuwa na kula.
ref: Mambo yaliharibika haraka tulipokuwa tukiendelea kunywa.

src: Jen screamed even louder and now with profanities.
mt: Jen alisema zaidi na sasa na mawazo ya kiburi.
ref: Jen alipiga kelele hata zaidi na sasa na matusi.

src: After a lot of work, finally the film was done.
mt: Baada ya kazi nyingi, tukumbuke, filamu ilifika.
ref: Baada ya kazi nyingi, mwishowe filamu hiyo ilikamilika.

src: Sam felt extremely nervous.
mt: Sam alikuwa na wasiwasi kubwa.
ref: Sam alihisi wasiwasi mwingi.

src: She started to cry.
mt: Alianza kujisalimisha.
ref: Akaanza kulia.

src: Slowly she started unpacking them and organizing their contents.
mt: Kwa kujitahidi alianza kupakia zile na kufanya zao kama zilivyo.
ref: Polepole alianza kuzifungua na kupanga yaliyomo.

src: Her friends hadn't seen her in a while.
mt: Wanawake wake waliwahi kuona.
ref: Marafiki wake walikuwa hawajamuona kwa muda.

src: He was invited to a statistics contest for young children.
mt: Alitambuliwa kwa kushirikiana katika mashindano ya hisabati kwa watoto wadogo.
ref: Alialikwa kwenye mashindano ya takwimu ya watoto wadogo.

src: He pulled over and checked his tire.
mt: Alipiga barabara na kuchunguza kizembe chake.
ref: Alisimama na akaangalia tairi lake.

src: Samantha walks the trails to enjoy the colorful leaves.
mt: Samantha anapita barabara kwa ajili ya kushukia na majani yaliyopigwa rangi.
ref: Samantha hutembea kwenye njia ili kufurahia majani yenye rangi mbalimbali.

src: He went to bed hoping he would be saved by a snow day.
mt: Alishtuka kwa kumwamini kwamba atapata siku ya barafu.
ref: Alienda kitandani akitumaini ataokolewa na siku ya theluji.

src: The sheriff was hot on their trail.
mt: Kabla ya kuwepo kwa sherif, wakati huo wote ulikuwa wazi.
ref: Sheriff alikuwa akiwafuatilia kabisa.

src: Josie saw the spider crawl up the wall.
mt: Josie aliona pua kufika juu ya kivuli.
ref: Josie akaona buibui akitambaa juu ya ukuta.

src: He picked it up and it was filled with cash.
mt: Alipiga kichwa chake, ilikuwa na pesa.
ref: Akaichukua na ulikuwa umejaa pesa taslimu.

src: He passed his certification course and then dived every day.
mt: Alipita kwa kufanya kazi yake ya kusajili na kufanya kila siku kujipanga.
ref: Alifaulu kozi yake ya udhibitisho na kisha akapiga mbizi kila siku.

src: I watched for a while and they said the hostages were shot.
mt: Nilimwona kwa muda na wao walisema waliwaua wale waliotajwa.
ref: Nilitazama kwa muda na wakasema watekwa nyara walipigwa risasi.

src: One summer she took a rake and attempted to pull one in.
mt: Kwa muda mmoja alikuwa anapiga kisasi na kujaribu kupiga moja.
ref: Msimu mmoja wa joto alichukua reki na akajaribu kuvuta moja.

src: He followed the instructions and carefully prepared the ingredients.
mt: Alifuata masharti na kujituma katika kutayarisha vitu.
ref: Alifuata maagizo na akaandaa viungo kwa uangalifu.

src: He forgot to bring spare clothes to change into.
mt: Alisahau kutupa nguo za kusherehekea.
ref: Alisahau kuleta nguo za ziada kubadilisha.

src: She fought the smile that tried to creep across her face.
mt: Aliheshimu kushindwa kwa kujitahidi kuchipua.
ref: Alificha tabasamu ambalo lilijaribu kuonekana usoni mwake.

src: Cole was well-behaved for months after that.
mt: Kwa miongoi baada ya hapo, Cole alikuwa na uhusiano mzuri.
ref: Cole alikuwa na tabia nzuri kwa miezi kadhaa baada ya hapo.

src: He then decided to spin a globe and go where his finger landed.
mt: Alibatiliza kuzingira mabara na kufika mahali ambako mabara yake yalipata.
ref: Kisha akaamua kuzungusha ramani ya tufe na kwenda mahali kidole chake kilipotua.

src: She put the bag in the microwave and pushed the popcorn button.
mt: Aliwapa kiti katika mabati na kupanga nafasi ya kuku.
ref: Akaweka begi kwenye wimbi maikro na akabonyeza kitufe cha bisi.

src: We found out that they were celebrating the wife's birthday.
mt: Kwamba wanaendana kwa siku ya kuzaliwa kwa mke yao.
ref: Tuligundua kuwa walikuwa wakisherehekea siku ya mkewe kuzaliwa.

src: She realized the boy next door got home from school at 3:00 every day.
mt: Alijua mtoto wa nyumbani alikuwa anapata nyumbani kwa saa 3:00 kila siku.
ref: Aligundua kijana wa jirani hufika nyumbani kutoka shule saa 3:00 kila siku.

src: Disgusted, we called the pizza place to complain.
mt: Kwa hivyo, tulipiga simu kwa duka la pizza ili tuwakilie.
ref: Kwa kuchukizwa, tukapigia simu mahali pa pizza kulalamika.

src: He took a bite out of it.
mt: Alifanya kula nje ya kitu.
ref: Aliuma kidogo.

src: He took it to the paint shop to get it repainted.
mt: Alifika kwa gari lake kwa kuchapisha tena.
ref: Alilipeleka kwenye duka la rangi lipakwe rangi tena.

src: Last week was especially bad.
mt: Jumamosi ilikuwa hasara kubwa.
ref: Wiki iliyopita ilikuwa mbaya sana.

src: Joe was badly injured!
mt: Joe alikuwa na afya mbaya!
ref: Joe aliumia vibaya!

src: That night there was a bad rainy storm.
mt: Jana kulikuwa na mvua ya kawaida.
ref: Usiku huo kulikuwa na dhoruba mbaya ya mvua.

src: With a gleeful yelp, he began constructing a snowman.
mt: Kwa kujifungua kwa kujifungua, alianza kujenga mnyama wa barafu.
ref: Kwa unyende wa kupendeza, alianza kujenga mtu wa theluji.

src: John decided to do something about this.
mt: John aliamua kufanya kitu kuhusu hiki.
ref: John aliamua kurekebisha jambo hili.

src: Harold looked all over town, but could not find the house.
mt: Harold alitafuta kila mahali katika mji, lakini hakutambua nyumba.
ref: Harold alitafuta kima mahali mjini, lakini hakuweza kupata nyumba hiyo.

src: The lady finished and asked if she wanted fingernail polish as well.
mt: Msichana akifikia akasema kama anataka kipolisi kwa mabavu.
ref: Binti huyo akamaliza na kuuliza ikiwa alitaka kupakwa rangi za kucha pia.

src: It was David's first time ever being on a boat, so he was nervous.
mt: David alikuwa kwanza kufika kwenye meli, hivyo alikuwa na wasiwasi.
ref: Ilikuwa mara ya kwanza kwa David kuwa kwenye mashua, kwa hivyo alikuwa na wasiwasi.

src: However, she looked away when it was being prepared.
mt: Lakini aliondoka wakati wa kujifungua.
ref: Walakini, aliangalia kando alipokuwa ikiandaliwa.

src: I had to wait several hours for my mom to pick me up.
mt: Nilipata nafasi kwa muda mrefu kwa mama yangu kuchukua.
ref: Nililazimika nisubiri saa kadhaa ili mama yangu anichukue.

src: She sat on the porch swing watching the squirrels run around.
mt: Aliwakililia kwa muda kwenye kiti cha kwa wanyama wanaoendesha.
ref: Alikaa kwenye bembea ya veranda akiangalia virukanjia wakikimbia kimbia.

src: I did not read the instructions well.
mt: Nilikuwa si nimeangalia masharti kwa vizuri.
ref: Sikusoma maagizo vizuri.

src: Jane went to three classes with the professional juggler.
mt: Jane alifika kwa mara tatu katika vyuo vya kujaribu kwa mwanamke mwenye kipaji cha kujaribu.
ref: Jane akaenda kwa darasa tatu na mtaalam wa kughushi.

src: One night he didn't have the sauce for the noodles.
mt: Jumamosi mmoja alikuwa hakupata saa kwa pilipili.
ref: Usiku mmoja hakuwa na mchuzi wa tambi.

src: Grandpa didn't know if she wanted chocolate or strawberry.
mt: Jamaa hakuwajua kama alitaka chokole au chakula cha ndizi.
ref: Babu hakujua iwapo anataka chokoleti au stroberi.

src: Each one of them took turns telling a scary story.
mt: Kila mmoja wao alitumia muda wake kuwafundisha kisa cha kufurudisha.
ref: Kila mmoja wao alichukua zamu ya kusimulia hadithi ya kutisha.

src: Jasper decides to buy a special anti-dandruff shampoo.
mt: Jasper anataka kupata shampi ya kisasa ya kupambana na dandora.
ref: Jasper anaamua kununua shampuu maalum ya kuzuia mba.

src: Bob didn't know Jane, but that didn't matter.
mt: Bob hakuwa na habari juu ya Jane, lakini hivyo haikubalasubisha.
ref: Bob hakujua Jane, lakini hiyo haikuwa muhimu.

src: But as she waited, she grew nervous, not seeing her luggage.
mt: Lakini wakati akifurudia, alikuwa na wasiwasi, hakupata kifani chake.
ref: Lakini alivyoendelea suburi, aliingiwa na woga, kukosa kuona mzigo wake.

src: She slowly cut down how much she was smoking.
mt: Aliyafanya kazi kwa kasi alivuruga kiasi cha kutumia dawa.
ref: Alipunguza polepole kiasi ambacho alikuwa akivuta.

src: Her dad insisted they keep driving instead of making a food stop.
mt: Baba yake alisema wajitokeze kwa kuendesha bila kufanya kikao cha chakula.
ref: Baba yake alisisitiza waendelee kuendesha gari badala ya kusimama kununua chakula.

src: When Ray and his friends went to the beach, they noticed Ray's body.
mt: Wakati Ray na wenzake wakafika pwani, wakajua mwili wa Ray.
ref: Wakati Ray na marafiki wake walikwenda pwani, waligundua mwili wa Ray.

src: She found out that her favorite band's performance was cancelled.
mt: Alijua kwamba kazi ya bendi yake ya kufanya kazi ilikuwa imechukuliwa.
ref: Aligundua kuwa maonyesho ya bendi anayopenda yalibatilishwa.

src: People suggested he should work in radio.
mt: Watu walimwambia aweze kufanya kazi katika redio.
ref: Watu walipendekeza anapaswa kufanya kazi katika redio.

src: Larry packed his bags and drove to Idaho.
mt: Larry alipanga vitamboni vyake na kuingia Idaho.
ref: Larry alifunganya mifuko yake na akasafiri kwenda Idaho.

src: There was however a soda vending machine.
mt: Kuna maboti ya soda.
ref: Hata hivyo kulikuwa na mashine ya kuuza soda.

src: Reba spent her entire life doing good deeds.
mt: Reba alifanya kila kitu kibali chake.
ref: Reba alitumia maisha yake yote kufanya matendo mema.

src: Cindy said she was not going to cook until she got help cleaning.
mt: Cindy alisema hakuwa na nia ya kujifungua hadi alipokwenda kupata msaada wa kuweka nyumba.
ref: Cindy alisema kuwa hatapika kupika hadi atakapopata usaidizi wa kusafisha.

src: One day, he saw a pretty girl buying peppermints in the store.
mt: Jana, aliona dada mremara anapochukua mabati ya kijani katika duka.
ref: Siku moja, alimuona msichana mrembo akinunua peremende kali dukani.

src: His book was about frogs.
mt: Kitabu chake kuhusu nyoka.
ref: Kitabu chake kilikuwa kuhusu vyura.

src: So I went to the pen shop at my local mall.
mt: Kwa hivyo nilipata duka la peni katika mabara ya kule yangu.
ref: Kwa hivyo nikaenda kwenye duka la kalamu lililokuwa karibu.

src: They drank wine and talked with the couples that were there.
mt: Walipika vino na kuongea na wale waliokuwepo.
ref: Wakanywa divai na kuzungumza na wenzi wa ndoa waliokuwepo.

src: He auditioned for american idol and got in.
mt: Alifanya uchaguzi kwa mtoto wa mungu na kufika.
ref: Akafanya jaribio la american idol na akakubaliwa.

src: He ate all different flavors of wings.
mt: Ala chakula kila aina ya wing.
ref: Alikula ladha zote tofauti za mabawa.

src: They also play it at night, unfortunately.
mt: Wanacheza pia usiku, hasa.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya, wanacheza pia usiku.

src: Instead of gold, he found many small blue and green stones.
mt: Anayejiita kinyume cha dhahabu, alijifungua mabati mengi ya kijivu na kibulu.
ref: Badala ya dhahabu, alipata mawe mengi madogo ya bluu na kijani.

src: She suggests they go shopping for a new dog.
mt: Anasema waweze kupanda kwa biashara kwa mbwa mpya.
ref: Akapendekeza waende dukani kununua mbwa mpya.

src: Thankfully she was the first one to arrive.
mt: Naam, alikuwa mwanamke pekee aliyefika.
ref: Kwa uzuri alikuwa mtu wa kwanza kuwasili.

src: However, when the baby came, she felt otherwise.
mt: Lakini, wakati mchama alipotokea, alikuwa na mawazo tofauti.
ref: Hata hivyo, wakati mtoto alipozaliwa, alihisi kivingine.

src: At lunch time, another student approached him.
mt: Jioni, mtu mwingine alikuja na kumwambia.
ref: Wakati wa chakula cha mchana, mwanafunzi mwingine alimkujia.

src: I found an old one with mold in it.
mt: Nilipata moja kibaya na kipindukia.
ref: Nilipata kimoja kizee chenye kuvu.

src: Jason buys a PC at home to become more familiar with it.
mt: Jason anapewa kompyuta ya kijiji chake ili kuwa na uzoefu zaidi nayo.
ref: Jason akanunua PC nyumbani ili aweze kuielewa zaidi.

src: We had a leisurely breakfast.
mt: Kweli tulikula chakula cha asubuhi kwa ajili ya kujifungua.
ref: Tulipata kiamsha kinywa tukipumzika.

src: I found a box of pancake mix eventually.
mt: Nilipata kifaa cha kupika kwa kuku cha mwisho.
ref: Mshiwowe nikapata pakiti ya mchanganyiko wa keki.

src: Unfortunately the niece had too much energy.
mt: Kwa hakika jamaa alikuwa na zaidi ya nguvu.
ref: Kwa bahati mbaya mpwa alikuwa na nguvu nyingi sana.

src: Later, she finds a purse to match the shoes.
mt: Baadaye, anafika kwa kilele cha kipande cha kifua cha kufaa na kipande cha kipande cha kifua cha kufaa.
ref: Baadaye, alipata pochi inayofanana na viatu.

src: Erica told her professor her situation.
mt: Erica alisema kwa mwalimu wake uhusiano wake.
ref: Erica akamwambia profesa kuhusu hali yake.

src: One year, he decided to be Jason and hide under his garage door.
mt: Kwa mwaka mmoja, alisema kujifanya kuwa Jason na kuacha chini ya pua yake ya gari.
ref: Mwaka mmoja, akaamua kuwa Jason na kujificha chini ya mlango wake wa gereji.

src: Ben was frightened by odd noises he heard coming from the darkness.
mt: Ben alikuwa na wasiwasi kutokana na saa za ajabu ambazo alikuta zikiwamo kwenye upeo.
ref: Ben alitishwa na sauti zisizo za kawaida alizozisikia zikitoka gizani.

src: Barry looked through the yellow pages for a nearby bowling alley.
mt: Barry alipata kwa pana za kijani kwa duka la kubwaga karibu.
ref: Barry alitafuta kwenye orodha ya majina na simu ya ukumbi ulio karibu wa kuvingirisha matufe.

src: They laid out a blanket and began to set out their food.
mt: Wakalipiza kifungo na kuanza kutoa chakula chao.
ref: Wakatandaza blanketi na kuanza kuweka chakula chao.

src: He invited Allison to go to the concert with him.
mt: Alimwita Allison kufika kwa kikao na yeye.
ref: Akamwalika Allison kwenda kwenye tamasha hilo pamoja na yeye.

src: Her obsession followed her all through school.
mt: Kabila lake lilimwaga kwa kila siku katika shule.
ref: Tamaa yake ilimfuata shuleni.

src: From there they went to the movie theater, to see a superhero movie.
mt: Wakafika huko wakapata ndege ya kuchora filamu, kuchora filamu ya mnyama.
ref: Kutoka hapo walienda sinema, kuona filamu ya mashujaa hodari.

src: They built a tall snowman and a snow fort.
mt: Wao waliweka mnyama wa barafu na kifungo cha barafu.
ref: Wakatengeneza mtu mrefu wa theluji na kasri ya theluji.

src: I had a hard time getting it out since my pockets were tight.
mt: Nilikuwa na shida kubaini kwa sababu kifani changu kilikuwa na upeo mdogo.
ref: Nilikuwa na wakati mgumu wa kuitoa kwa kuwa mifuko yangu ilikuwa imebana.

src: Sometimes he'll go out and stand while watching.
mt: Maradhi hujitahidi kufanya kazi yoyote.
ref: Wakati mwingine ataenda nje na kusimama huku akitazama.

src: It is required that Garry have good grades to be on the football team.
mt: Garry anatakiwa kufanya vizuri kwa masomo ili awe katika timu ya mpira.
ref: Inahitajika kwamba Garry awe na gredi nzuri ili ajiunge na timu ya mpira wa miguu.

src: She was so offended!
mt: Aliwakumbuka!
ref: Alikasirika sana!

src: One day his sister took him to a yoga class.
mt: Juma moja akatupa ndugu yake kwa kikundi cha yoga.
ref: Siku moja dada yake alimpeleka kwenye darasa la yoga.

src: She decided she had no choice but to buy him new shoes.
mt: Aliamua kuwa hakuna nafasi nyingine ila kupata kwa yeye vitu vya kawaida.
ref: Akaamua hakuwa na namna nyingine bali kumnunulia viatu vipya.

src: Harry called his friends and set up the plans.
mt: Harry alitumia simu kwa wenzake na kufanya mpango.
ref: Harry aliwapigia simu marafiki wake na kuweka mipango.

src: His friend went to his house and taught him.
mt: Kaka yake alifika nyumbani yake na kukuza.
ref: Rafiki yake alienda nyumbani mwake na kumfunza.

src: After a year, Meghan wanted more responsibility at work.
mt: Baada ya mwaka, Meghan alitaka kujitolea zaidi kazi.
ref: Baada ya mwaka mmoja, Meghan alitaka majukumu zaidi kazini.

src: She swept the glass under the rug.
mt: Aliwasha kumbi chini ya kifani.
ref: Akafagia glasi hizo chini ya zulia.

src: Eventually, he was able to solve half of it.
mt: Kwa hatua, alifaulu nusu ya kitendo hicho.
ref: Mwishowe, aliweza kutatua nusu yake.

src: Tim surprised her a week before her birthday.
mt: Tim alimwambia mke wake siku chache kabla ya siku yake ya kuzaliwa.
ref: Tim alishutukiza wiki moja kabla ya siku yake ya kuzaliwa.

src: She added mushrooms.
mt: Alifanya kama kama.
ref: Akaongezea uyoga.

src: I decided on the mall seeing as how they have a large variety.
mt: Nilichagua kwa kuhudhuria kwa sababu wao wana nafasi kubwa.
ref: Nikaamua kwenda kwenye jengo la maduka mengi kuwa hao wana aina mbalimbali.

src: She spent the rest of her money on a lottery ticket.
mt: Aliwakaribisha wakati mwingine wakati wa kushindwa kwa fedha zake.
ref: Alitumia pesa zake kwenye tikiti ya bahati nasibu.

src: When the transplant happened, her whole family was scared.
mt: Wakati wa kutoa damu, familia yake kote walikuwa wakipanga.
ref: Wakati upandikizaji ulipofanyika, familia yake yote ilikuwa na hofu.

src: I felt lonely on my first day.
mt: Nilikuwa na hasira kwa siku yangu ya kwanza.
ref: Nilihisi mpweke siku yangu ya kwanza.

src: Unfortunately for Larry, one day he was diverted onto another route.
mt: Kwa hakika kwa Larry, siku moja alidhinishwa kwenye njia nyingine.
ref: Bahati mbaya kwa Larry, siku moja alipelekwa njia nyingine.

src: All he has to do is come up with an excuse on the spot to leave.
mt: Anaweza kufanya yote ni kutoa mjadala kwenye kipindi cha sasa ili kutoka.
ref: Anachopaswa kufanya tu ni kupata kisingizio papo hapo cha kuondoka.

src: Then she filled the bathtub with water.
mt: Baadaye alifanya maji yote ya bafu kwa maji.
ref: Kisha akajaza beseni ya kuogea kwa maji.

src: They were eating a lot out of the meal.
mt: Walikuwa wakikula nyingi kwa chakula hicho.
ref: Walikuwa wakila chakula kingi sana.

src: While jumping yesterday, he did just that.
mt: Japo alivuta kesho, alifanya hivyo.
ref: Alipokuwa akiruka jana, alifanya hivyo tu.

src: They talked on the phone every day.
mt: Waliangalia simu kila siku.
ref: Waliongea kwenye simu kila siku.

src: It hit the cactus sitting in the window.
mt: Linakwenda kwa kivuli kilichokuwa kwenye vitikio.
ref: Ikagonga dungusi iliyokuwa kwenye dirisha.

src: One day Janet discovered that her mother was sick.
mt: Jumanne Janet alijua kwamba mama yake alikuwa na ugonjwa.
ref: Siku moja Janet akagundua kwamba mama yake ni mgonjwa.

src: He decided to pay his roommate to do it for him.
mt: Alisema atakapokipa mke wake kufanya kwa yeye.
ref: Akaamua kumlipa mkazi mwenza kufanya hivyo kwa niaba yake.

src: One day, she met a very nice full-sized man.
mt: Mmoja wa siku, alijua mwanamume mwenye ukubwa wa kawaida.
ref: Siku moja, alikutana na mwanaume mzima mzuri sana.

src: Jay knew that there would be a lot of responsibility involved.
mt: Jay alijua kwamba kuna wajibu wengi wakati huo.
ref: Jay alijua kwamba kutakuwa na majukumu mengi husika.

src: Jon decided to go buy some water at the store.
mt: Jon aliamua kufika kwenye duka kupata maji.
ref: Jon akaamua kwenda kununua maji kiasi dukani.

src: When the television arrived, Daria was excited.
mt: Kutokana na kufika kwa televisheni, Daria alikuwa na hamu.
ref: Wakati televisheni ilifika, Daria alisisimka.

src: One day she pricked her finger on a thorn.
mt: Juma moja alipigwa na dongo.
ref: Siku moja alidunga kidole chake kwa miba.

src: Jimmy brought her flowers and a get well card.
mt: Jimmy alimwambia mke wake kupata maua na kadhaa.
ref: Jimmy alileta maua na kadi ya kupata nafuu.

src: As she approached the bus, she thought of turning back.
mt: Kama alivyoingia kwenye basi, alikuwa anavyazoea kufanya.
ref: Alipokuwa akikaribia basi, alifikiria kurudi nyuma.

src: She went through airport security quickly.
mt: Aliingia kwenye barabara ya uwanja wa ndege kwa haraka.
ref: Akapitia kwa haraka kwa watu wa usalama kwenye uwanja wa ndege.

src: Sandy decided to ensure that her home was prepared.
mt: Sandy aliamua kuweka nafasi ya nyumbani yake.
ref: Sandy akaamua atahakikisha kwamba nyumba yake ilikuwa tayari.

src: One day he decides to attend a company party.
mt: Yule mmoja alikuwa anataka kufika katika kipindi cha kufanya mazungumzo na wafanyabiashara.
ref: Siku moja akaamua kuhudhuria sherehe ya kampuni.

src: I tried to buy some bottles online yesterday.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechafua kupata boti za kawaida jana.
ref: Nilijaribu kununua chupa kadhaa mtandaoni leo.

src: He asked his grandmother instead.
mt: Alimwambia binti yake.
ref: Akamwomba bibi yake badala yake.

src: Franz and his cousin visit museums and drink coffee together.
mt: Franz na jamaa yake wakifika katika makumbusho na kula kafe pamoja.
ref: Franz na binamu yake walitembelea makavazi na kunywa kahawa pamoja.

src: The toad looked very fierce.
mt: Kabila la nyoka lilikuwa na uwezo wa kujitetea.
ref: Mjusi huyo alionekana mkali sana.

src: Despite walking for one moment, she constantly messaged me.
mt: Alipoenda kwa muda mmoja, alikuwa anamkabidhi nami kwa kila wakati.
ref: Licha ya kutembea kwa dakika moja, alishinda akinitumia ujumbe.

src: To her surprise however, she ran into an old friend.
mt: Kwa habari gani, alirudi na mpenzi wake.
ref: Hata hivyo kwa mshangao wake, alikutana na rafiki wa zamani.

src: At one point he dropped a heavy shipment.
mt: Kwa muda mmoja alitupa kipande cha kubwa cha malighafi.
ref: Wakati mmoja aliangusha mzigo mzito.

src: When the feds raided the gang, he was going over their books.
mt: Wakati wakati wa kuzimia kundi hilo, alikuwa akifanya hesabu za wao.
ref: Wakati polisi walipovamia genge hilo, alikuwa akipitia vitabu vyao.

src: She got up and got dressed and her mom fixed her hair.
mt: Aliangalia na kivunja na mama yake alivunja na kivunja.
ref: Aliamka na kuvaa nguo na mama yake akamtengeneza nywele.

src: Nila made sure to provide her mom with a good life until her death.
mt: Nilimkamilisha kwa namna nzuri maisha ya mama yangu hadi kifo chake.
ref: Nila alihakikisha amempa mama yake maisha mazuri hadi kifo chake.

src: Her dream was to give him the childhood that she was not given.
mt: Kumaliza, wazazi wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa kuzaliwa wake, wakati wa
ref: Ndoto yake ilikuwa kumpa utoto ambao hakupewa.

src: They woke up and ran to the Christmas tree.
mt: Wakapata wakapanda na kufika katika mti wa Krismasi.
ref: Waliamka na kwenda kwenye mti wa Krisimasi.

src: Jan was upset that Kim made this decision.
mt: Jan alikuwa na hasira kwamba Kim alifanya hivyo.
ref: Jan alikasirika kwamba Kim alifanya uamuzi huo.

src: When we got to school we checked the class list for third grade.
mt: Kwa wakati tu tulipokwenda shule tulichunguza orodha ya kila kipindi kwa darasa la tatu.
ref: Tulipofika shuleni tukakagua orodha ya darasa ya gredi ya tatu.

src: One day, his neighbor gave his dog away.
mt: Juma moja, jirani yake alikuwa akilipa mbwa wake.
ref: Siku moja, jirani yake alipeana mbwa wake.

src: Later that day, Holly wondered why people were laughing.
mt: Baadaye siku hiyo Holly alikuwa akichanganya kwa sababu watu walikuwa wakichanganya.
ref: Baadaye siku hiyo, Holly alishangaa ni kwa nini watu walikuwa wanacheka.

src: When I woke up in the middle of the night to get water I tripped.
mt: Nilipokwama katika usiku wa kati ili kupata maji nilipigwa na kichwa.
ref: Nilipoamka katikati ya usiku kupata maji niliteleza.

src: On the day of the move she said goodbye to her friends.
mt: Jana alisema kwa wenzake.
ref: Siku hiyo ya kuhama aliwaambia marafiki wake kwaheri.

src: The shoes were $300.
mt: Vipande vya kipande viliwa 300$.
ref: Viatu hivyo vilikuwa $300.

src: Her mom is throwing her a princess party.
mt: Mama yake anatupa nafasi ya kipindi cha malkia.
ref: Mama yake anapangia binti wake sherehe.

src: While playing in the water some other people joined in.
mt: Wakati wa kucheza katika maji, wengine wakati wao wakaelekea.
ref: Tulipokuwa tukicheza majini watu wengine walijiunga.

src: After taking an hour to decide I finally picked The Departed.
mt: Baada ya kuchagua kwa masaa 60, nimechagua The Departed.
ref: Baada ya kutumia saa moja kuamua mwishowe nilichagua The Departed.

src: They invited her to a party.
mt: Waliwajibika kwa kushirikiana na chakula.
ref: Walimwalika kwenye sherehe.

src: The customer service representative did it for me.
mt: Msaidizi wa huduma ya wateja alifanya kwa mimi.
ref: Mwakilishi wa huduma kwa wateja alinifanyia.

src: All of her friends were there.
mt: Jumuiya yake yote ilikuwako huko.
ref: Marafiki wake wote walikuwa hapo.

src: One day she met her friends in a blue bikini and surprised them.
mt: Moja siku alijuta na wenzake katika bikini bluu na kuwafurahisha.
ref: Siku moja alikutana na marafiki wake akiwa amevaa bikini ya bluu na akawashangaza.

src: One day his father surprised him by saying he would help Ted out.
mt: Juma moja baba yake alimshangaa Ted kwa kusema atawasaidia Ted.
ref: Siku moja baba yake alimshangaza kwa kusema atamsaidia Ted.

src: Her supervisors quizzed her about what she had learned.
mt: Mafunzi wake wakawazwa kuhusu yale aliyokuwa ameona.
ref: Wasimamizi wake walimuuliza kuhusu alichokuwa amejifunza.

src: They called Sami and Sara and arranged a date.
mt: Wakawiliwa Sami na Sara na kuwapa tarehe.
ref: Wakawapigia simu Sami na Sara kupanga mkutano.

src: Marco decides to put on a necktie.
mt: Marco anataka kufanya kile kile.
ref: Marco akaamua kuvaa tai.

src: He decided to travel to China by air.
mt: Alisema atakapofika China kwa ndege.
ref: Akaamua kusafiri kwenda China kwa ndege.

src: The next morning school was concealed due to snow.
mt: Jana jioni shule ilikuwa ikifichwa kutokana na baridi.
ref: Asubuhi iliyofuata shule ilifungwa kwa sababu ya theluji.

src: When his friends found out, they all bought him one for his birthday.
mt: Wakati wenzake wakajua, wote wakapata kwa siku yake ya kuzaliwa.
ref: Wakati marafiki wake waligundua, wote walimnunulia moja kwa siku yake ya kuzaliwa.

src: One day, she realized she was out of flour despite having a big order.
mt: Mmoja wa siku, alijua kwamba alikuwa bila unga wala kwa sababu alikuwa na kipesa kubwa.
ref: Siku moja, aligundua alikuwa ameishiwa na unga licha ya kuwa na agizo kubwa.

src: They waited in line for the biggest slide.
mt: Walikaa barabarani kwa ajili ya kubeba kwa kasi zaidi.
ref: Walisubiri kwenye foleni kwa slaidi kubwa zaidi.

src: Sam came and knocked it down.
mt: Sam alikwenda na kubomoka.
ref: Sam alikuja na kuigonga chini.

src: When Jeff arrived he was very disappointed.
mt: Kwenda Jeff alikuwa na hasira kubwa.
ref: Wakati Jeff alipowasili alisikitishwa sana.

src: Dani didn't want to, but she treated her father.
mt: Dani alikuwa hajawachia, lakini alimwachia baba yake.
ref: Dani hakutaka, lakini alimtibu baba yake.

src: Jane was rude, and stuck up.
mt: Jane alikuwa mnyenyekevu, na mwenye mafanikio.
ref: Jane alikuwa mkatili, na mfidhuli.

src: She got a nasty burn!
mt: Aliingia kwenye moto mkali!
ref: Alichomeka sana!

src: They saw all kinds of exotic animals.
mt: Waliona wanyama wengi wanaoonekana kwa mara ya kwanza.
ref: Waliona wanyama wa aina zote.

src: After putting the pie in the oven, she eagerly waited to try it.
mt: Baada ya kuchoma tunda la tatu katika jiko, alimwamini kuwa itakuwa na nafasi ya kujifungua.
ref: Baada ya kuweka pai ndani ya oveni, alisubiri kwa hamu kujaribu.

src: He went through his closet to see what he could sell.
mt: Alifika ndani ya kambi yake ili kujua nini anaweza kubadilisha.
ref: Akatafuta kwenye kabati lake ili kuona ni nini anachoweza kuuza.

src: Then Anna realized - they needed a disco ball!
mt: Kisha Anna kujifunza - wanaohitaji ni balli la disco!
ref: Kisha Anna akagundua - wanahitaji mpira wa disko!

src: There were a lot of trees to go through.
mt: Kuna nyingi sana miti kwa kufika.
ref: Hata hivyo kuliwa na miti mingi.

src: The game became intense and both teams were tied in the end.
mt: Mechi ilikuwa na nguvu na zaidi ya timu zote zilikuwa zimekamilika.
ref: Mchezo huo ukawa mkali na mwishowe timu zote zikapata nunge kwa nunge.

src: During his last performance, one of the keys broke off his keyboard.
mt: Katika kipindi cha kufanya kazi yake ya mwisho, moja kati ya nyota zake zilivamia kwa kipande cha kibinadamu.
ref: Wakati wa maonyesho yake ya mwisho, moja ya vitufe ilianguka kutoka kwa kibodi yake.

src: Soon they grew used to her.
mt: Kwa muda wakakaa na kujua.
ref: Punde si punde walimzoea.

src: His mother took Andy to the beach.
mt: Mama yake Andy alimwita kwenye pwani.
ref: Mama yake alimpeleka Andy ufuoni.

src: The case arrived without a lanyard.
mt: Kesi ilipata bila lanyard.
ref: Mfuko huo uliwasili bila kamba.

src: The new ones look nicer and feel better.
mt: Yale mpya yanasababisha nini na yanasababisha nini.
ref: Hizo mpya zilizonekana nzuri na zilihisi vizuri zaidi.

src: She advised he save his allowance.
mt: Alimwambia aipige kodi yake.
ref: Akamshauri anapaswa kuweka akiba ya posho lake.

src: She bought an electric guitar and an amp.
mt: Aliwapa gitaa la kisasa na mafuta.
ref: Akanunua gitaa ya umeme na kipaza sauti.

src: His neighbors were poor and were grateful to Bill for the fish.
mt: Wanavijiji wake walikuwa wachafu na walikuwa na shukrani kwa Bill kwa samaki.
ref: Majirani wake walikuwa masikini na walimshukuru Bill kwa samaki hao.

src: Every other option available seemed boring.
mt: Kila jibu la kawaida lilikuwa la kujifungua.
ref: Chaguo lingine lolote lililopatikana lilionekana kuchosha.

src: When Tim had enough songs, he called a record studio.
mt: Baada ya Tim kufikia nyimbo zake, alitumia studio ya rekodi.
ref: Wakati Tim alipata nyimbo za kutosha, alipigia simu studio ya kurekodi muziki.

src: Alex took Tigger to the veterinarian to be diagnosed.
mt: Alex alitupa Tigger kwa daktari wa wanyama ili kupima.
ref: Alex alimpeleka Tigger kwa daktari wa wanyama kuchunguzwa.

src: One of her colleagues was secretly stealing her research.
mt: Moja kati ya wafuasi wake alikuwa akisababisha kufichwa kwa utafiti wake.
ref: Mmoja wa wafanyakazi wenza alikua akiiba utafiti wake kwa siri.

src: The party got extremely wild.
mt: Jamaa alijifungua kwa kasi.
ref: Sherehe hiyo ikawa haina udhibiti wowote.

src: She poured herself a glass of milk.
mt: Aliwachia kwa kipande cha maziwa.
ref: Akajimwagia glasi ya maziwa.

src: On the way home from work, there was a lot of traffic.
mt: Kwa njia ya nyumbani kutoka kazi, kulikuwa na kasi kubwa.
ref: Akiwa njiani kutoka kazini, kuliwa na msongamano mkubwa wa magari.

src: They liked the durability of the Viking.
mt: Waliwaza uwezo wa kudumu wa Viking.
ref: Walipenda uimara wa Viking.

src: Jasmine soon realized the test was very difficult.
mt: Jasmini alijua kwa kipindi cha muda kuwa testi ilikuwa kama ilivyokuwa.
ref: Jasmine akagundua mtihani huo ulikuwa mgumu sana.

src: After two months sam was sleeping in his car and broke.
mt: Baada ya miezi miwili sam alikuwa akichekeshwa katika gari yake na kufaulu.
ref: Baada ya miezi miwili sam alikuwa akilala ndani ya gari lake bila fedha.

src: Work was too busy to take a break or eat lunch.
mt: Kazi ilikuwa kama kawaida kwa kufanya kazi au kula chakula cha mchana.
ref: Kazi ilikuwa nyingi sana akashindwa kupumzika au kula chakula cha mchana.

src: He asked his wife were they were.
mt: Alisema kwa mke yake wapi wanao.
ref: Akamuuliza mke wake ziko wapi.

src: We went to the store and looked for hours.
mt: Tulipokwenda duka na kufika saa nyingi.
ref: Tulienda dukani na kutafuta kwa saa kadhaa.

src: Harry attended the tryouts for the team.
mt: Harry alishiriki kwenye mashindano ya kufanya kikao cha timu.
ref: Harry alihudhuria majaribio ya timu.

src: She started to cry for her mom.
mt: Alianza kujisalimisha kwa mama yake.
ref: Akaanza kulia akimtaka mama yake.

src: She decided to enter in an art competition.
mt: Aliamua kuingia katika mashindano ya sanaa.
ref: Akaamua kuingia katika shindano la sanaa.

src: Tom thought it was a wonderful gift.
mt: Tom alitaka kwamba ni gharama nzuri.
ref: Tom alifikiri ilikuwa zawadi nzuri.

src: His mom comforts him.
mt: Yeye anamwambia mama yake.
ref: Mama yake akamtuliza.

src: Mike wanted to enjoy a healthier breakfast.
mt: Mike alitaka kuendelea na chakula cha afya zaidi.
ref: Mike alitaka kufurahi kiamsha kinywa chenye lishe bora.

src: I tried connecting the borders with nails.
mt: Nilikuwa nimechafua mipaka na kisawasawa.
ref: Nilijaribu kuunganisha mipaka na misumari.

src: Josh didn't understand why they couldn't accept criticism.
mt: Josh hakuelewa kwanini wao hawakubali maandishi.
ref: Josh hakuelewa kwanini hawangekubali kukosolewa.

src: There was this great buffet right near his apartment he would go to.
mt: Kuna buffet kubwa sana karibu na nyumba yake aliyotumia kila mara.
ref: Kulikuwa na bufe kubwa karibu na nyumba yake ambayo angeenda.

src: This week they got a new boss.
mt: Jana wakati mwingine wamepata mkuu mpya.
ref: Wiki hii walipata bosi mpya.

src: Lester spent all his free time with Christina.
mt: Lester alikuwa akifurahia wakati wake mwingi pamoja na Christina.
ref: Lester alitumia wakati wake wote wa mapumziko na Christina.

src: I turned off the TV so I wouldn't be distracted.
mt: Nilimwacha televisheni ili nisahau.
ref: Nilizima televisheni ili nisiweze kusumbuliwa.

src: This hat is going to be amazing!
mt: Kofia hii itakuwa kama sivyo!
ref: Kofia hii itakuwa nzuri sana!

src: She covered it in pink frosting.
mt: Aliyachukua nalo kwa mafuta ya rangi ya pink.
ref: Aliifunika kwa kuikausha kwa rangi ya waridi.

src: It doesn't just sleep like a normal dog.
mt: Si tu anapokaa kama mbwa wa kawaida.
ref: Hailali tu kama mbwa wa kawaida.

src: She told Amy she needed to shower since she was sweaty.
mt: Alisema Amy alitahitaji kuchimba kwa sababu alikuwa na majivu.
ref: Alimwambia Amy anapaswa kuoga kwa kuwa alikuwa ametokwa na jasho.

src: Everyone planted pinwheels near the stop.
mt: Wote walitunza kipande cha kipande kando ya barabara.
ref: Kila mtu aliweka vizungushaji vya pini karibu na kituo cha kusimama.

src: All of a sudden her water broke.
mt: Kabla hajawasikia, maji yake yalipata.
ref: Kwa ghafla maji yake yakavuja.

src: However, her friends talked her into trying it.
mt: Lakini marafiki yake wakamwambia waweke.
ref: Hata hivyo, marafiki wake waliongea na yeye aijaribu.

src: I became very interested in why some kids have a harder time learning.
mt: Nilikuwa na umoja mkubwa kuhusu sababu zinazoweza kuwafanya watoto wengine kuwa na shida zaidi ya kujifunza.
ref: Nikavutiwa sana na kwa nini baadhi ya watoto walikuwa na wakati mgumu kusoma.

src: He figured he would just buy something out of the machine at work.
mt: Alifikiri kuwa atakapokuwa anachukua kitu kutoka kwa mashine ya kazi.
ref: Akaamua atajaribu kununua kitu kutoka kwa mashine iliyo kazini.

src: He rolled around in his bed all night.
mt: Alivuta katika kitanda chake kote usiku.
ref: Alijizungusha kitandani usiku wote.

src: I walked up to him and asked how he was.
mt: Nilipokwenda kwake nikasema nini.
ref: Nikaenda alipokuwa na kumuuliza anavyoendelea.

src: Then, he read a book on the Theory of Relativity.
mt: Baadaye, alieleza kitabu kuhusu Teoria ya Relativiti.
ref: Kisha, akasoma kitabu kuhusu Nadharia ya Uwiano.

src: She found a listing for a job as a nanny.
mt: Alijua kwa kufika kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali kwa ajali
ref: Akapata tangazo la kazi ya yaya.

src: She shrieked and ran, but not before the snake bit her hand!
mt: Aliwakuta na kufika, lakini kabla ya hapo nyoka alimwua mkono wake!
ref: Alipiga kelele na kukimbia, lakini sio kabla ya nyoka huyo kumuuma mkono wake!

src: He never actually prepared for it.
mt: Alisahau kujitayarisha kwa hivyo.
ref: Kwa kweli hata hakujiandaa.

src: As he walking on the trail, he heard a hissing sound.
mt: Kama alivyokuwa anapita kwenye njia, alikuta sauti ya kuzunguka.
ref: Alipokuwa akitembea njiani, alisikia sauti kama ya nyoka.

src: He cried in pain and raced home.
mt: Alishtuka na kufurudia nyumba.
ref: Alilia kwa maumivu na kukimbia nyumbani.

src: They noticed, however, that Skip was squinting a lot.
mt: Wakakuta, wakati huo, Skip alikuwa akisimama kwa kiasi kikubwa.
ref: Hata hivyo, wakagundua Skip alikuwa akipepesa macho sana.

src: Rae's stepfather yelled and threw his plate across the room.
mt: Rae's baba yake alimwambia na kutoa chakula chake chini ya majengo.
ref: Baba wa kambo wa Rae akapiga kelele na kurusha sahani yake chumbani.

src: She called them, but no one answered.
mt: Aliwataja, lakini hakuna aliwataja.
ref: Akawapigia simu, lakini hakuna aliyejibu.

src: They sent a letter to Santa.
mt: Waliwafikia Santa.
ref: Walimtumia Santa barua.

src: I went to see the doctor.
mt: Nilikuja kwa daktari.
ref: Nilienda kumwona daktari.

src: He practiced every day.
mt: Alifanya kila siku.
ref: Alifanya mazoezi kila siku.

src: Last week Gina wasn't able to get to hers.
mt: Jana Gina haikutambua kwamba alikuwa na kipindi cha kufanya hivyo.
ref: Wiki iliyopita Gina hakuweza kuosha zake.

src: Timmy was sad but he understood what his mother said.
mt: Timmy alikuwa na hasira lakini alijua neno lilivyotolewa na mama yake.
ref: Timmy alikuwa na huzuni lakini alielewa ni nini mama yake alisema.

src: Doctor Mike suggested a flea dip to Jen.
mt: Dr Mike alisema kwa Jen kuchukua dawa ya kifua kifuani.
ref: Daktari Mike alipendekeza Jen kuogeshwa kwa dawa ya viroboto.

src: She knew she had limited time, so she drove fast.
mt: Alijua kuwa alikuwa na wakati wa chini, hivyo alikuwa anavyotembea kwa haraka.
ref: Alijua ana muda mchache, kwa hivyo aliendesha gari kwa kasi.

src: But after checking everywhere she couldn't see it.
mt: Lakini baada ya kufanya kikao kote hakupata.
ref: Lakini baada ya kuitafuta kila mahali hakuweza kuiona.

src: As she sat at the interview, Sarah noticed a run in her stockings.
mt: Kama alivyokuwa akifanya mazungumzo, Sarah aliona kifua chake kimepata kifua.
ref: Alipokuwa amekaa katika mahojiano, Sarah akagundua soksi yake ikifumuka.

src: He wanted to eat fish.
mt: Alitaka kula samaki.
ref: Alitaka kula samaki.

src: He notices that he is much older than the other people there.
mt: Anavyoona kwamba anafaa zaidi kuliko wengine wakati wa kufika.
ref: Akagundua kwamba yeye ni mkubwa zaidi ya watu wengine hapo.

src: Ron decided it was best if he didn't drink anymore.
mt: Ron aliamua kuwa bora kama anavyoendelea hakuwa na tumbu.
ref: Ron akaamua ilikuwa vyema asinywe tena.

src: But it became difficult to take care of.
mt: Lakini kujituma kwa kawaida liliwakatalia.
ref: Lakini ikawa vigumu kuitunza.

src: She realized she must have overslept!
mt: Alijua kwamba alikuwa amesema!
ref: Akagundua alikuwa amelala kupita kiasi!

src: They told me they only had Pepsi products.
mt: Wanawezaje kutoa bidhaa za Pepsi peke yake?
ref: Wakaniambia walikuwa na bidhaa za Pepsi pekee.

src: The alert warn the residents of a chance there will be a tsunami.
mt: Alama ya kuzingatia inawalipa wakazi kwa nafasi kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna kuna
ref: Arifu hiyo ilikuwa ikiwaonya wakazi kwamba kulikuwa na uwezekano wa tsunami.

src: Everyone went outside to play in the snow.
mt: Wote walipata nafasi ya kucheza katika barafu.
ref: Kila mtu alienda nje kucheza na theluji.

src: Joe was trying to get it to take a peanut from his hand.
mt: Joe alikuwa akifanya kujitafiti kama anaweza kuchukua ng'ati kutoka kwenye mkono wake.
ref: Joe alikuwa akijaribu kumfanya ale njugu kutoka kwa mkono wake.

src: After a couple of weeks it stopped working.
mt: Baada ya wiki chache ilipata kufa kazi.
ref: Baada ya wiki chache Iliacha kufanya kazi.

src: Eric woke up and yelped the nearest bar.
mt: Eric alivunja kwa kujitupa na kufukuzwa kwa bar zinazofuata.
ref: Eric aliamka na kwenda kwenye bar iliyo karibu.

src: The seam of her pants in the back had ripped all the way open.
mt: Kisukari cha pantileo yake kwa nyuma lilipata kipinduzi kwa kujaza kwa kiasi kikubwa.
ref: Mshono wa suruali lake nyuma ulikuwa umeraruka na kufunguka.

src: I could have called the towing company but chose not to.
mt: Nilikuwa na nia ya kuchukua gari la kuzimamoto, lakini nilichagua hivyo.
ref: Ningeita kampuni ya kuvuta magari lakini nikachagua kutofanya hivyo.

src: I tried to break them in over time.
mt: Nilikuwa nimejaribu kuwafundisha kwa muda.
ref: Nikajaribu kuvilainisha kwa muda.

src: He was nervous to take the plane up in the air.
mt: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kupeleka ndege juu ya anga.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi wa kupeleka ndege juu angani.

src: Larry slices tomato, lettuce, and other vegetables for the salad.
mt: Larry anajifungua kamba, nyanya, na vyakula vingine vya kuharisha kwa saladi.
ref: Larry alikatakata nyanya, letisi, na mboga nyingine kwa saladi hiyo.

src: Sarah was very excited.
mt: Sarah alikuwa na umoja kubwa.
ref: Sarah alisisimka sana.

src: It was called the Tower of London.
mt: Ilitajwa kama Tower of London.
ref: Liliitwa Tower of London.

src: She has 1200 photos on her phone.
mt: Anaye na picha 1200 kwenye simu yake.
ref: Ana picha 1200 kwenye simu yake.

src: He changed it out and made sure her car was working properly.
mt: Alivuruga na kudhibiti kwamba gari lake lilikuwa kazi.
ref: Akaibadilisha na kuhakikisha gari lake linafanya kazi vizuri.

src: One day as she was hiding the chalk, the teacher caught Grace.
mt: Moja siku alipokuwa anashika chuma, mwalimu alikataa Grace.
ref: Siku moja alipokuwa akificha chaki, mwalimu alimshika Grace.

src: One Christmas, she asked her again for the recipe.
mt: Kwa siku moja kwa siku moja, alimwambia tena kwa mara ya pili.
ref: Krisimasi moja, alimuuliza tena mapishi hayo.

src: Halfway to the dumpster, he saw many birds, feeding on the trash.
mt: Kati ya kuuza na kuuza, aliona wanyama wengi, wakipata chakula kutoka kwa mafuta.
ref: Kufikia katikati akienda kwenye pipa, akaona ndege wengi, wakila takataka.

src: The other half wanted sausage.
mt: Nusu nyingine ilimtaka nyama.
ref: Wale wengine walitaka soseji.

src: He worked up the courage to go over and introduce himself.
mt: Alifanya kazi yake ya kuweza kuendesha nguvu ya kuenda kwa kujitambulisha.
ref: Akapata ujasiri wa kwenda na kujitambulisha.

src: His parents were able to attend.
mt: Wazazi wake walikuwa wakifurahia.
ref: Wazazi wake waliweza kuhudhuria.

src: He came in late the next day.
mt: Alifika mapema siku iliyofuata.
ref: Akaja kuchelewa siku iliyofuatia.

src: Next, she circled rings in magazines.
mt: Baadaye, alifanya kivutio cha vingi vya rangi katika magazini.
ref: Baadaye, akaweka alama ya mviringo kwenye jarida.

src: When I listened to it I was blown away.
mt: Kama nilivyokutana nayo nilikuwa na hofu.
ref: Nilipoisikiliza nilifurahishwa sana.

src: When people tuned in the radio, the same song played on all stations.
mt: Wakati watu wakaripoti redio, nyimbo moja ilisimama kwenye vyombo vyote.
ref: Wakati watu walipofungulia redio, wimbo huo mmoja ulicheza kwenye vituo vyote.

src: One day after a competition she remembered overdue homework.
mt: Moja siku baada ya mashindano alitazama kazi yake ya kufikiri.
ref: Siku moja baada ya mashindano alikumbuka kazi ya nyumbani ambayo hajaifanya.

src: Immediately she knew she was going to become a biologist.
mt: Kwanza alijua kwamba alitaka kuwa mwanabiolojia.
ref: Mara moja akajua atakuwa mwanabiolojia.

src: She was inspired and decided to join a soccer team.
mt: Alimwambia na kujifunza na kujitambua na kujitambulisha kwenye timu ya mpira.
ref: Alipata msukumo na kuamua kujiunga na timu ya soka.

src: She took out some cash instead and used that as a deposit.
mt: Aliweka pesa kwa ajili ya kipa.
ref: Akachukua pesa kiasi badala yake na kutumia hiyo kama amana.

src: The following year, she was too old to attend the camp.
mt: Kati ya mwaka uliofuata, alikuwa kubwa kufika kwenye kampeni.
ref: Mwaka uliofuata, alikuwa mzee sana kuhudhuria kambi.

src: Her mother was becoming suspicious.
mt: Mama yake alikuwa anasikitika.
ref: Mama yake alikuwa ameanza kushuku.

src: Her husband admonished her to search the house more carefully.
mt: Mke wake alimwambia aangalie nyumba zaidi.
ref: Mume wake alimshauri atafute nyumba nzima kwa makini zaidi.

src: Usually, when the kids were quiet, they were getting into something.
mt: Kwa kawaida, wakati wale wakikwama, wangekuwa wamekuwa katika kitu.
ref: Kwa kawaida, wakati watoto wametulia, kuna kitu wanachofanya.

src: But Ori couldn't find them at the market.
mt: Lakini Ori hakutambua wakati wa kujengwa kwa biashara.
ref: Lakini Ori hakuweza kuyapata sokoni.

src: They went from room to room, singing Christmas carols.
mt: Wakakwenda katika vyumba vyote, wakimshika nyimbo za kipindi cha Krismasi.
ref: Wallienda chumba kimoja hadi kingine, wakiimba nyimbo za Krisimasi.

src: After that, they saw snakes and lizards!
mt: Baada ya hapo, wakakuta nyoka na ndege!
ref: Baada ya hapo waliona nyoka na mijusi!

src: She searched online for ways to make money from home.
mt: Aliangalia kwa dharura kwa njia ya mitandao kwa njia za kufanya kazi kutoka nyumbani.
ref: Alitafuta mtandaoni kwa njia za kutengeneza pesa nyumbani.

src: We all sat together and ate dinner.
mt: Wote tulikuwa pamoja na kula chakula cha jioni.
ref: Sote tuliketi pamoja na kula chakula cha jioni.

src: The next day they decided to switch their roles.
mt: Jana wakati wao wakapanga kufanya kazi zao zinazohusiana.
ref: Siku iliyofuata wakaamua kubadilishana majukumu.

src: She began to sort through the clothes.
mt: Alianza kutafuta vyombo vya kawaida.
ref: Akaanza kupanga nguo.

src: She went home and got out her blender.
mt: Alienda nyumbani na kupata blender yake.
ref: Alienda nyumbani na kutoa mashine yake ya kusagia.

src: I was headed in the direction of the gas station.
mt: Nilikuwa nimekuwa nimeenda kuelekea kwenye kituo cha mafuta.
ref: Nilikuwa nikielekea mwelekeo wa kituo cha mafuta.

src: He was pretty nervous.
mt: Alikuwa na uwezo mkubwa.
ref: Alikuwa na wasiwasi kiasi.

src: One day, she decided to ditch school.
mt: Yule siku, aliamua kufichua shule.
ref: Siku moja, akaamua kukwepa shule.

src: The online results convinced him that he had a terrible disease.
mt: Uchunguzi uliofanywa kwa mtandaoni ulimwambia kwamba alikuwa na ugonjwa mkali.
ref: Matokeo ya mtandaoni yalimshawishi kwamba alikuwa na ugonjwa mbaya sana.

src: He was about to leave when he spotted it.
mt: Alikuwa akifika wakati aliona.
ref: Alikuwa karibu kutoka wakati aliona moja.

src: Eventually it was narrowed down to two.
mt: Kwa hatua hatu, ilipaswa kufikia wawili.
ref: Mwishowe ulipunguzwa kwa watu wawili.

src: He turned to neighbors and nearby businesses for help.
mt: Alisema kwa wageni na wafanyabiashara wakubwa.
ref: Akaenda kwa majirani na biashara zilizo karibu kwa msaada.

src: One day he met John who happened to feel the same way.
mt: Yupo mmoja aliyemwona John, ambaye alikuwa anamwona kile.
ref: Siku moja alikutana na John ambaye alikuwa akihisi hivyo pia.

src: His family kept customs, ate Irish food, and watched Irish sports.
mt: Wazazi wake waliendeleza mapito, kula chakula cha Ireland, na kuangalia michezo ya Ireland.
ref: Familia yake ilidumisha mila, kula vyakula vya Kiarishi, na kutazama michezo ya Kiarishi.

src: When he was out of the room, he smelled a strange sound.
mt: Alipokuwa nje ya chumba, alipata mawimbi ya kipindukizi.
ref: Alipokuwa nje ya chumba chake, alisikia sauti ya ajabu.

src: Her mother didn't have a food processor, Beth had to mash by hand.
mt: Mama yake hakuna kipulizi cha chakula, Beth alishindwa kuchimba kwa mikono.
ref: Mama yake hakuwa na kichakataji chakula, Beth alilazimika kuponda kwa mikono.

src: One day the principal caught the two kissing.
mt: Mwaka mmoja baadaye mkuu alikataa wawili wakikosana.
ref: Siku moja mwalimu mkuu aliwapata wakibusiana.

src: Westerns had lost favor with the public and none were showing.
mt: Wakati huo, vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vikali vik
ref: Sinema za magharibi zilikuwa haziwavutii watu tena na hakuna aliyekuwa akizitazama.

src: When I walked into first period, it was very familiar.
mt: Japo nilipokwenda kwa kipindi cha kwanza, ilikuwa kama kipindi cha kwanza.
ref: Nilipoingia katika somo la kwanza, lilikuwa nalifahamu sana.

src: She went to the store and put flea and tick shampoo.
mt: Alienda kwenye duka na kupuliza rangi ya kifua na kifua.
ref: Alienda dukani na kununua shampuu ya viroboto na kupe.

src: I bought many books there, since they cost only ten cents.
mt: Nilipata vitabu vingi huko, kwa sababu wao wakipendelea wakikosa senti moja.
ref: Nilinunua vitabu vingi hapo, kwa kuwa vinagharimu senti kumi pekee.

src: I visited the pet store to do some research.
mt: Nilipiga kwa kichwa kwa kufika duka la wanyama wadogo ili kufanya utafiti.
ref: Nilitembelea duka la wanyama kufanya utafiti kiasi.

src: There were lots of beagle puppies there.
mt: Kuna wengi wa punda wa beagle wakati huo.
ref: Kulikuwa na watoto wengi wa mbwa hapo wa aina ya beagle.

src: He loved how friendly the people were!

src: She even volunteered at the local zoo to pad her resume.

ref: Alijitolea pia katika bustani ya wanyama iliyo karibu ili kuboresha wasifu-kazi wake.

src: I tried a few different things to fix it.

src: While I was looking at my notes, I barely paid attention.

src: He was too weak to move.

src: He searched for 3 months.

src: As he was preparing dinner he realized he forgot the tortillas!
mt: Kama alivyokuwa anavyojaribu kufanya chakula cha jioni alikumbuka kuacha tortillas!

src: So she took her vitamins.
mt: Kwa hiyo aliweka vitamin zake.

src: She insisted that he go see a doctor.

src: She practiced and practiced.

src: Gina tried to keep her composure.

mt: Kiongozi alisema neno, lakini kama habari itakapotolewa.

src: He knew nothing about animals.

src: He offered to help her practice.

src: He looked everywhere but could not find them!

mt: Alitaka pesa kwa ajili ya kodi.

src: Everyone at the party loved it.
mt: Wote katika sherehe walipenda.

mt: Juma moja alivuta sana, na akafika kilele.

src: He couldn't find it anywhere.

src: They were looking forward to it so much, but it turned out to be bad!

src: The inside smells so fresh and clean.

src: After awhile, she smelled smoke.

mt: Alifika kwenye kifaru cha kijana, wakati huu alikuwa na nafasi ya kuangalia, bali.

src: He went back to his car.

src: At first her parents didn't agree.

src: There was a great deal of arguing.
mt: Kuna mashaka kubwa.

src: He studied accounting at the local university.
mt: Alifundishwa kuhesabu katika chuo kikuu cha kijiji.

src: Strands of ribbon were attached to each one.

src: They were all heros.

src: The teacher held the phone and stared at her.

src: She began to practice meditation.

mt: Jan alivyotembea katika gari kwa mtoto wake, ambaye hakupatikana.

src: Year's go by and Pat is now an old man.

ref: Miaka inapita na Pat sasa ni mzee.

src: All his friends would be there.
mt: Wote wamemwona watakuwa huko.

mt: Alingia katika gym na kupata mashine ya kufanya mazoezi.

src: But the sun began to rise.

src: She rode her bike passing out papers.
mt: Alienda kwa biki akifanya kazi ya kutoa mapambe.

src: Now they were out of thing to discuss.

src: He could not figure out what was wrong with it.

src: After thinking about what to do I decided to send an email.
mt: Baada ya kujifunza nini kufanya nimeamua kufanya neno.

src: Her friend Kevin was also at the park.
mt: Rafiki yake Kevin pia alikuwa katika parki.
ref: Rafiki yake Kevin pia alikuwa kwenye bustani.

src: During breakfast Glenn stomach starts to cramp.
mt: Kwenye chakula cha mchana Glenn mdomo yake kuchanganywa.

src: The work was tiring.
mt: Kazi ilikuwa na nguvu.
ref: Kazi hiyo ilikuwa ya kuchosha.

src: We would leave early in the morning to make the most of our time.
mt: Tukapata nafasi ya kuendesha gari kwa muda mrefu.
ref: Tungeondoka mapema asubuhi ili tutumie wakati wetu vizuri.

src: Gill even owned all of them, including the many later seasons.
mt: Gill anawezekana kuwa mwenye wote, kama vile wengi wa wakati wa wakati.

src: He had all strikes and only needed two more.

src: He burst through the door and was atop them in moments.
mt: Alisimama juu yao katika dakika chache.

src: Then it swelled up terribly and became sore.
mt: Baadaye ilipanda sana na kupata kipindupindu.

src: However one week she got very sick.

src: This man wipes away the dust.

src: When the line was shorter the two got to the front.
mt: Wakati baraza lilikuwa chini, wawili wakati wote wakapata kuelekea kwenye baraza.
ref: Laini ilipokuwa fupi wawili wale walifika mbele.
